Support Me India - Internet Ki Jankari Hindi Me!!!
A Indian Hindi Blog for Beginner Bloggers to Learn Something New and Special Everyday
By: Jume deen khan In: Adsense, Make Money Online Last Updated: 19/04/2017
Google Adsense Earning Increase Kaise Kare? Is bare me main pahle bhi kai post likh chuka hu magar aaj main aapko adsense revenue increase karne ke 5 new tariko ke bare me btaunga
In tariko ko follow karke aap adsense se adhik income kar sakte ho
Agar aap 2017 me adsense earning increase karne ki jankari search kar rahe hai to ye post aapke liye hi hai
Yaha Adsense Revenue badhane ke new tarike btaye gaye hai jinse aap apni website ya blog par Adsense Ad Placement ko or jyada beneficially & complement bana sakte ho or google adsense se pahle se jyada paisa kama sakte ho
Jab bhi adsense earning increase karne ki bat aati hai to main readers ko sabse pahle adsense ke bare sahi se janne kel iye kahta hu kyuki without knowledge aap kisi cheez ka fayda nahi utha sakte
Agar aapko adsense ki thodi bhi jankari hai to aap isse kam traffic par bhi achhi khasi kamayi kar sakte ho
Yaha main aapko adsense kamai badhane ke kuch naye tarike btaunga agar aapko or jyada jankari chahiye to aap humari adsense se related baki posts read kar sakte ho
Is blog par aapko adsense ke bare me complete information mil jayegi
Google Adsense earning increase karne ke liye aapko adsense ki basic information honi jaruri hai agar nahi hai to pahle aap ye psot padh kar adsense ki sahi se samajh le, Google AdSense Kya Hai or Ye Kaam Kaise Karta Hai
Yaha main bat karunga un tariko ki jinke bare me kisi blogger ne nahi btaya hoga yaha tak ki maine bih nahi
Ye sabhi new tarike hai or sabhi effective hai
Main adsnse earning increase karne ki guarantee to nahi deta but aap inhe sahi se follow karoge to aapki income jarur badhegi
What Makes AdSense Different? Adsense Me Alag Kya Hai?
Website blog se earning karne ke liye bahut se advertising program hai
Magar in sabhi me adsense top par hai iski wajah kya hai or baki network and adsense me kya different hai
Adsense aesa kya deta hai jo baki ad network provide nahi karte
Simple sa answer hai Pay Per Click CPC par kaam karne walo me adsense ki CPC sabse jyada hai
05 to $50 ho sakti hai
Mai adsense se ek click par $42 tak earn kar chuka hu or ho sakta hai iski CPC or bhi jyada ho
Magar humari CPC to $0
Iski main wajah hai adsense ke bare me achhe se nahi janna or sirf adsense approve hone ke bad ad code copy kar direct blog me paste kar dena
Bahut se blogger aesa hi karte hai
Agar aap bhi aesa hi karte hai to main aapko suggest karunga ki aap aaj se hi adsense ke bare me sikhna shuru kar de or jitna ho sake ad placement sahi se kare taki aapki site par ad sahi se work kare or aapko achhi CPC mil sake
Acha Result Chahiye to Achi Practice Karo:
Best practices for best results
Agar aapko achha parinam chahiye to achhe se mehanat karni hogi
Aapke post me high paying keywords add karne se se aapki adsense CPC and aapki adsense earning nahi badhegi
Iske liye aapko practice karni hogi or apne liye sah irasta select karna hoga
Ye 5 point adsense practices ke main point hai
Aapko i nsabhi par achhe se work karna hai or har ek point ko achhe se samjhna hai
I sure in points ko follow karke aapki adsense earning 30% to 40% increase ho jayegi
Creating Content that Sells – Sell Related Content Likho:
Jab aapko ad click jyada milenge to aapki adsense income bhi badhegi or jyada ad click pane ka new tarika hai sells realted topic par content likho
Kyuki jo user google se aapki sell wali post par aayega wo product buy karna chahata hai
Use aapki post me uski pasand ki sell ka ad milega or wo us par click karega
For example, aap hosting plan par content likhoge to google us content par usi hosting ka ad show karega
Aap chahe to sells realted post me affiliate marketing bhi use kar sakte hai
Isse aapko 2 fayde honge ek aapke click badhenge dusre aapki CPC jyada hogi kyuki jis ad par click kar visitor product buy kar leta hai us par advertiser jyada pay karte hai
Baki adsense to aapko 68% pay karega
Aap ye tarika try kare I sure aapko benefit jarur milega
Building Your Brand – Apni Brand Banaye
Bhale hi aapki site par kitna bhi achha content ho user usi ki site ko pasand karte hai jiski brand achhi hai
Agar market me aapki site jyada famous hai to readers aapki site par hi visit karna pasand akrenge bhale hi koi or aapse achha content share karta ho
Sath hi jis site ko readers jyada pasand karte hai google bhi use achi ranking deta hai
Agar aapko adsense se achhi earning karni hai to aapko apni site par traffic badhana hoga or logo ko apni site par visit karne ke liye aakarshit karna hoga
Jab aapki site par traffic jyada hoga to aapki earning khud be khud badh jayegi
Yakin maniye ye tarike kam traffic par jyada paisa kamane ke tarike dhoodhne me time west karne se jyada achha hoga
Sirf adsense hi nahi aapko blogging se good earning karne ke har tarike ke liye traffic ki jaruat hoti hai
Agar aap is raste se bhatak gaye hai to ab time hai apni site ko optimize and promote karne ka aap paid advertisement bhi use kar sakte ho
Iske liye facebook and adwords ka istemal kare
Meet the AdSense Expert – AdSense Expert Se Bat Kare:
Agar aapke pas acha traffic hai or aap adsense earning increase karne ka har tarika try kar chuke hai to ye samay hai kisi adsense expert se meeting karne ka
Aap apne kisi jankar ya kisi bhi adsense expert se is bare me bat kar sakte hai
Agar aapko ek achha expert mil jata hai to aap bina kuch kiye apni adsense earning ko 20% to 50% tak increase kar sakte ho
Adsense expert aapki site par ad placement, adsense policy violation, content etc
har tarah ki kami ko door kar aapki adsense earning badhane me help karega
I sure agar aap adsense ka sahi se istemal kar lete hai to india me hi aapko $0
10 to $2 tak ki CPC easily mil jayegi
Main yaha english blog ki nahi hindi blog ki bat kar raha hu
Ji haa, hindi blog par bhi aapko adsense ki itni CPC mil sakti hai besharte aap adsense expert se ad placement karwaye ya khud adsense ko achhe se samajh kar jaruri ad optimizing kare
In 5 tariko ko follow kijiye or fir dekhiye kis tarah se aapki adsense earning increase hoti hai
Yakinan aapki adsense CPC $0
05 hai to in points ko follow karne ke bad $
10 ya isse bhi jayda ho jayegi
Yani in steps ko follow karne se aapki earning 200% increase ho sakti hai
Main humesha kahta hu ki agar aapko adsense ki achhi knowledge hai to aap kam traffic par bhi adsense se achhi kamai kar sakte ho maine Low Traffic Par Google Adsense Se Adhik Earnings Kaise Kare post me iske bare me btaya bhi hai
So chaliye ab aap shuru kar dijiye taki aap bhi adsense se achhi earning kar sako
Agar aap new user hai or ye post first time padh rahe hai to aap humari adsense wali or bhi post padhiye or agar aapko iske alawa or jankari chahiye to humari latest post check karte rahe hum 1-2 day me continue post update karte rahte hai
Agar aapko ye post pasand aaye to ise social media par share jarur kare

Google adsense par jao or payment option par click kar aapko jis month ka payment nahi mila hai
Us par click karo ab aapko ek payment receipt dikhayi degi
Iska screen le lo or print karwa lo
Ise le kar bank manager ke pas jao or kaho ki mujhe yaha se payment mila hai
Isme payment date, payment ID, method and payment number sabkuch hoga
Agar unhe proof chahiye to aap unhe kah sakte ho ki mere bank acocunt me yahi se har month payment aata hai wo aapke bank acocunt ka statement check kar sakte hai
Ye sab aapko apni branch me karna hai

Support Me India - Internet Ki Jankari Hindi Me!!!
A Indian Hindi Blog for Beginner Bloggers to Learn Something New and Special Everyday
By: Jume deen khan In: Adsense Last Updated: 15/04/2017
Google Adsense Kya Hai Kaam Kaise Karta Hai Aur Isse Kamai Kaise Hoti Hai, Main Adsense Se Paise Kaise Kama Sakta hu or Kitne Kama Sakta Hu? Aaj main aapko iske bare me details se btaunga
Agar aapko abhi tak google adsense ke bare me puri jankari nahi hai to is post ko padhne ke bad aapko adsense ke bare me sabkuch malum ho jayega or aapke pas google adsense ki full information hogi
 Adsense se earning karne se pahle aapko adsense kya hai or ye work akise karta hai ke bare me achhe se jan lena chahiye taki aap ise sahi se use kar sako or paise kama sako
Whait is a Google Adsense, How Does it Work and How Can I Earn from Adsense? is sawal ka jawab har wo internet user janna chahata hai jise internet se kamayi karni ho magar is bare me aapko internet par bahut kam jankari milegi
Isiliye aaj main is topic par likh raha hu taki newbie adsense publisher ko problem na ho or wo adsense ka sahi se istemal kar sake
Agar aap blogging ya online world me new ho to aapne google adsense ke bare me jarur suna hoga ya aapne apni favorite website par adsense ads jarur dekhe honge
Internet se earning karne ka ye most popular program hai
Aaj main aapki isi ke bare me detail se btane wala hu ki google adsense kya hai or work kaise karta hai
Main pahle bhi google adsense ke bare me bahut se articles likh chuka hu iske liye aap humari Google Adsense category wali posts read akr sakte hai
Agar aapko adsense ke bare me jankari nahi hai to aap bahut jaldi adsense policy violation kar baithoge or aapka adsense banned, deactivate ya suspend ho jayega
Isi liye main aap sabhi ko suggest karunga ki aap adsense ka istemal karne se pahle iske bare me achhe se jaan le ki ye kya hai, work kaise karta hai or isse income kaise hoti hai? Google adsense hume paise kyu deta hai or kisliye deta hai? In sabhi sawalo ke jawab aapko isi article me mil jayenge aap bas ise carefully read kare or achhe se samajh le
Main is post me aapko google adsense kya hai or ye kaam kaise karta hai ke alawa adsense se paise kamane ka tarika or adsense se kitne paise kama sakte hai ke bare me bhi bta raha hu
Aap post ko carefully read akre taki aapko har point achhe se samajh aa sake
Google adsense CPC (cost-per-click) advertisement program hai jise google ne banaya hai
Google adsense ke through adsense publisher ki website and blog par audience ko target kar automatic text, image, video, and interactive media advertisements ads show karta hai
Google mostly sites content and audience ko target kar ads serve karta hai
 Adsense publisher apni site ke pages and posts me add display kar earning kar sakte hai
Google adsense se aap per click and per impression revenue generate kar sakte ho
Ab aap sochoge ki jab google hume paisa deta hai to google ko paise kaun deta hai
Actually, google ko wo log paise dete hai jinhe apni company, product, website, business etc
ka promotion karna ho I mean advertiser google ko paymwent karte hai
Google us revenue me se 68% commission adsense publisher me bant deta hai or baki 32% commission apne pas rakhta hai
For example, google content ads par 68% or search content par 51% revenue publisher ke sath share karta hai
Agar apa janna chahate hai ki adsense kitna percent revenue pulisher ke sath share karta hai to iski jankari ke liye aap Adsense Revenue share page par visit kar sakte hai
Google har type ke ads offer karta hai
Aapko lagbhag har tarah ke content ke liye ads mil jayenge
Aap kisi bhi topic wali sites par adsense advertisement ka istemal kar sakte hai
Isiliye ye advertising program me sabse best network hai
Google adsense ke alawa media
net, bidvertiser, chitika, adnew etc
bahut sare program hai magar in sabhi me adsense sabse jyada pay karta hai or isi waja hse ye sabse jyada popular programs hai
Sabse jyada people isi ka istemal karte hai
Humara second point hai adsense kaam kaise karta hai? Adsense cost per click kar kaam karta hai or per click publisher ko commission share karta hai
Suppose kijiye main ek advertiser hu or aap ek adsense publisher hai or apni site par adsense ads display karte hai
Ab main apne product ko promote karne ke liye google adsense par ads serve karunga or uske liye google ko per click $5 pay karunga
Ab jab aapki site par mere product ka ads show hoga or aapka koi user us ad par click karega to google mere diye $5 me se aapko 68% yani $3
4 dollar commission aapko share karega or baki 32% yani $1
6 commission apne pas rakh lega
Is tarah se adsense work karta hai or adsense publisher ki earning hoti hai
Agar aap is point par thoda care karoge to ye aapko aasani se samajkh aa jayega
Humara tisra question hai adsense se kamai kaise hoti hai? Is bare me aap point 1 and 2 ko padh kar samajh gaye honge ki adsense se kamayi kaise hoti hai
Fir bhi agar aapko samajh nahi aaya hai to main aapko yaha details se bta deta hu
Jiasa ki maine upar btaya hai ki google adsense 68% revenue adsense publisher ke pas share karta hai or baki 32% apne pas rakhta hai
Adsense cost per click yani CPC par kaam karta hai
Ab agar aapko daily 500 ads  click mil jate hai or aapko google per click $0
50 pay karta hai to apaki CPC hogi $0
50 or 500 click se aapki earning hogi $250 dollar
Yani agar aap indian user hai to apako $250 ke 16,000+ rupees milenge
Ab agar aap soch rahe hai ki adsense se kamaye gaye paise hume kaise milege to google wire transfer ke through direct aapke bank account me payment send karta hai
Google har mahine ki 21 tarikh ko payment send karta hai
Adsense se payout karne ke liye aapke adsense account me minimum $100 earning honi chahiye
Iski jyada jankari ke liye ye post read kare
Agar aap adsense se earning karna chahate ho to uske liye aapke pas website or blog ka hona jaruri hai
Agar aapke pas website nahi hai to aap 5 minute me apni site bana sakte ho wo bhi free me
Iskel iye ye post read kare
Website ya blog banane ke bad aapko apni site par post likhni hai aap apne interest ke anusar kisi bhi topic par post likh sakte hai
Jab aapki site par daily 1000 to 2000 traffic aane alg jaye to aapko google adsense ke liye apply karna hoga
Iski jankari ke liye ye article read kare
Adsense ke liye apply karne ke bad 1-2 week me aapka adsense account approve ho jayega uske bad aapko apni site par adsense ads lagane hai
Uske ba aapki site apr ads show hone lag jayenge or aapki earning start ho jayegi
Agar aap soch rahe hai ki google adsense se kitne paise kama sakte hai to main aapko iske bare me bhi ta deta hu
Main is post ko jyada badi nahi karna chahata isiliye short me bta deta hu
Google adsense kya hai isse aap kitna kama sakte ho ye nimn points par depend karta hai
In 5 bato par aapki adsense earning depend karti hai
Ek person jiski site par 1,00,000 traffic hai or dusra person jiski site par only 10,000 traffic hai to wo 1 lakh traffic wale se jyada kama sakta hai
Beshak use adsense ki jyada knowledge honi chahiye
Finally, ab aapko samajh aa gaya hoga ki google adsense kya hai work kaise karta hai or isse income kaise hoti hai
Sath hi aap isse kitne paise kama sakte ho
Agar aapko is bare me koi sawal puchna ho to aap comment me puch sakte hai
Friends agar aapko ye post pasand aaye to ise social media par apne dosto ke sath share jarur kare

Bro Nyc Post !!!
Jaise ke ab New Update aya he youtube sy ke ab 10,000 sy kam Views wali Channel pe ads nahi dhkengy to
Mera Question ye he :-
Abhi Mere channel pe adsense approve he Q ke mene Bohat pehle ka banaya hua he but abhi issme 10k views nahi hue he , To Ads nahi dikh Rahi , Mene ye puchna tha jab mere 10k hojayengy views to Me Reqs kaise bejhun unko yaha
To koi option nahi he siraf Montization me Approve likha hua he or videos ke agy Bhi Montiziation On he ab me dubara kaise apply karun ??
Kia koi Youtube ne link dia he ? Ya fr Kahin Or he Option ?
Dubara apply karne ki jarurat nahi hai jab aapke channel par 10,00 views honge to ads show hone lag jayenge
सर पहले Blogger से Adsense को Apply किया और Accept नही हुआ तो –
1
क्या हम यूट्यूब से भी दोबारा apply कर सकते हैं
2
क्या हम दूसरे Custom Domain से दोबारा Apply कर सकते हैं
Yes kar sakte ho youtube se apply karne ke liye ab aapke pas 10,000 views hone chahiye
Sir 4000 views par adsense approve ho jaayega
Nahi ab kam se kam aapke channel par 10,000 views hone chahiye tab approve hoga
Google adsense se related yah jaankari bahut hi upyogi he or mera manna he ki jo log blogging kar rahe he yaa fir krna chahte he vah log yadi yah jaankari ko ahchhe se padh lenge to vah adsense ko bahut hi achchhe tarike se samaj jaayenge
Maine aapki adsense related bahut saari post pehle padhi hui he or me pichhle 2 din se vaapis unhe revise kar raha hu,kyuki me chahta hu ki adsense related jaankari me achchhe se prapt kar shaku

Support Me India - Internet Ki Jankari Hindi Me!!!
A Indian Hindi Blog for Beginner Bloggers to Learn Something New and Special Everyday
By: Jume deen khan In: Adsense Last Updated: 15/04/2017
Google AdSense world ki most popular advertisement company hai
Iski main wajah google apne publishers ko other advertising services provide karne wali companies se jyada commission deta hai magar problem tab hoti hai jab user adsense account me payment address verify nahi kar pata
India & other bahut si countries me adsense users ko yahi problem hai so aaj main aapko dusri method se address verification ke bare me bta raha hu
Jiske according aap without Pin Code ke google adsense address verify kar sakte hai
Bina Pin Code AdSense Address Verify Kaise Kare Ki Jankari
Agar apake adsense account me $100 se jyada earnings ho gayi hai or aap 3 time pin generate karne par bhi adsense mail post receive nahi kar paye hai or aapko abhi tak pin code nahi mila hai to koi bat nahi
Sirf aap bhi nahi duniya me bahut se countries me people ko ye problem hai
Don’t worry, iska solution bhi hai aap bina pin code ke address verify kar sakte ho
Aap ye post padh rahe ho iska matlab aapko without pin code adsense account me address verify karna hai
Mera matlab AdSense revenue earn karne ke bad payment lene se pahle adsense publisher ko apna address verify karna hota hai
Iske liye google aapke address par ek post send karta hai usme verification pin code hota hai
Aapko wo pin code apne adsense account me submit kar address verify karna hota hai
India me big and popular sites me adsnese pin post easily pahuch jati hai magar chote chote village and city me pin post milna thoda mushkil hai
Isi ki wajah se bahut se users ko adsense post nahi mil pati hai or unhe adsense account par address verify karne me problem hoti hai
Google aapko 3 time pin code generate karne ka offer deta hai agar aapko three time pin generate karne par bhi mail nahi mila hai to aap ye guide follow kar without pin code address verify kar sakte ho or agar aapko mail mil gaya hai or pin code se address verify karna hai to aap Adsense Par Address (PIN) Verification Kaise Karte Hai post read kare
Ek bar pin generate karne ke bad aap 2 bar duplicate pin code generate kar sakte ho or three post me ek hi pin code hota hai agar aapko dusra ya tisra pin code generate karne ke bad pahle wala pin post mil jaye to aap usse bhi address verify kar sakte ho
Magar jab 3 bar me bhi payment address verification code na mile to aap apne personal documents like aadhaar card, identity card, licence and international passport etc
se adsesne address verify kar sakte ho
 Iske alawa ye documents use kar sakte ho
Agar aapke pas inme se koi document nahi hai to aapko kam se kam aadhar card jarur banwa lena chahiye or adsense account me witohut pin code address verify karne ke liye personal documents proof karne hote hai jiske liye aadhar card sabse best tarika hai kyuki isse aapki identity complete pata chal jati hai
Sabse pahle aap apna adsense account open kare or notification option par jaye or ID verification section par visit kare
Yaha aapko is type ka ek message dikhayi dega
Message me diye link Click here par click kare
Your payment are currently on hold because you have not verified your address
Click here to verify your address once you have recevied your PIN in the mail
Click here option par click karte hi aap payment address verify karne ke option par pahuch jaoge
Yaad rahe ye option aapke adsense account par tabhi show hoga jab aap 3 bar pin code generate karne par bhi pin post receive nahi par paye ho or aapka 3 bar pin generate karne ka time over ho gaya hai
Agar aapko ye link na mile to aap iske liye ye link open kare, Go to Personal Identification Number (PIN) Form
Ab ek Personal Identification Number (PIN) Form open hoga
Isme aapko apne documents proof ki information sahi se fill karni hai
Yaad rahe aap jo bhi documents use kar rahe ho wo Government of India ke dwara issued hona chahiye
Aapke forum submit karne ke 30 minutes ya kuch hours bad aapko address verification ka mail mil jayega
Address confirm hone ke bad aapko adsense account me full access mil jayega or aap apna hold payment receive kar sakte ho
Ab bas aapko apne adsense account me bank account add karne ki jarurat hai
Iski jankari kel iye aap ye post read kar sakte hai, Adsense Me Apna Bank Account Kaise Add Kare Hindi Jankari
Kai bar isme time bhi lag sakta hai so confirm mail na mile to 1 week tak wait kare
Agar aapko ye guideline pasand aaye to please ise newbie bloggers and other adsense users ke sath share jarur kare

Thank you for your interest in expanding your Google AdSense account to implement ad code on your own website
Unfortunately, after reviewing your application, we’re unable to approve this application for the time being
Your existing AdSense account that allows you to show ads on partner sites is not affected by this disapproval

Aapke blog par Insufficient content issue hai
Aap blog par or content likho or traffic badhao uske bad adsense ke liye apply karo
mere pas mere youtube chnnel ka adsence hosted ac hai lakin site ke liye yah fully approved nhi ho rha hai to kya mai wordpress se blogpost par chala jau  aur kya hosted ac se ad lga sakta hu
Nahi uske liye bhi aapko fully approved adsense chahiye
com hai bataye ki esme kya kami hai jo adsence se approved nhi ho rahi
Aapki site par sidebar, related post thumbnail, footer, color, theme design, logo, header ye sab kuch sahi se set karo
Maine Blogging Chhod Ke YouTube Start Kar Di Hai  Agar Mai Apne Channel Ka Naam Change Karta Hu To Mera Google Account Ka Naam Kyu Change Hota Hai
Mai Kewal Channel Name Change Karna Chahta Hu Bina Khud Ka Naam Change Kiye…
Sirf channel ka name change nahi kar sakte
Google acocunt name se hi channel name hota hai
Aap dusra channel bana sakte ho or uska name change kar apni sari videos ko us par transfer akr sakte ho

Reviewing your site will take up to 3 days
We’ll email you when we’re done
please help karo ki maine code sahi lagaya hai ya nhi
Aap ad code ko blog sidebar widget me add karo uske bad aap dekh sakte ho ki ad show ho raha hai ya nahi
sir side bar me bhi lga diya code bat blank ad nhi dikh raha mai ribbon theme use kar rha hu
2 week ho gya mera adsence fully approved nhi hua
New ad format create karo or uska code sidebar me add kar mujhe apni site ka URL btao main check karke dekhta hu

bhai jaise adsense ne ek meri website ko banned kar diya hai
1st agar usko kisi or fully approved adsense se connect kare to kya adsense bolck ho sakta hai
2nd baat main ek new website banana chahta hun or usi domain se related wo
in karke banana chahta hun or uska data new domain par swift karke  1st wali site ko search engine se sara kuchh remove karna hai kaise kar sakte hai
First aap check karo ki aapka adsense deactivate hua hai ya google ne aapki site ko adsesne ke liye ban kar diya hai
Agar aapki site ko ban nahi kiya hai to aap usi par dusra adsesne sue kar sakte ho
Bahut simple hai old blog ka backup le kar new blog me import kar do
Bank Statement Kaise Pa Sakte Hai
Iske Bare me jankari de
Mera Bank Account Mere Home se 2km Dur kisi dusre village me hai to kya adsense verify hoga aur ha 1 question ka jawab jarur de
Go to your bank branch and ask them

Support Me India - Internet Ki Jankari Hindi Me!!!
A Indian Hindi Blog for Beginner Bloggers to Learn Something New and Special Everyday
By: Jume deen khan In: Adsense Last Updated: 15/04/2017
Google आपके interest and context के आधार पर आपको adsense program के through best to best ads provide करता हैं मगर फिर भी आपको कई बार कुछ ad बिलकुल पसंद नहीं आते यहाँ ताकि की आप उन्हें देखना तक नहीं चाहते ads आपके सामने आ जाते हैं। Actually, google user को default category के अनुसार random advertisement show करता था जिसकी वजह से आपको इस तरह की problem होती थी। इसीलिए मैं आपको google ads को control करने और relevant and useful बनाने के बारे में बता रहा हूँ।
Google ads के इस reason की वजह से कई बार हम बहुत सी sites को family member के सामने open तक नहीं कर पाते है इसीलिए इस article में आज मैं आपको ऐसा तरीका बता रहा हु जिससे आप google ads को आसानी से अपने interest अपनी पसंद के अनुसार relevant and useful बना सकते हों।
हालाँकि google adsense publisher अपनी website के content के अनुसार adsense ads को filter कर सकते है मगर adsense की information या experience न होने की वजह से कुछ publishers ऐसा नहीं आकर पते हैं जिससे websites readers को हर type के ads का सामना करना पड़ता हैं।
मगर अब ऐसा नहीं है google ने इसका तरीका बता दिया है अब आप easily google ads को अपने interest के अनुसार control कर सकते हों और बेकार के unwanted ads को avoid कर सकते हों।
Google ads को और अधिक relevant और useful उपयोगी बनाने के लिए आपको Personalized Ads की अपनी जरुरत क अनुसार settings करनी होगी। कैसे करनी है उसके लिए आप ये steps follow करें।
अगर आपको सिर्फ अपने interest वाले google ads ही show करने है तो आप number 1 option “Also use Google Account activity and information to personalize ads on these websites and apps and store that date in your Google Account” को enable कर सकते हों।
दुसरे option में आप उन सभी topics को uncheck कर सकते हो जो आपको पसंद नहीं है और जिस तरह के ads आप देखना नहीं चाहते। चलिए मैं दोनों के बारे में आपको details से बता देता हूँ।
Ads Personalization:
इस option को enable का मतलब है की आप अपनी google account activity and interest data information google को share कर रहे हों।
इसको enable करने के बाद google आपकी activity and interest trace करना शुरू कर देगा उसके बाद आपकी details को advertising service के लिए इस्तेमाल करेगा और आपको only आपके interest के अनुसार ही ads दिखाएगा।
अगर आप अपना डाटा google के साथ share करना और अपनी पसंद के advertisement नहीं देखना चाहते तो आप इस option को disable कर सकते हों।
यहाँ पर सभी topics and categories enable होंगे। आप सभी type के ads देखने की जरुरत नहीं है उनमे से आपको जो topic या category नापसंद हो उसे untick कर disable कर दें और सिर्फ उन्ही topics को enable करे जिन्हें adsense ads में देखना चाहते हों।
यहाँ पर आपको लगभग 24 से 36 topics मिलेंगे इनके अलावा अगर आपको अपनी पसंद की किसी category या topic से related ads adsense पर देखने है तो आप +NEW TOPIC पर click कर अपनी पसंद के topics add कर सकते हों।
इस तरह से आप google ads को control कर सकते हो और unwanted category वाले ads को block कर सिर्फ अपने interest के अनुसार ads को enable कर google ads को और अधिक relevant and useful बना सकते हों।
इस तरह से आप bad and irrelevant ads को filter कर google ads को अपने interest के according more relevant & useful बना सकते हों।
Internet का इस्तेमाल करने वाले हर person का सामना google ads से होता है आपको 70% websites पर adsense ads मिलेंगे ऐसे में आप सभी को google ads को control करने की जानकारी होनी चाहिए। इस तरीके से आप आसानी से adsense ads को useful बना सकते हों।
अगर आपको इस article में दी गयी जानकारी पसंद आये तो इसे social media पर अपने दोस्तों के साथ share जरुर करे ताकि ओंको भी इसका पता चल सकें।

Bhai jab bhi aap ki website kholta hun tab mujhe rummy ki ads show hoti hai upper mein
Bhai maine apne website mein google ads ko lekarke mufti se mashwara liya ki ye sahi hai ya nhi
Mujhe mufti sahab ne kaha ki agar ads islam se hat kar ke hai jaise movies, musics, betting, wine, etc
to ye jayez nhi hoga
Maine unse kaha ki google adsense mein ad blocking bhi maujood hasi jisse ki ham jo ads islam me jayez nhi use block kar sakte hain, to unhone kaha ki agar koi galat ads show nhi hota to kar sakte ho lekin text ads rakhna nhi to kisi product ka ads aaya aur usme ladki ka galat pradarshan kiya gaya hai to wo haram ho jayega
Bhai aap ki life hai aur aap ki marzi hai, main bas aapse yahi kehna chahunga ki aap google adsense me jaakarke un sab category ko block kar dijiye jo islam mein jayez nhi, nhi to jo aap abhi kama rahe ho wo haram ho jayega
Meri iss comment ko approve mat kariyega, maine to sirf musalmaan hone ke naate aapko samjhaya hai kyunki mujhe jaankari hui
Hamein sirf duniya nhi aakhirat bhi dekhni hai
Aap sab category ko block kar dijiye jo islam mein haram hai aur text ads kar dijiye
Please meri baaton ko dhyan dein aur yakeen nhi to kisi mufti se puch lijiye

Support Me India - Internet Ki Jankari Hindi Me!!!
A Indian Hindi Blog for Beginner Bloggers to Learn Something New and Special Everyday
By: Jume deen khan In: Adsense Last Updated: 15/04/2017
Website ka responsive hona google search results me top ranking ka main factor hai
Same wese hi google adsense se good earning karne ke liye responsive ad units istemal karna sabse behtar hai
Google responsive adsense ad units ke liye publisher ko recommend bhi karta hai kyuki ye jyada clear hote hai or isse device screen ke size ke anusar ads show hota hai
But responsive ads fully responsive nahi hote or mobile and desktop dono me hi proper work nahi karte
So aaj main aapko responsive ad unit ko or jyada responsive banane or adsense revenue badhane ki kuch tips bta raha hu
In tips se aap apni adsense earning increase kar pahle se jyada paise kama sakte ho
yes it’s true, main sach kah raha hu yaha btayi gayi tips se aap responsive ad unit ko or bhi jyada responsive and visible bana sakte ho
Actually, problem ye hai ki adsense ka jo responsive ad unit hota hai wo computer, mobile, smartphone, tablets and other devices me proper work nahi kar pata or adsense publisher ko kafi loss uthana padta hai
So aaj main aapko responsive ad units ko or adhik Workable, Visible, Clear and Perfectly load hone ke layak banane ki tips bta raha hu
Agar aap direct adsense responsive ads use karte hai to ye post aapke bahut kaam aayegi
Google adsense ad units ko edit karna allow nahi karta but google ye bhi kahta hai ki agar aapki site par responsive ad units sahi se kaam nahi kar raha hai to aap ad code ko modify kar sakte ho
Aap CSS coding se ad code ko edit kar or jyada responsive bana sakte ho so don’t worry is trick se adsense Policy Violation nahi hota
 So chaliye ab main topic par aata hai
Ye work thoda danger hai so aap carefully follow kare
Mostly, aapne dekha hoga ki responsive ads 768*90 and 468*60 Horizontal banner ke size me jyada show hota hai
Mobile screen me bhi ye size 320*100 and 320*50 size ka banner show hota hai jo ki desktop and mobile device kisi bhi user ke liye effective nahi hota
India ke top blogger Amit Agarwal ka kahna hai ki Rectangle ads sabse better hote hai
Main is bat se 100% agree hu
Automatically responsive ad units se rectangle ad units jyada achha hai
Second problem, agar aap custom ads use karte ho to user ke ad blocker sue karne par ad place ki jagah white space show hoga or isse site ka design unprofessional lagta hai
Show hume kisi trick se responsive ad unit ko rectangle ad unit me modify karna hai or all device screens me fit ad show karna hai
Earn More Using Responsive Adsense Ad Units:
Ye formula sabse best hai or sabse jyada adsense user ise use karte hai
Is formula se responsive ad ko 336*280, 300*250 rectangle ad me show kar sakte ho
Iske liye aapko bas ad code me data-ad-format=”auto” me “auto” ki jagah “rectangle” likhna hoga
But sawal ye hai ki konse ad format me kis size ke ad show honge or aapko kons ad unit kaha kis place par use karna chahiye
Iske bare me aap in points se samajh sakte ho
Ye responsive ad units ko or jyada responsive and effective banane ki sabse best trick hai
But abhi bhi aapko ek problem hogi jo ki har type ke responsive ad unit me hoti hai
WO hoti hai minimum size ke mobile device me responsive ad unit ka proper show nahi hona
Main iske bare me bhi aapko bta raha hu
Jaisa ki main upar bta chuka hu ki google CSS code se responsive ad unit ko modify karna allow karta hai to aap ad code ke CSS code me minimum and maximum width set kar sakte hai
Aapko style="display:block"
ki jagah CSS code se minum and maximum wdith set karni hai
Iske liye aap ye format follow kare
Is example ki tarah aap responsive ad unit ko desktop, mobile and tablet screen ke liye modify kar sakte ho
Iske liye aap adsense par jao or new responsive ad unit create publisher ID and Uinit ID ko copy kar is code me paste kare uske bad is code ko copy par apne blog me use kar sakte ho
Yaha btayi gayi width ko aap apni requirement ke anusar change kar sakte ho
Code ko modify karne me bad ek bar chec kar le uske bad siteppage ke HTML source me yaha aap jaha bhi ad unit use karte ho waha add kar de
Aap chahe to alag se CSS coding add kar bhi ad width control kar sakte
Iske liye aap ye formula follow kare
Is tarah se aap responsive ad units ko edit kar or jyada responsive bana sakte ho
Ad unit modify kar aap upar btaye steps ke ausar place par ad code paste kare
I sure aapki site par pahle se better ad performance milega or ad pahle se jyada clear display honge
Is trick se aapki site par har device me ad unit clear show honge or aapko pahle se jyada clicks milenge
Agar aap ek se jyada ad unit ko edit karna chahate ho to aap same process ko follow kar sakte ho
Iske bare me adhik jankari ke liye aap adsense help forum ke How to Modify Your Responsive Ad Code page par visit kar sakte ho

10 February Ko Maine Adsense ke liye apply Kiya tha
Aur ad Apne website ke head section me Laga diya tha
Aur Adsense me dikha Raha tha ki 3 days lagenge review karne me
Aur fir mere pas ek email Aya ki successfully verified ho gya h aur first ad create kariye
Lekin aaj 17 February hai aur jab bhi main Adsense me login krta hu tab bhi dikhata h ki 3 days lagenge review karne me

Support Me India - Internet Ki Jankari Hindi Me!!!
A Indian Hindi Blog for Beginner Bloggers to Learn Something New and Special Everyday
By: Jume deen khan In: Adsense Last Updated: 15/04/2017
Learn More About the Adsense Content Policy: Google bad product ko promote karne wali 47,000 sites and unwanted ocntent share karne wali 15,000 sites ko block or lagbhag 6,000 accounts ko suspend kar chuka hu
Agar aap AdSense publisher hai to aese me aapka ye janna bhaut jaruri hai ki AdSense kis tarah ke content par ads allow nahi karta or kis type ke content material par AdSense disable ho sakta hai
Is article me main iske bare me details se bta raha hu
Ye guide har ek google AdSense user ke liye important hai
Kuch log sirf AdSense se earning karne ke liye unwanted content write karte hai
Isme dusro ka content copy karna, short content wirte kar maximum ad placement karna, Wrong place par ad dikhana jaise AdSense content policy violation ki wajah se AdSense disable ho sakta hai
Online earnings ka google AdSense ek main source hai or mostly website owner and blogger AdSense ka istemal karte hai but hum har type ke content par AdSense ad istemal nahi kar sakte or iske liye hume google AdSense ke policy, terms follow karni hogi warna AdSense account suspend ho sakta hai
What is the AdSense content policy? main yaha aapko jo AdSense ka violation karne wale content ke bare me bta raha hu wo rules mostly adsesne publisher ke liye hai but sath hi ye aapki site ki value increase karne ke bih kaam aayenge aap AdSense publisher nahi ho to bhi aapko is type ka content share nahi karna hai
Jis site par adult content like Pornography images, videos, games, cartoon, Sexually Gratifying Content, Sexual Tips and Health, Adults, or Mature content share kiya jata hai un par AdSense ads use nahi kar sakte
Google is type ke content par bilkul bhi ads allow nahi karta or agar koi AdSense publisher is type ka content share karta hai to uska AdSense account jaldi hi suspend ho jayega
Sath hi aap aese content par (AFS) yani AdSense fo search boxes bhi use nahi kar sakte
Content That Advocates Against an Individual, Group and Organization:
Google strongly expression freedom me believe karta hai isiliye adsesne network for users, advertisers, publishers ko kisi ke bhi khilap ads dikhane or content likhne ki permission nahi deta hai
Jis site par harass karne wala and bullying content share karta hai un par AdSense ads display karna allow nahi karta
Aap kisi ke khilap hatred content likh kar us par AdSense ads se earning nahi kar sakte
Example, Ethnic Orgin, Religion, Disability, Gender, Age, Veteran Status, Sexual Orientation / Gender Identity and Kisi Person ke khilap likha lagaya content AdSense allow nahi karta
Kisi bhi group ko harm karne wale is tarah ke content par google AdSense ads allow nahi karta
Recreational Drugs and Drug-related Content:
Google chahate hai ki people online and offline dono tarike se safe rahe
So google cause damage, harm and inury content ka promotion allow nahi karta
Isi wajah se google drugs and other nasha karne wale products content par AdSense ads allow nahi karta
Kuch aese substance hote hai jo manorajan ke name par logo ki life barbad karte hai
Example, Cocaine, Crystal Meth, Heroin, Marijuana, Cocaine Substitutes, Bongs, Mephedrone and other legal highs
Google is type ka content share karne wali site par AdSense bilkul bhi allow nahi karta
Alcohol Related Content:
Google Alcohol-related content par bhi AdSense ads allow nahi karta
Jo site alcohol jaise products ko badhawa deti hai or logo ki jindagi barbad karne wale products sell ya unka promotion karti hai ko google bilkul pasnad nahi karta
Google aesi sites ko na search engine me dikhata hai or na hi aese content par AdSense ads allow karta hai
Additionally, Adsense publisher apni site par is category ka content share nahi kar sakte
Example, kisi alcohol bar ka promotion karna ya jis location par alcohol milti hai uska promotion karna AdSense content policy ka violation hai
Tabacco Related Content:
Tabacco ke bare me aap sabhi jante hai
Bidi, Cigarettes, Cigars, Tabacco Pipes, Rolling Papers, Gutka, Pan Masala etc
kisi bhi type ke product ka promotion karne wali site par AdSense ads istemal nahi kar sakte
Agar aapko AdSense use karna hai to aapko is tarah ke content ko avoid kar content policy ko follow karna hoga
Market me aese bahut se nashe wale items hai aapko unme se kisi ka bhi promotion nahi karna hai
Healthcare Related Content:
Jo log illegal tarike se unapprove healthcare dawaye sell karte hai or unke pas uski koi govt permission nahi hoti hai
Google aese cotent par ad allow nahi karta
Internet par aapko aesi bahut si sites mil jayegi jo aapko health ke bare me Fake Medicine sell karti hai
Uski medicine se hota kuch bhi nahi hai ulta logo ki body me problem ho jati hai
Ye kisi bhi person ke liye dangers hote hai
So agar aap is type ke kisi product ka promotion karte ho ya is type ki sites play karte ho to aap us par AdSense ads istemal nahi kar sakte
Agar koi karta bhi hai to jaise hi google ko uska pata chalta hai google uska AdSense account suspend kar deta hai
Hacking and Cracking Content:
Jin websites and blog par hacking and cracking ki information share ki jati hai un par AdSense ads display nahi kar sakte google ise allow nahi karta or ye google AdSense ki content policy violation ke sath sabhi countries me illegal bhi hai
Bahut se log unauthorized tarike se server, software, apps, websites, blogs, social media account, whatsapp etc
ke bare me hacking article write kar apni site par publish karte hai
I know ki is type ke content par traffic jyada aata hai but ye google AdSense content policy ka violation hai or jaisa main upar bta chuka hki ki ye work illegal bhi hai
Is tarah ek work se na sirf aapka AdSense suspend hoa balki kisi ke report karne par government se aapko punishment bhi mil sakta hai
Maine yaha aapko specially iske bare me point se bta deta hu
Aesa koi bhi kaam karne par google aapke AdSense account ko suspended kar sakta hai or ho sakta hai aapki site ko humesha ke liye block hi kar de or site par se AdSense block hone ka matlab hai 50% earnings down ho jana ya fir aap full AdSense revenue par depended hai to aapka career barbad ho jana
I know kuch log aesa karte hai or pichle kafi time se AdSense use karte hai
But jis time google AdSense team unki site ka review karegi unka AdSense disable ya block ho jayega
Page That Offer Compensation Programs:
Aesi sites jo apne customers se servey complete karne, email read karne jaise work karwati hai or payment ka promise kar payment nahi karti google un sites par bhi AdSense ads allow nahi karta
So agar aap koi fake service wali site chala rahe hai ya fir blog par fake news contet share karte hai to abhi se ye sab band kar dijiye
Example, is category me Pay-Per-Click, Pay-To-Click Pages, Pay To Surf Pages, Auto Surf Pages, Search for Charity Pages, Pay To Search Pages jaisa work karne wali site aati hai
Jin sites par Gory Images and Bloodshed, Fight Scenes, Gruesome and Freak Accident type ka images content share kiya jata hai un par bhi google AdSense ads use kar income nahi kar sakte
Weapon Related Content:
Jin site par ammunition, gun parts, hardware, pistols, rifles, BB guns, sporting guns, air guns,blowguns, and stun guns se related jankari ya products sell kiya jata hai un par google AdSense ads allow nahi
Ye work full illegal hai or is bare me bat karna bih galat hai
Main sirf itna kahunga ki is type ki jankari kabhi bhi apni site par share na kare
Content that Enables Dishonest Behavior:
Google honesty and fairness ko support deta hai
So google aese content par AdSense ads allow nahi karta jis par mislead infomration share ki jati hai or users ko fake information de kar bevkoof banaya jata hai
Mostly is line me news websites hoti hai jo jyada traffic pane ke liye site par fake news share karti hai
Google aesi site ko search engine or AdSense dono par se block kar sakta hai
Iske alawa jo sites fake passport, false documents, diplomas and other identity card create karne ki jankari deti hai
Exam ke leak papers sales karne wali sites and kisi bhi tarah ki fraudulet information share karne wali sites par google AdSense ads allow nahi karta
Google aesi kisi bhi sites par AdSense ads allow nahi karta jo apne country ke rules, other countries ki terms and kisi bhi tarah ka illegal content share karti hai
Kisi bhi tarah ki counterfeit good sell karne wali sites, Illegal sex-act, images, videos etc
ke bare me jankari share karne wali site par AdSense account disable ho sakta hai
Is bare me jyada btane ki jarurat nahi hai sabih jane hai ki illegal work karna danger ho sakta hai
I hope aap bhi aesa work kar content policy violation nahi karoge
Inme se kisi bhi tarah ki jankari share karne ya aapki site par is type ki jankari share karne ke bare me koi post hai to jaldi hi aapka AdSense account disable hone wala hai
Google pichle kafi time se is par kam foucs kar raha tha but ab google action le raha hai or is tarah ka unwanted content share karne wali sites par se AdSense disable kar raha hai
Agar aap chahate ho ki aapki site par AdSense bana rahe or aap future me bina kisi problem ke AdSense service use kare to aap upar btayi AdSense content policy ko sah ise follow kare
Is jankari ko other blogger and AdSense publisher ke sath share jarur kare
Don’t worry isme bas 2 second ka time lagega or aapki wajah se kisi or ki help ho jayegi

entry-content h6 {
	margin-bottom: 20px;
	color: #000;
	font-style: normal;
	font-weight: 700;
	font-size: 30px;
	line-height: 1
1em;
	font-family: playfair display;

Jume deen khan says
Deepak isi ki to kaha raha hu isme se font-size: 30px; cod ko remove karo

Support Me India - Internet Ki Jankari Hindi Me!!!
A Indian Hindi Blog for Beginner Bloggers to Learn Something New and Special Everyday
By: Jume deen khan In: Adsense Last Updated: 15/04/2017
Introducing “Ad Balance” new feature in Google AdSense: Is post me main aapko google AdSense ke new feature Ad Balance ke bare me btane ja raha hu
Ad balance option ko apply karke aap AdSense se adhik earning kar sakte ho
In simple words, AdSense ke is feature ko enable kar ke aap apni site par Low CPC Ads ko cut kar only High Paying Ads show kar sakte ho or pahle se jyada paise kama sakte ho
Ye AdSense feature aapko AdSense earnings control karne ka great user experience offer karta hai or ye bhi btata hai ki aapki site par ads kaisi performance kar rahe hai jisse aap easily specifically High CPC Ad unit show kar apni AdSense revenue increase kar sakte ho
Aayiye jante hai ad balance feature kya hai iska istemal kar ke apni AdSense income boost kaise kare
Google adsesne kafi time pahle hi apna user interface change kar chuka hai or AdSense ke new user interface ka look pahle se jyada nice or user-friendly hai
Kyuki ab aap AdSense ke homepage par hi eastimated earning ke sath Page Views, CPC, RPM, CTC, Impressions, Ad units, Sites, Platform and other many reports dekh sakte ho
Iske 10 day bad hi AdSense ne publishers ke liye ek new feature Ad Balance launch kiya tha
Shayad aapne AdSense par ye feature dekha bhi hoga agar nahi bhi dekha hai to koi bat nahi aaj main aapko is feature ke bare me or ise use karne ke bare me detail se bta raha hu
Aap is feature ki help se high paying ads allow kar apni AdSense earning ko increase kar sakte ho
Ye ad balance feature best performing ads ko focus karne ke liye banaya gaya hai
Iska istemal kar aap easily pata kar sakte ho ki aapki site par kitne percent ad units se earning ho rahi hai or kitne ads bekar me hi aapki website par show ho rahe hai
Humare blog ya website par jo ad network show hote hai un sabhi se earning nahi hoti kyuki kuch ads ki CPC bahut hi low hoti hai or unse na ke barabar earning hoti hai
Adsense ke is features se aap un low paying ads ko cut kar only high paying ad units show kar sakte ho
Suppose, aapki site par 70% potential ads display karne se 100% eastimated earning hoti hai to aapko site par 100% ads show karne ki kya jarurat hai
Aese me aap ad balance feature ka istemal kar 70% ads set kar sakte ho or baki ke 30% bekar ke low paying ads ki jagah apne content par valuable and high profit ads display kar sakte ho
Iska matlab aapki earning increase hogi or aapki site par bekar ke extra no revenue ads bhi show nahi honge
Yani aapko ek tricks se 2-2 benefits hai so aayiye ab main aapko btata hu ki google AdSense ad balance feature ko use kaise karte hai
Mere Ad Unit Remove Karne Par kya Hoga?
Ans: Aapke ad limit set karne ke bad aapki site par only high paying ads show honge or baki low paying ads ki jagah blank ad ya space show hoga
 Low ads ki jagah blank ad ya space show hoga
Step by Step Full Guide in Hindi: Google AdSense ad balance feature ko best-performing ads focus karne ke liye design kiya gaya hai taki aap apne content par high value ad display kar sako or advertiser sahi content par advertising kar sake
Isse advertiser apni choice se content par high value ads show kara sakte hai
Publisher ko isse great user experience milega or unki earning bhi increase hogi
Now, aapke dimag me ise use karne ke question aa raha hoga so mai nsidha matter par aata hu
3 Steps to Use Ad Balance Featore in Google Adsense:
First apna AdSense account open kare or check kar le ki aap AdSense ka latest user interface istemal kar rahe ho
Agar aap old version use kar rahe ho to “TRY THE NEW ADSENSE” option par click kare new version open ho jayega
Ab ad balance ka feature aapke samne hoga or top par ye message show hoga
“Focus on your best-performing ads
Only show the ads that make you the most money, improving the overall visitor experience of your site at minimal cost to you
Use the slider to reduce the number of ads and see the impact this has on your revenue
Yani aap is feature ka upyog kar sirf wohi ads show kar sakte ho jisse aapko jyada earning hoti hai or baki low paying ads ko reduce kar sakte ho
Aap yaha par ads slider ko slide kar pata kar sakte ho ki kitne percent ads se aapki kitni earning ho rahi hai
Main aapko already bta chuka hu ki aapki 100% eastimated earning 70% ads display karne se hoti hai to aapko baki 30% ads ko site par show karne ki koi jarurat nahi hai
So aap yaha green and blue slider me se ads ke blue slider par check kare ki aapki kitne % se kitni percent earning ho rahi hai
Uske bad aapko jis hisab se ad show karne hai waha par ads slider set kare
Main aapko suggest karunga ki aap minimum utni hi ads limit set kare jisse aapki 100% earning ho rahi hai baki aapko jo best lage kar sakte ho
Aapke ad balance set karne ke bad ise proper work karne me 1 week tak lag sakta hai so apply karne ke bad kuch time wait kare or fir apne blog par ad perform check kare
Aap dekhenge ki site par only high paying ads hi show ho rahe honge
Yaad rahe low CPC ad ke place par koi ad show nahi hog
Agar aapki site par good and high keywords nahi hai to aapko space ya blank ad kiproblem hogi
Yani aapki site par low CPC ads ki jagah high CPC ads nahi only high CPC ad hi show honge
Example, aapki site ke page par 5 ad unit add hai or page ko open karne par 3 low paying ads show nahi hote hai or 2 high paying ads show hote hai to sirf 2 hi ad show honge or baki place par blank ad ya space show hoga
So do this carefully
I hope you may like this post and get helpful information about AdSense so please share this article on social media with your friends

I’m seeing clicks with no earnings
1
Aap authorization feature use karte ho but aapne authorization me apni site verify nahi ki hai to aapke ads par click honge but earning nahi hogi
Aapki site par CPM ad show ho rahe hai
Aese ads par advertiser $0
Ya aapki site par very low paying ad show ho rahe hai jinpar click karne se na ke barabar earning hoti hai
Aapke aese clicks mi lrahe hai jinhe google system invalid samajh raha hai
Ya fir google system artificially mistake aapke adsesne apr reprot show kar raha hai
Aese me google aapko koi pay nahi karega
Aapke ads par user invalid clicks kar rahe hai ya user ke ad par click karne se galat click ho raha hai
Aese me advertiser koi charge nahi dete
Ya fir aapke AdSense par system sahi se work nahi kar raha hai
In sabhi solution ka matlab ye hai ki aapke ads par kcuh clicks hote hai but invalid clicks se jo charge lagta hai usse aapki earning 0 ho jati hai
CPC zero hone ki wajah aapko 1000 impressions par $0

Support Me India - Internet Ki Jankari Hindi Me!!!
A Indian Hindi Blog for Beginner Bloggers to Learn Something New and Special Everyday
By: Jume deen khan In: Adsense Last Updated: 15/04/2017
How to Use Custom Channel and URL Channel in Adsense? Aaj main fir aap sabhi ke liye ek awesome AdSense tutorial le kar aaya hu
Aapne google AdSense performance reports me me custom channels and URL channels ke options jarur dekhe honge
Aaj main inhi ke bare me btane wala hu ki google AdSense me custom channels or URL channels kaise create kaise karte hai or inka AdSense earning report check karne me istemal kis liye or kaise kiya jata hai
Agar aap google AdSense publisher ho or apni website or blog par AdSense advertisement se earning genrate karte ho to aapko pata hoga ki ” site par AdSense se ksi tarah revenue earn ho rahi hai” ke bare me pata hona kitna important hai
Like specific web page, ad units and ad sizes inme kis se kitni earnings ho rahi hai ki jankari hona kisi bhi AdSense publisher ke liye jaruri hai
Google AdSense top advertising programs hai or is par site revenue ki performance report karne ke many ways diye huye hai jinse aap AdSense se hone wali income ke bare me sabkuch pata kar sakte ho but iske liye aapko AdSense earning ki performance reports check karne ki basic information honi chahiye
Aapne google AdSense me performance reports feature me My reports, Common reports and Advanced reports jaise kei option dekhe honge but kya aapko inka istemal kaise karte hai ke bare full information hai or kya aapne kabhi AdSense custom channels and URL channels ka istemal kiya hai
Custom channel ke bare me to fir bhi publishers ko pata hota hai but URL channel ke bare me sirf kuch hi AdSense users ko jankari hai isiliye koi bhi is feature ko use nahi karta
In this post, aaj is tutorial me main aapko google AdSense me Custom channels and URL channel create karne or istemal karne ke bare btane wala hu
Agar aapne AdSense ke in feature ka upyog abhi tak nahi kiya hai to aap is article ko carefully read kare or yaha btaye gaye steps follow kar earnings performance reports check karne me custom channels and url channels ka istemal kare
Adsense custom channels kya hai? first hum isi ke bare me bat karenge
Adsense ad units and ad sizes ki alag alag report check karne, sabhi ad units ki report filter karne or performance reports trace ke liye custom channels and URL channels ka istemal kiya jata hai
Custom channels ka istemal ad units ke specific groups ki performance reports track karne ke liye hota hai
Aap apni website ke design ke anusar ad units use karte ho un sabhi ad units ko aap layout, sidebar, post and pages ke anusar custom channels se connect kar sakte ho
Yaha main aapko kuchj examples de kar custom channel ka istemal karne ke bare me bta raha hu taki aapko easily or clear samajh aa jaye
Aap ad size, ad units and ad color ke anusar custom channels ka istemal kar sakte hai
Suppose aap per post 3 ad units, 1 ad unit sidebar, 1 ad unit header and 3 ad units pages use karte ho to aapko un sabki earning me se ye pata nahi chalega ki kis ad unt se kitni or kis size ke ad se kitni earnings huyi hai
Iske liye aap alag alag custom channels use kar sakte ho
Top 3 Example to Use Custom Channels:
Iske alawa aap targetable ad placement ki performance reports trace karne ke liye bhi custom channel ka istemal kar sakte ho
Custom Channels Kaise Create Kare?
There are two ways to create custom channels
Adsense me custom channel create karne ke 2 tarike hai jinse aap ad unit report track kar sakte hai
Aap new ad unit create or edit karte time custom channels select kar sakte hai
Sabse pahle main aapko bta du ki aap maximum 500 custom channels create kar activate kar sakte hai
I mean aap jayda se jyada 500 custom channes ka istemal kar sakte ho
Aap first custom channel bana kar usme ad units add kar sakte hai
Is section me aap first custom channels create kar ke usme apne hisab sead units ko add kar sakte hai
Aap custom channels create karne ke liye upar btaye gaye dono steps ke liye same screenshot ke steps follow kar sakte ho
Custom Channels Ki Performance Reports Kaise Check Kare?
Aap custom channels create or use karte ho specific an units ki performance reports track karne ke liye
So aapko ye jarur pata hona chahiye ki custom channles ki performance kaise check karte hai
Iske liye aap ye steps follow kare
How to view custom channels report:
Adsense URL channels kya hai? Ye bhi same custom channels jaisa hi feature hai but dono me fark hai
Jaha custom channels ad units ki report track karne ke liye use kiye jate hai wohi URL channel ka istemal kisi specific domain, sub domain, su directory ki report check karne ke liye kiya jata hai
com domain par kei subdomain ya sub directories use karte ho to aapko alag alag sites ki earnings report check karne ki jarurat hoti hai
In sabhi sites ki report track karne ke liye website owner URL channels ka upyog karta hai
Mostly URL channels ki un logo ko jyada jarurat padti hai jo multiple niche par content write karte hai
Like ek se jyada language me blog ya site banana ya alag alag category ke lyie sub directory or sub-domains use karna
URL channles ka istemal kyu kiya jata hai? Example, aapke pas example, aapke pas example
Ab aap ek hi domain par is tarah kei sub-domain and sub-directories use kar sakte hai
Aap all web pages, specific subdomains and subdirectory ki URL channels ka istemal kar alag se report track kar sakte ho
Sub domains and Sub directories:
Is tarah aap ek hi domainpar multiple blog ya website start kar sakte ho
I know aapko in sabki alag alag income report check karne ki jarurat hogi warna aapko ye pata nahi chalega ki kis blog se kitni earning ho rahi hai
Aap chahe to URL channel ka istemal kisi web page ki report track karne ke liye bhi kar sakte ho
Adsense Par URL Channels Kaise Banaye?
Sabse pahle aapko bta du ki aap custom channels ki tarah URL channels bhi maximum 500 hi use kar sakte ho
Aap URL channel ke alawa site reports section me bhi apni sabhi sites sub domains and su directories ki report dekh sakte ho
To Create URL Channel:
Agar URL channel create karte time “Some of the URLs are not part of your Owned sites” ki warning show ho to iska matlab hai aap jis specific domain ke liye URL channel create kar rahe ho wo aapki AdSense ki “Owned sites list” me add nahi hai
Aap first Site Management me jaye or apna domain or sub domain URLs ko submit kar verify kare
URL Channels Ki Performance Reports Kaise Dekhe?
Ek bar URL channel create karne ke bad aapko uski performance report check karne ki jarurat padegi
Aap sdame custom channel ki trah URL channels ki bhi performance dekh sakte hai
Iske liye below steps follow kare
View Reports for URL Channels:
Iske alaw aap Common reports me Sites, Countries, Ad units, Platforms, Products and other material ke ki alag alag performance reports check kar sakte ho
Iss tarah aap easily apni site se hone wali earning ke source check kar sakte ho
Aap kitne clicks se kitni or kis desh se kitni earning huyi hai ye sab pata kar sakte ho
Tips: – Agar aapko google AdSense ki full information hai to hi aap AdSense ko achhe se handle kar sakte ho or AdSense ads se good earnings kar sakte ho warna aap $10 to $20 tak hi simit rah rahoge
So jitni jaldi ho sake AdSense ke bare me jankari jutana shuru kar do
Is tarah se aap google AdSense me custom channels and URL channels ka istemal kar sakte ho or apni site ki earnings performance reports alag alag ways se check kar sakte ho
Agar aapko ab bhi custom and URLs channels ke bare me koi bat samajh nahi aa rahi ho to aap comment me puch sakte hai
Google AdSense se behtar earning karne ke liye earning track kar report check karna or usi ke anusar ad placement karna jaruri hai
Agar aapko ye post achhi lagi hai or aap humari add palcement wali Google Adsense Ads Ko Optimize Karne Ki Top 15 Effective Tips post read kar sakte ho
I hope aapko ye post pasand aayegi or aapko isme custom and URL channels ki complete information milegi
Agar ha to is post ko other AdSense publisher ke sath share jarur kare

Deepa dear aap SEO ko bilkul bhi follow nahi kar rhae ho
Heading keywords, paragraph sab galat likh rahe ho
Traffic kaise milega
First paragraph me minimum 5-7 lines honi chahiye or 1 ya 2 bar keywords use karna chahiye
post ke last paragraph me bhi yahi hona chahiye
Post ke baki paragrpaph me aapne sirf 2-2 lines use kari hai jo ki galat hai
5-7 line ka paragraph banao
Aapki post me h2 or h3 heading hai nahi aap h5 heading use kar rahe ho jo ki SEO ke liye itni important nahi hai

Support Me India - Internet Ki Jankari Hindi Me!!!
A Indian Hindi Blog for Beginner Bloggers to Learn Something New and Special Everyday
By: Jume deen khan In: Adsense Last Updated: 15/04/2017
Adsense Address Verification Full Guide in Hindi: Google ke according AdSense account ki security ke liye aapka payments receive karne se pahle (PIN) address verification karna jaruri hota hai
Is process me google aapke payment address par Personal Identification Number PIN ki mail post send karta hai
ye Pin code aapko apne AdSense account par address verify option me add kar address verification karna hota hai
Aayiye jante hai iski kuch most important faqs ke bare me jinki har adsnse publisher ko jarurat hoti hai
Blogging ke earning karne ka google AdSense most popular source hai or bahut se blogger mostly AdSense ka istemal karte hai
But new blogger ke liye ye sir dard ki tarah hai kyuki iski services bahut hard hoti hai
Aesi hi process hai PIN address verify karne ki jisme bahut se logo ko problem hoti hai
Aaj main aapko (PIN) address verification ke bare me aapko kuch jaruri bate btane ja raha hu jinki aap sabhi ki jarurat padti hai so aapko iski jankai honi chahiye
Agar aapne abhi tak payment address verify nahi kiya hai to ye post aapke liye bahut jaruri hai
Adsense publisher ko chahiye ki use AdSense ke bare me complelte information ho agar aesa nahi hai to wo AdSense se good earning nahi kar sakta
So please read this post carefully
Main yaha aapko AdSense address verification se related kuch questions and unke answers ke sath aapko AdSense PIN address verification FAQ ke bare me btaunga taki aapko easily samajh aa jaye
Adsense PIN Kab Send Karta Hai?
Answer: Jab aapke AdSense account me balance verification threshold cross kar lega to AdSense team aapka PIN print kar sveral days ke bad aapke payment address par send karegi
India me AdSense verification threshold $10 hai yani jab aapke account ka balance $10 dollar se jyada ho jyada to AdSense aapko pin post send karega
Adsense Ka PIN Aane Me Kitna Time Lagta Hai?
Answer: Ye bahut hi important sawal hai
Actually, jis publisher ko iske bare me pata nahi hota wo google post receive nahi kar pata hai
So aapko dhyan rakhna chahiye ki AdSense ki post aapko send karne ke bad kab milegi
Jab AdSense aapke payment address par pin post mail karta hai to uski date AdSense me show hoti hai
Aapko wo post 2-4 weeks lag sakte hai but ye aapki location par depend karta hai
Agar aap city me hai to isse bhi kam time me post aa sakti hai or aap villager hai to thoda jyada time lag sakta hai
PIN Mail Ka Look Kaisa Hota Hai?
Answer: Mostly jis postsman ko google mail ki jankari nahi hota wo ise seriously nahi leta or aapko dene ki bajaye aapke kisi jankar ya neighbor ko de deta hai or aapko uska pata hi nahi chalta
Iske alawa aapko bhi ye pata hona chahiye ki AdSense aapko kis type ki pin post mail karta hai
Aap AdSense pin mail look apne postman ko pahle hi dikha kar bol de ki is type ki post aaye to sirf mujhe de
Iske liye aap PIN Mailer Example web page par ja kar Outside of Pin Mailer and Inside of Pin Mailer ka look dekh sakte hai
 Humare Pas PIN Verify Karne Ke Liye Kitna Time Hai?
Answer: We all know, pin verify karne ke liye aapke AdSense account me $10 earning honi chahiye but ye matter nahi hai
Actually sawal ye hai ki aapke pas pin verify karne ke liye kitna time hai to main aapko bta du ki aapke AdSense par first pin generate karne ke bad four month se pahle aapko address verication process complete karni hogi
Agar aap first pin generate karne ke 4 mahine tak pin verify nahi karte ho to aapke blog content or YouTube channel aapne jis par bhi ad laga rakhe hai un pages or videos par ads show hone band ho jayenge
Iske bad aapko account re-enable karna hoga ya new AdSense account ke liye apply karna hoga
PIN Milne Ke Bad Kya Kare Use Kaha Enter Kare?
Answer: Jab aap AdSense PIN receive kar lo to usme aapko 6 digit number ka verify code milega wo aapko AdSense account me verify karna hota hai
Iske liye aap AdSense settings me jaye or intructions option me code submit kar verify kare
Adsense PIN Na Milne Par Kya Kare?
Answer: Main samajhta ki kisi wajah se aapko PIN nahi bhi mile
Aese me aap ye check kare ki aapko pin post kyu nahi mili kya aapne AdSense me address sahi fill kiya hai
Aapko pin kyo nahi mili iske kuch main karan main aapko bta deta hu
Find out why your PIN might not arrived yet and how to request new PIN
In sabke or 4 weeks bad agar aapko PIN post na mile to aap fir se last pin generated ate ke 25 to 28 day bad fir se replacement PIN ke liye request kar sakte ho
How to Request a Nw PIN? Naya PIN Kaise Generate Kare?
Answer: Agar aapko kisi wajah se 4 weeks ke bad bhi PIN na mile to aap new replacement PIN ke liyerequest kar sakte ho
Iske liye aap ye step follow kare
New PIN ke liye request karne se pahle pata kar le ki aapka payment address bilkul sahi hai
To request a new PIN:
Is tarah aap apne payment address par new pin send kar sakte ho
Ye PIN aapke first PIN ki duplicate copy hoti hai or is post me wohi 6 digit ka code hoga jo first PIN me tha
Main Kitni Bar PIN Ke Liye Request Kar Sakta Hu?
Answer: Aap sirf AdSense three time yani 3 bar hi PIN ke liye apply kar sakte ho
Har bar ke liye point 7 wali process istemal kar sakte ho
Three PIN Me Same Code Hota Hai Ya Different?
Answer: ye bahut jarui sawal hai
Main aapko btana chahunga ki 3 no PIN post me same verify code hota hai
Agar aapke second and third PIN ke apply karne ke bad first ya second post aapko mil jaye to aap uske code se address verify kar sakte ho
Agar mera Payment Address Wrong Ho to Kya Hoga?
Answer: PIN request karne se pahle apna payment address check kar le agar aapka payment address galat hai to aapko PIN nahi milegi
Aapne galti se wrong address add kar diya hai to aap use change kar sakte ho
Maine AdSense payement address change karne ke bare me already Google Adsense Account Me Payment Address Change Kaise Kare post me details se btaya hua hai
Kya Main Official Identity Document and Domestic Bill Se Address Verify Kar Sakta Hu?
Answer: Iski jarurat tab padti hai jab aap kisi wajah se three time PIN na milne par address verify na kar sako
I understand, aapki location ki wajah se aesa ho sakta hai
Aese me aap apne identity document se payment address verify kar sakte ho
Ye aapki location par depend karta hai, agar aap apne address ka proof official document send karne me saksham (Able) ho to bilkul kar sakte ho
Agar aap iske liye eligible hai to aapke AdSense homepage par intructions ke sath ek notice show hoga jisme official document send karne ki process btayi gayi hogi
Aap is par apna identity document ka screenshot upload kar sakte ho
Main Country Change Karna Chahta Hu Kya mujhe Fir Se Address Verify Karna Hoga?
Answer: Yes, agar aapne previously apna address PIN ke through verify kar diya hai to aapke country change karne ke bad aapko fir se new payment address verify karna hoga
Warna aapko new location par payment nahi milega
IF you enter your PIN incorrectly three times: Please carefully PIN enter kare warna aapke three time incorrectly PIN add karne par aapki site par se ad service off kar di jayegi or aapka AdSense account disable ho jayega
Agar aapne abhi tak AdSense payment address verication nahi kiya hai to aap humari Adsense Par Address (PIN) Verify Kaise Karte Hai post read kar ke address verify kar sakte ho
is article me aapko AdSense payment address verify karne ki step by step complete infoation mil jayegi
I hope aapko ye post pasand aayegi or aapko isme useful and helpful information milegi
Aapko is post me AdSense address (PIN) verification ke bare me complete jankari mili hogi or payment address verification ke bare me ye jaruri bate jan kar aapko PIN verify karne me koi problem nahi hogi
By the way, fir bhi aapka AdSense payment address verification se related koi or question hai to aap comment section me apna sawal puch sakte hai
Aapko ye post really me pasand aayi hai to ise social media par apne friends and other AdSense publisher ke sath sahre jarur kare

Support Me India - Internet Ki Jankari Hindi Me!!!
A Indian Hindi Blog for Beginner Bloggers to Learn Something New and Special Everyday
By: Jume deen khan In: Adsense Last Updated: 15/04/2017
Koi Mere Adsense Ad Code Use Kar Raha Hai Mai Kya Karu? Google AdSense publisher ke liye ye bahut bada sawal hai or bahut kam publishers ko iska solution pata hota hai
Mostly new blogger ko to iske bare me bilkul bhi pata nahi hota
Ye problem tab hoti hai jab koi user aapke blog ka content page source se copy karta hai
Usme aapke AdSense code bhi copy ho jate hai or wo jaise hi apni site me content paste karta hai uski site me aapke AdSense ad show hone lag jate hai
Iski wajah se aapki AdSense revenue kam ho sakti hai
Agar aapke AdSense account me aesi warning show huyi hai to is post me aapko isko solve karne ki full information mil jayegi
Hello AdSense publisher, Agar aapko AdSense me kisi or site par aapke AdSense  ad code istemal hone ki warning mili hai or aapko AdSense my site >> site management me aesi site ka link mila hai jo aapki website nahi hai to ye post specially aapke liye hi hai
Is post me main aapko apne AdSense ad code ko kisi or ke upyog karne par bad effect se bachne ka tarika btaunga
Agar koi aapki AdSense ad code istemal karta hai to aapki AdSense revenue lost ho sakti hai
Pahle iska koi solution nahi tha but ab google ne iska simple solution nikal liya hai
Ab koi bhi aapke ad code use karega to aapko isse koi problem nahi hogi or na hi aapki AdSense earning par koi fark padega
So aao jante hai ki kaise hum apne AdSense ad code ko dusri site ya blog me use hone par uske bad effect se bacha ja sakta hai
Aapko iske liye jyada kuch nahi karna hai bas AdSense account me ek choti si simple setting karni hai
Uske bad aapke ad code ko kisi bhi website par istemal karne par aapke AdSense account me koi fark nahi padega
Google AdSense me is settings ko enable karne ke bad jab koi aapke ad code use karega to uske blog par to ad show honge but isse uski koi earning nahi hogi
Uski site par hone wale ad clicks and impressions aapke AdSense account me performance report m shonw honge but aapki bhi koi earning nahi hogi
You may see this alert warning on your AdSense homepage:
“In the past 7 days, your ad code has appeared a significant number of times on sites you don’t own
To avoid lost revenue, make sure to add these sites to your verified sites list in Site Management
Yani aapke ad code kisi or site par use hone me aapki ya uski kisi ki income nahi hogi or ad par clicks hone par earning google ke pas hi rahegi
Agar aap ye setting enable nahi karte hai to aapki AdSense revenue kam ho sakti hai or aapke AdSense account par iske bad effect pad sakte hai
Aesi website jo aapki apni site nahi hai par google AdSense ad code istemal karna AdSense policy ka violation hota hai
Aesi site se cambat karne ke liye aapko apne AdSense account me total 2 settings karni hogi
Inke liye aap ye step follow kare
First sign in Your Adsense Account
Sabse pahle aapko apni un sabhi sites ko AdSense me verify karna hai jin par aap AdSense ad istemal karte ho
Iske liye aap first adsense
com par jaye or apni gmail ID se log in kare
Own sites ko verify karne ke bad aapko second Site Authorization ki setting karni hai
Site authorization google AdSense ka ek optional feature hai jo aapki verify sites ko identify karta hai or only unhi sites par google ad code istemal karne ki permission deta hai
I mean site authorization optional feature sirf aapki verify sites par google AdSense ads show karna permitted allow karta hai
Ek bar aapke sites verify karne or site authorization feature ko turn on karne ke bad aapke ad unverified sites par show to honge or clicks or impressions bhi aapke account ki performance report me count honge but isse aapki koi earning nahi hogi
Aapke settings complete set karne ke bad ise proper work karne me 48 hours tak lag sakte hai
Iske bad AdSense policy own sites ke alawa another other sites par ad show karne ki policy ka violation nahi hoga
Jo website ya blog owner aapke ad code use karenge unki sites or blog ke links aapke AdSense site management me show honge
Sath hi in site ke URLs performance report me bh ishow honge but ab aapke AdSense account par inka koi bad effect nahi padega
Yani aapke AdSense account me data report abhi bhi record hogi but ab aapka AdSense account secure hai
Ab aapke AdSense ad code kisi or site par use hone par bhi aapko koi problem nahi hogi
Agar aapko ye post pasand aaye to ye post bhi padhe Mobile Users Ke Liye Adsense Ad Placement Optimize Kaise Kare
Agar aapko AdSense ad code ko safe rakhne ki or AdSense policy violation se bachne ki ye jankari achhi lage to ise other AdSense publisher ke sath share jarur kare
Our 35,300+ readers have already subscribed to this blog's newsletter

If you like his articles then you can share this blog on social media with your friends

Second hu jitni jyada quality blog par comment karenge hume utna quality backlinks milega
Kisi blog ko mention karne se use aapki site se backlink milta hai
Comments mostly nofollow hoti hai or bekar ki comment karne se koi backlink nahi milta
Content ke bare me comment karnege to hi backlink milega
Comments se backlinks banane hai to post ke bare me jarur likho reader or site admin aesi comments ko pasand karte hai or aapke link par click karte hai
Kisi blog par content achha hai to use mention karo bhale hi uski alexa rank better na ho
