Support Me India - Internet Ki Jankari Hindi Me!!!
A Indian Hindi Blog for Beginner Bloggers to Learn Something New and Special Everyday
By: Jume deen khan In: Adsense, Make Money Online Last Updated: 15/04/2017
Har saal mobile users badh rahe hai or pahle se jyada people android smartphone ka istemal kar rahe hai
Log ab apne phone device me hi internet browser user karte hai or generally mobile par hi we pages read karte hai
Examples, 2013 me only 135 internet user mobile use karte the btu 2016 me ye dugne se bhi jyada 38% ho gaya hai
Mobile marketing ki increasing dekhte huye lagta hai ki jaldi hi next couple 50% internet users android device ka istemal karenge
Mobile marketing itna badh gaya hai ki google search engine ke sath bak isabhi online marketer ab desktop se jyada mobile version par focus karne lag gaye hai
ISka man reason hai aaj android mobile par application ki help se kuch bhi karna possible hona
So jin bloggers ki website and blog par mobile traffic jyada hai unke liye ye post most important hai
Ab wo din dur nahi jab world me 50% bhi jyada mobile users honge so main aapko suggest karunga ki aap iski pahle se taiyary shuru kar de
Kisi bhi web owner ke liye site se hone wali earning value rakhti hai or unka earning source mostly advertisement hi hota hai
Like google AdSense ke tarah blogger affiliate marketing and some other method se blog par income karte hai
Today, aaj hum yaha mobile users ke liye AdSense ad placement optimize karne ke bare me bat karenge taki future me aapko google AdSense advertising se behtar performance mil sake or aap good earning kar sako
I hope aapki site par bhi desktop ki tulna me mobile traffick jyada hoga
So ye time hai mobile traffic ke liye AdSense ads ka right placemnet karne ka jisme ye article aapki help karega
Although, google AdSense ne pahle se hi responsive ads and some other mobile ad units ke feature diye huye hai fir bhi hum isse 100% AdSense ko mobile friendly nahi bana sakte
Iske liye hume AdSense use karne ki basic information ki jarurat hogi
But bahut sare aese ways hai jinse hum AdSense ad ko correctly optimize kar sakte hai
Main Adsense Optimization ke bare me pahle bhi kei articles write kar chuka hu
Aap iske liye humari AdSense se realted baki posts bhi read kar sakte hai
5 tips for optimize AdSense ad placement for mobile users:
By the way, yaha btaya gaya tarika un sabhi se easy or jyada effective hai jisse aapko mobile users se jyada benefits milega
Main AdSense ad ka manual optimization kar or responsive size dono ko pane blog par test kar chuka hu
Results me optimize ad ki performance auto responsive ad unit se kafi jyada better thi
Google ne bhi ye mana hai ki responsive ad har time or har device me better work nahi karte
Isiliye AdSense ad placement ko optimize karna or jyada jaruri ho jata hai
Yes, main already ye kar chuka hu or ad placement optimization ke dama par hi meri AdSense earning 60% increase huyi hai or aaj main AdSense se good earnings kar raha hu
Top 5 Adsense Ad Placement Optimize Formulas for Mobile Traffic:
Generally, AdSense publisher ye sochte hai ki banner ads only desktop version me hi better work karta hai
But ye 100% sahi nahi hai
Maine ye test kiya hai ki mobile me top par banner ad sabse jyada effective hota hai
Kisi bhi site par header ya web pages ke top me mobile banner ads like 320×100 ad unit se jyada money earn ki ja sakti hai kyuki is par clicks or CPC dono jyada hoti hai
Aap wbesite ke mobile version me header or post title ke bad ya pahle banner ad use kar sakte ho
Header me 320×100 or page title ke bad 300×250 size ka ad unit best hota hai
Google AdSense policy ke anusar bhi ye btaya gaya hai ki site par top me mobile banner ad lagana better hai
Mera bhi ye personal experience hai ki site par top parbaki ad unit se jyada banner ad better hota hai
All websites or blog ke liye sidebar important hota hai
But sirf desktop ke liye mobile version me site sidebar itna effective nahi hota
Actually, mobile me web pages ko open karne apr sitebar bottom me sabse last me show hota hai or only 20% visitors hi sidebar tak scroll kar pate hai
Isi reason ki wajah se mobile traffic se sidebar ads par bahut hi kam clicks milte hai
I know sidebar ads ki CPC high hoti hai
but jis place par ads par clicks kam ho or impressions bahut jyada ho usse humari site par High Paying Ads show hone kam ho jate hai
Mostly worldpress theme and blogspot template me webpages par sidebar ko hide karne kea feature hota hai
Butagar aapki site par ye feature nahi hai to aap easily CSS coding ki help se sidebar ko hide / show kar sakte ho
Halanki apa ye apni marzi se kar sakte ho but mera suggestion hai ki site sidebar ko only posts and pages par hide karna hai baki homepage frontpage, archives, category and tags par sidebar show karna hai
Because in sabhi web page par content length short hoti hai only long posts par content length jyada hoti hai jisse user ko scroll karne me proble hoti hai
Mobile traffic ke liye ye formula 100% effective sabit hoga aap try kar sakte hai
Aap ne bahut se AdSense ad placement articles me padha hoga ki site web page par top, middle or bottom me ad unit place karna better hota hai
maine bhi apne old articles me iske bare me btaya hua hai
Aaj main aapko btaunga ki mobile version me post content ke top, middle and bottom me kis size ke ad unit istemal karta better hai
Main yaha aapko un ad groups ke bare me bta raha hu jinse maine apni site par good revenue generate ki hai
Humare par post content me AdSense ad placement karne ke liye 3 best options hote hai
Lagbhag har AdSense placement expert yahi btate hai
But main aapko suggest karunga ki iske sath aap ye 2 tips or follow kare
I know ye mere liye best work karta hai to dusre ke liye karega ya nahi but aap try jarur kar sakte hai
Mera kahna ka matlab ye nahi hai ki top, middle or bottom me ad unit better work nahi karte hai
Yakinan karte hai but inke alawa post content me first and last me 2 and 3 paragraph se pahle or bad me ad unit place karne se bhi better results milta hai
Mobile traffic ke liye AdSense ad placement optimize karne ke bare me sun kar aapke man me ye sawal jarur aaya hoga ki mobile users ke liye kis sieze ke ad units better hote hai or kis place par kis site ka ad istemal karna chahiye
Mobile users ke liye sabse better responsive ad unita hota hai kyuki ye all device screen ke anusar fit show hota hai
Halanki ye all time better work nahi karta but baki ad units ki compare me ye better hai
Iske alawa aap ye ad unit istemal kar sakte ho
Main inme se responsive, 300×250 and 320×100 size ke ad unit istemal karta hu jinse mujhe baki sabhi un unit se better results mile hai
Sabse important responsive ad unit hai
Your Experience: Sirf dusro ki btayi tips and tricks par kaam karne se hum unke jitna ya unse kam hi kar sakte ho
Unse aage niklne or unse better karne ke liye hume khud ke idea, plans banane honge
Yakinan aap aesa kar sakte ho but aapko starting karne ki jarurat hai
Main iske kuch point aapko bta deta hu
newbie AdSense publisher ko ad placement ke bare me jyada ya full information nahi hoti or wo custom channel jaise AdSense ke important features ke bare me anhi jante
Jiski wajah se wo AdSense se good earning nahi kar pate hai
Sabse badi mistake AdSense ad units ki performance reports check nahi karna
Hame ye pata hona chahiye ki humari site par kis ad unit se kitni earning ho rahi hai or wo kaisa performance kar raha hai
Bina iski jankari ke koi bhi AdSense publisher achhi kamai nahi kar sakta
Jis ad unit se better result na mile use remove karke kahi or place par add karke try karo or jaha aapko clicks jyada or CPC good mile waha par ad place kare
Try Some Other Methos: Yaha par main un jaruri matters ko mention karunga jo har ek AdSense publisher ke liye hai
Jis tarah ek illiterate person book ka sahi istemal nahi kar sakta
Same usi tarah google AdSense ke bare me knowledge na rakhne wala kabhi bhi AdSense ka sahi istemal nahi kar sakta or AdSense se good revenue earn nahi kar saktai
Aapko AdSense placement policy, Adsense terms & conditions ke bare me full nahi to basic information to honi hi chahiye
Aapko AdSense se lako me kamayi karni hai to aapko ye karna hi hoga
Aap jitna AdSense ke bare me sikhoge utna hi apni AdSense earnings ko incease kar sakoge
Maine upar btayi mobile traffic ke liye in ad placement optimization tips and strategies ko follow kiya
Jiske bad meri AdSense revenue 70% tak increase huyi
Aap bhi mobile users ke liye in tricks ko follow karke apni AdSense income ko badha sakte ho
In formolas se aap apni site par monthly or yearly AdSense earnings ko $500, $700, $1000 to $5000 easily boost kar sakte ho

bhai mere blog ki mobile speed test karne par
“Your page has 1 blocking script resources and 4 blocking CSS resources
This causes a delay in rendering your page
Approximately 66% of the above-the-fold content on your page could be rendered without waiting for the following resources to load
Try to defer or asynchronously load blocking resources, or inline the critical portions of those resources directly in the HTML
” ise kaise solv kare

Support Me India - Internet Ki Jankari Hindi Me!!!
A Indian Hindi Blog for Beginner Bloggers to Learn Something New and Special Everyday
By: Jume deen khan In: Adsense, Make Money Online Last Updated: 15/04/2017
Google AdSense cost per click par kaam karta hai or AdSense CPC up down hoti rahti hai jiski wajah se hum humesha fix income nahi kar sakte but kuch big reasons main karan ki wajah se AdSense advertisement se low earnings hoti hai or CPC $0
Aaj main aapko AdSense se low earning hone ke kuch bade karan bta raha hu
Aap in issue ko fix karke AdSense CPC, RPM and CTR boost kar sakte ho or apni site par Adsense Revenue Increase kar sakte ho
Bahut se blogger AdSense low earnings ki wajah se pareshan hai or bahut se blogger good earning na hone ke karan blogging ko alwida kah chuke hai
Actually, iski sabse badi wajah hoti hai humare google AdSense ke bare me sahi jankari nahi hona or jiske bare me hume basic information tak nahi hogi us field me humara fail hona fix hai
Main kafi bloggers ka review kar chuka hu mostly blogger AdSense se achhi earning nahi kar pa rahe hai
Isi matter ko le kar aaj main ye post likh raha hu or aap sabhi ko kuch aesi waja hbta raha hu jiske karan aap AdSense achhi kamayi nahi kar pa rahe hai
Mujhe ummid hai isse aapki AdSense low earnings wali problem solve ho jayegi
Yahaa par btaye gaye reasons ko aap apni mistake ki nazar se bhi dek hsakte hai
Aapko ye galtiya fix karni hai tabhi aap google AdSense se achhi earning kar paoge
Main already AdSense earning increase karne ke bare me articles likh chuka hu aap ek bar humare AdSense category wale dusre articles bhi jarur padh le
Maine kei bar dekha hai ki new AdSense publisher ko earning karne ki jaldi lagi rahti hai or jaise hi uska AdSense approved ho jata hai wo sabkuch chord kar sirf AdSense se kamayi karne ke bare me sochna shuru kar deta hai
Aesa maine bahut se blogger ke sath dekha hai
Ye ek bahut badi galti hai or kisi bhi blogger ke blogging career ka the end kar sakti hai
Jab aapke pas traffic hi nahi hai to aapke ads par click kaise honge
Lagbhag 5,000 daily traffic tak AdSense se good earnings ke sapne mat dekho
5000 traffic hone ke bad hi aap AdSense se achhi earning kar sakte ho
So isse pahle aapko sirf or sirf content likhne or blog ki traffic badhane par dhyan dena hai
Jab aapke blog par high traffic hoga to aapki click through rate CTR bhi better hogi
Average CTR to btana mushkil hai but 5 thousand traffic hone par AdSense CTR 1
5 to 3% tak ho sakti hai
Iska matlab aapko pahle kuch traffic ki jarurat hai
Agar aapke aps achhe visitors hai to hi aap AdSense se enough money earn kar sakte ho
Agar aapko low traffic par AdSense se jyada earning karni hai to aap humari Low Traffic Par Google Adsense Se Adhik Earnings Kaise Kare post check kare
I hope isme btaye gaye tariko se aapki problem solve ho jayegi
But principal rule yahi hai ki AdSense low earnings ki problem ko 100% jad se khatm karne ke liye aapki site par pryapt traffic hona jaruri hai
Google AdSense low earnings ka ye bhi ek bada reason ho sakta hai
Aap jis niche par blogging karte ho ho sakta hai us parAdSense kam pay karta ho
Jab aap low paying niche par content write karoge to simple hai aapke content par low paying ads show honge jinki CPC bahut hi kam hoti hai
Examples, Game ek aesa niche hai jis par AdSense bahut kam pay karta hai or per click par sirf $0
Halanki kuch web based games par ye high ho sakti hai but mostly ye niche low paying hi hota hai
Gaming site par AdSense se good income karna bahut mushkil kaam hai
Agar aap ek game blog run karte hai to aapko tension lene ki jarurat nahi hai
Aap amazon, flipkart jaise kuch Affiliate Marketing Program join kar apni low earnings ki problem ko solve kar sakte hai
Affiliate program bhi google AdSense ki tarah blogging se earning karne ka best source hai
Agar aap nahi jante ki blog par affiliate program se kamai kaise ki jati hai or aap is bare me guide chahate hai to aap humari affilaite marketing se related posts read akr sakte hai
Maine first me hi btaya tha ki AdSense pay per click par work karta hai or har site ya content par click through rate ke anusar ads show karta hai
Agar aapki site par High Paying Ads Show nahi hote hai to ye bhi low earnings ka main reason ho sakta hai
In simple words, sidhe shabdo me kahu to jab aapki site par show hone wale ads par koi click nahi karta to aapki click through rate down ho jati hai or fir google aapki site apr high paying ads show karne ki jagah low paying advertisement show karne lag jata hai
Yani AdSense se better earning ke liye aapki site par CTR ka better hoa jaruri hai
Iske liye aapko kuch jaruri bato ka khyal rakhna hoga
Also read – Google Adsense Me CTR Kya Hai, Click through Rate Increase Kaise Kare
Follow below steps and solve your low earnings problem:
Adsense CTR increase karne ke liye aap per page 2 ya 3 ad unit se jayda use na kare or jis place par aapko kam clicks mi lrahe hai waah se ad ko remove karke right palce apr ad lagaye
Adsense ad placementsahi se kare or best ad size ke ad unit istemal kare
Mostly ye ad sizes best hote hai
Kabhi bhi ek se jayda 300×600 ya koi or large size ka ads istemal kare or ho sake to large ad istemal karne se bache kyuki ye load hone me jyada time leta hai
Halanki main is bare me already kei article likh chuak hu so mujhe is bare me details se btane ki jarurat nahi hai
Aap AdSense placement ki full informationk el iye ye content read akr sakte ho
Agar aapko AdSense low earnings problem ko solve karna hai to aapko AdSense ads kis place par lagana better hota hai, kis size ke ad se achhi performance milti hai, per page kitne ad lagana better hai and AdSense policy violation ki jankari hona jaruri hai
Google AdSense default style generally good work karti hai but ise apni site ke design ke anusar change akr liya jaye to hume better results mil sakte hai
Some newbie AdSense publisher ki ye 2 sabse badi galti hoti hai
Maine bahut se blogger ko dkeha hai jab unhe ads style option ka pata nahi hota to wo simple and default ad style istemal karte hai magar jaise hi unhe iske bare me thodi bahut jankari milti hai ow bina kuch soche ad ko itna design kar dete hai ki wo unke blog content me hi match ho sakta hai
Actaully ye dono tarike galat hai
Google chahata hai ki user ad ko ad samajh kar hi click kare so ad style ko itna customize karo ki wo aapke content se match na ho or user ko aasani se pata lag sake ki ad kya hai or content kya hai
Iske alawa bhi ads style feature ko istemal karne ki kuch or bhi tips hai jinhe aap follow kar sakte ho
Customize Your Ad unit Styles:
Ads unit par border ka istemal na kare, h osake to URL color black hi rakhe, ad link ka color aap apne cotent link se match kar sakte ho, mostly image / text ad unit ka hi istemal kare, content or ad unit me 10px t0 20px ka space hona chahiye taki user ko content and ads me difference dikhayi de or wo ad ko ad man kar hi us par click kare
ye google AdSense low earnings ka sabse bada reason hai or lagbhag 70% new publisher se ye mistake hoti hai
Bahut se blogger ko kafi time se low earnings ki problem hoti hai but mostly wo ye kabhi check nahi karte ki unk isite par AdSense ads proper work kar rahe hai ya nahi
Actually, aapke blog ki template ya aapke wrong ad placement ki wajah se ad unit sahi se work nahi kar pata
Aapko ye check karna hoga pata karna hoga ki aapki site par sabhi ad unit proper correctly work kar rahe hai
Mostly aapko ye problem ho sakti hai
Sabse badi problem hai ads ka sabhi devices me proper work nahi karna
Aapko ye achhe se check kar lena chahiye ki aapki site par AdSense ads computer, laptop, tablet, mobile and other all devices me sahi se open hote hai ya nahi
Iske liye aap apni site ko different device me open karke dekh sakte hai
Advance guidelines: Aapke is sawal ka jawab bhi hai mere pas iske liye aap google analytics ka istemal kare jo aapko btayega ki aapke lyie kis size ka ad better rahega
Sabse pahle aap google AdSense ko google analytics se connect kare
Uske bad google analytics ko open kare or ye step follow kare
Go to analytics >> Audience >> overview and select Screen Resolution and see results: Yaha par aapke samne wo sabhi screen sizes show honge jinme aapki site open ki jati hai
Example ke liye aap ye screenshot dekh sakte hai
Google analytics ki is report se aap easily pata kar sakte hai ki aapki site sabse jayda kis size ki secreen wale device me open hoti hai
Ab aapko ye btane ki jarurat nahi hai ki aapko kis size ka ads istemal karna chahiye
Mere hisab se itna to har koi samajh sakta hai ki use us  size ke hisab se ad lagane chahiye jis size ki screen par site ko jyada open kiya jata hai
Iske liye aap ad unit ko target kare or sabhi ad unit ki performance check karte rahe ki sabhi ad unit proper work kar rahe hai ya nahi
Iske liye aap custom channel ur URL channel ka istemal akr sakte hai
Finally, low AdSense earnings ke ye five big reasons hai jinki wajah se aapko low earnings ki problem ho rahi hai
I sure agar aap in problems ko solve kar longe to 100% aapki AdSense revenue increase hogi
Ye article aapko pasand aaye to aap humari AdSense se realted or bhi post check kare achhi jankari milegi

Support Me India - Internet Ki Jankari Hindi Me!!!
A Indian Hindi Blog for Beginner Bloggers to Learn Something New and Special Everyday
By: Jume deen khan In: Adsense, Make Money Online Last Updated: 15/04/2017
Bounce rate ka matlab hota hai user ke aapki site par ek hi page par visit karke site ko leave kar jana
 Google analytics sabse better tarike se Bounce Rate ko define karta hai
Agar aapki bounce rate bahut adhik high hai to iska matlab hai aapki website or blog par audience completly AdSense ads anhi dekh pa rahe hai
Aayiye aaj main aapko high bounce rate par google AdSense se adhik paise kamane ke bare me kuch effective tips bta deta hu
Lagbhag har website owner and blogger apni site ki bounce rate kam karne ki koshish karta hai but bahut hi kam log isme success hote hai or high bounce rate ka matlab hai ki aap AdSense earning ka bahut bada part gawa rah hai
Isme sabse important bat main aapko bta du ki experts ke lakh koshish ke bavjud analytics research sabse important matter tha
Google analytics researching se bounce rate improve karne me jitni help mili utni kisi bhi or way se nahi mili
So agar aapko analytics ko avoid kar rahe hai to aapko abhi se analytics ka istemal karna shuru kar dena chahiye
Ye aapke best friend ki tarah site ko best banane me aapki help karta hai
We also share many AdSense earning increasing tips:
By the way, aapki site par bounce rate bahut jyada hai to to bhi aap google AdSense se adhik paise kama sakte hai
I sure yaha btayi gayi tips aapke liye helpful sabit hogi
Aap high bounce rate hone par bhi AdSense se achhi earning kar sakte ho
Keep Column With Between 700 to 800 Pixels:
Bahut se big blogger ne apni site ki width par kaam nahi kiya hai fir newbie blogger ka to sawal hi nahi uthta
Actually, AdSense experts ke anusar sidebar me ads apr jyada clicks nahi milte hai
Iski main wajah mobile user ka jyada hona hai
Mobile me user content padhne ke bad other content par chale jate hai ya site leave kar dete hai
Mushkil se 30% audience hi sidebar tak pahuch pate hai
Iska matter sidebar se jyada layout column important hai
Ab sawal ye banta hai ki layout column kis size ka hoan chahiye or AdSense ads se better performance pane ke liye kitne px ka width rakhna behtar hoga
Adsense expert ke anusar 700 and 800 pixel ke bich ka width size AdSense ads ke liye jyada effective hota hai
Ek servey ke anusar 700 to 800 pixel width me 80% to 90% better ads show hote hai is wajah se clicks bhi jyada milte hai
Do Not Use Very Long Paragraph:
Agar aap long paragraph ka istemal karte ho to main aapko bta du ki very long paragraph dekh kar user bahut jaldi back button ki or bhagte hai
Isse high bounce rate hoti hai
Mostly blogger desktop and laptop par writing karte hai or wo 12 to 15 sentence paragraph ka istemal karte hai
Actually ye better nahi hota or jinki site par mobile user jyada hai unke liye to bilkul bhi nahi
Aap soch sakte ho 15 sentnce ka paragraph mobile me kitna long hoga ya fir aap mobile me apna article open karke dekh sakte ho
Neil patel jo ki ek top blogger hai or SEO master hai
Apne blog par 5 to 7 sentence paragraph likhte hai
Google AdSense ke liye bhi maximum 7 sentence paragraph likhna better hota hai
Long paragraph se mobile ki screen me wo bahut hi jyada or boring ho jata hai
But iska matlab ye nahi hai ki aap 2 – 2 line ke paragraph hi bana dalo
5 – 7 sentence me paragraph hona chahiye
Isse aapko fayda ye hoga ki agar koi user content nahi bhi apdhega to check karne ke liye end tak scroll jarur karenga
Use Header and Sub headers Ads:
Mujhe blogging me kafi time ho gaya hai or kafi time se google AdSense ka istemal karta hu
Is bich maine paya hai ki humar isite par only 40% hi reader hote hai baki 60% scanners hote hai wo sirf check karne ke liye hi humari site ko open karte hai or khas jaruri jankari milne par hi content read karte hai
Important matter ye hai ki un 60% visitors ko reader kaise banaya jaye
Jis site par bounce rate bahut high hai us par scanner 60% se jyada bhi ho sakte hai
But mere pas ek or tarika bhi hai jisse aap scanner se bhi AdSense ads se earning kar sakte ho
Kisi bhi blog ke liye header and sub header bahtu jaruri hote hai
Jab bhi koi user aapki site ko open karta hai to wo sabse pahle site ke header and logo ko jarur dekhta hai
Aese me aap header me AdSense ads istemal karo to achha hoga
Ya fir aap home page par ad nahi lagana chahate to aap header me aesa effective banner add karo jis par koi bhi reader dekhte hi click kare
Aap isme apne blog ki kisi superhit post ka link add kar sakte ho
Example ke liye aap “10 Tips Required for Everyone”
Agar aap High Bounce Rate wale in 3 tariko se agree nahi ho or bounce rate kam kare ke AdSense earning increase karna chahate ho to aap humari ye post read kare
Isme aapko bounce rate kam karne ki puri details milegi
Is tarah se aap high bounce rate par bhi google AdSense se achhi earning kar sakte ho
Aapki site par bounce rate 30% ke something honji chahiye
Agar isse kam hai to wakai aap kamal ho or agar isse jyada hai to aapko is bare me sochne ke sath kaam karna shuru kar dena chahiye or kam karne ki koshish karni chahiye

Support Me India - Internet Ki Jankari Hindi Me!!!
A Indian Hindi Blog for Beginner Bloggers to Learn Something New and Special Everyday
By: Jume deen khan In: Adsense, Make Money Online Last Updated: 15/04/2017
Blogging google AdSense ke sath paise kamane ka sabse best or sabse aasan tarika hai
Bahut sare blogger galat nahi ho sakte jo baki sabhi networking ko chord kar AdSense ka istemal karte hai
But AdSense se good earning karna itna easy nahi hai
Bahut se log isme fail ho jate hai or 0% earnings ki wajah se blogging chord dete hai
Aaj main aapko blogging karke google AdSense se paise kamane ka sahi tarika bta raha hu
Jise follow kar ke hi aap AdSense se achhi kamai kar sakte ho
Main 1 year se google AdSense se good earning kar raha hu or time to time apna experience readers ke sath share karta rahta hu taki baki sabhi bhi achha work karke achhi khashi earning kar sake
Actually, google AdSense ek aesi advertising company hai jo pay per click par kaam karti hai or isse jyada kamai karna thoda mushkil hai
Blogging ke throw AdSense se earning karna ek better option hai but aap kisi bhi tarah ki blogging karke AdSense se earning nahi kar sakte
Adsense se good earning ke liye aapko kuch steps follow karenge honge
Sabse important bat aapke blog par jitna jayda organic traffic hoga AdSense se apaki utni hi jyada earning hogi
com par WordPress par easily bana sakte ho (Agar aapke pas koi blog nahi hai to aap iske bare me huamre blog ki blogging se related post padh kar next 5 minute me new blog bana sakte ho
) but problem ye hai ki blog par kis type ke or kis tara hse content dale jaye jo aap AdSense se achh iearning kar sako
Mujhe blogging me 1 year se jyada time h ogaya hai or maine AdSense se good earning karne ki kuch bate note ki hai
Jo aapke sath share kar raha hu i sure ye kisi bhi blogger ke liye bahut jaruri hai or koi bh inhe follow kar ke AdSense se good earnings kar sakta hai,
Without keywords researching ke AdSense se achhi income karna bahut hi mushkil hoga kyuki AdSense pay per click par work karta hai or keyword ke aadhar par advertisement show karta hai
Agar aap apni post me high CPC keywords use nahi karoge to aapki AdSense earning idea se kam hogi
Aapko ek bat bta du ki achhe achhe blogger keyword research karne me fail ho jate hai iska ek important reason hai wrong keyword research tools ka istemal karna
So ise chota issue samajh kar ignore na kare or achhe se samajhne ki koshish kare
Compelling Post Titles or Content:
Hum har type ki blogging karke AdSense se achhie earning nahi katr sakte
Iske liye hume compelling content likhna chahiye
Mostly, aesa content likhna jise jyada se jyada users ki help ho or aapki post me 4000 words ka uniqu content ho
( Ye faq google ke ek blog se liya gaya hai
Actually, post title aapki post ke pure content se jyada important hota hai
I mean aapki post ke 50000 words se 5-10 words ka title jyada value rakhta hai
So perfect title formulas try kare ro behtar se behtar title use kare
Achha title or achhi headlines se aapko jyada se jyada search traffic milega
In my 1 year expereince, mai ye bat dawe se kah sakta hu ki engagging content user engagement ke liye jyada better hota hai
Google engagging content ko like karta hai or AdSense se bhi aese content par better results milte hai
Examples, agar visitors aapke content ko kuch hi seconds padh kar leave kar jayega to AdSense ads ke load hone se pahle hi wo page off kar dega
Second agar koi user 5 minutes tak aapka content read karta hai to tab tak sare ads complete open ho jayege or user unme interest le kar click karega
So write absolute engagement content
Getting High Qualities Links:
Google AdSense se good earning karne ka ye sabse better point hai
Low quality links building karne me apna time west mat karo
Low quality directory me site ko submit kat karo
Isse aapko koi fayda nah ihone wala or ulta aapki site ki search rank discrease hogi
Ek single high quality link 10 low quality link se jyada powerful hota hai or wo akela aapki ek single post ki ranking increase kar sakta hai
Next 90 day tak wo aapki post par double traffic kar sakta hai fir kyu aap bekar ke links add kar ke site ki rank discrease karte ho
Ye 4 aese points hai jinke bina aap AdSense se earning to kar sakte ho but kabhi bhi better nahi kar sakte
Google AdSense se good earning karne ke liye aapko in 4 point ko follow karne ki jarurat hogi
By the way, maine AdSense earnings increase karne ke or bhi kei post likhi hai
Agar aapko ye post pasand aaye to aap humari baki post jarur check kare
Finally, blogging aap kisi bhi topic par kar sakte ho but man marzi se likhe gaye content se aap AdSense ke sath achhi kamai kar loge aesa sochna bikul galat hai
Adsense par aap without above step follow kiye kamai nahi kar sakte
Blogging par google AdSense se good earning karne ki ye tips follow karna jaruri hai
Agar aapko ye post pasand aaye to ise social media apr other blogger ke sath share jarur kare

If you like his articles then you can share this blog on social media with your friends

aur haa wo dono blog ke post mere dware hi likhe honge

Jume deen khan says

सर मेरा एडसेंस अप्रूव्ड हो चुका मैं अपनी साइट पर एडसेंस एड लगा रहा हूँ लेकिन वो सो नहीं हो रहा है और कुछ समय बाद अपने आप हाइड हो जा रहा है सर इसके लिए मुझे क्या करना चाहिए
ताकि मेरी एडसेंस से कमाई हो सके
Jume deen khan says
aap thoda wait karo adsense ke aapki site ka review complete hone ke bad ad show hone lag jayenge
अमित जैन 'मौलिक' says
बहुत ही शानदार जानकारी देता पोस्ट। आप बहुत ही नायाब काम कर रहें हैं। आभार आपका। भाई मेरी कुछ Query थीं-
1) कम से कम कितनी शब्द का पोस्ट एडसेन्स के लिए आवश्यक होता है। मैं कवितायें लिखता हूँ और poem बहुत लंबी पसंद नहीं की जातीं इसलिए कुछ previous पोस्ट में शब्द 200 के आसपास हैं। (हालाँकि अब मैंने उनको क्लब करना शुरू कर दिया है) तो क्या एडसेन्स  approval में दिक्कत जायेगी क्या ?
2) क्या मैं 2-3 old पोस्ट को एक साथ क्लब कर सकता हूँ उनकी seo में कोई दिक्कत तो नहीं आएगी।
3) क्या एक ही पोस्ट को हिंदी भाषा और हिंगलिश भाषा में एकसाथ लिखा जा सकता है, means पहले हिंदी में लिख दिया फिर नीचे उसी content को same पोस्ट में ही हिंगलिश में। एडसेंस policy का कोई violence तो नहीं होगा। मेरा ऐसा करने का इंटेंशन केवल पोस्ट कंटेंट के वर्ड्स बढ़ाने का ही है और शायद seo में keywards benifit मिल जाये।
कृपया मार्गदर्शन दें। आपकी मेहरबानी होगी

Support Me India - Internet Ki Jankari Hindi Me!!!
A Indian Hindi Blog for Beginner Bloggers to Learn Something New and Special Everyday
By: Jume deen khan In: Adsense, Make Money Online Last Updated: 29/04/2017
Google ne last year Matched Content feature launch kiya tha
Jisse aap apni site ke relevant content ka promotion kar User Engagement increase kar sakte ho
Sath hi isse aapki site ka traffic grow hone me bhi help milti hai
Today, ab aap matched content me alongside recommended content ads enable karke AdSense revenue increase kar sakte ho
Hum AdSense matched content se apni site ka promotion to kar hi sakte hai but kya hum isse paise bhi kama sakte hai? ye swal har ek AdSense user ke dimag me aata hai
But use right answer anhi mil pata hai
Starting me hum matched content se earning nahi kar sakte the but now, ab hum matched ad unit se paise kama sakte hai
Google ne ab isme “allow ads” ka new feature add kar diya hai jisme aapki site ke content se related or aapki site ke look ki tarah hi other sites ki posts show hogi
Adsense publisher My ads >> New ad unit >> matched content >> Ad options me ja kar Monetize with ads option enable kar sakte hai
Main aapko btana chahunga ki matched content ads only multiple pages, unique images and high value traffic wali website or blog par hi allow hote hai
Aapki site par ye feature activate hai ya nahi ye aap site management settings me ja kar dekh sakte ho
Main already Adsense Matched Content Kya Hai or Ise Kaise Use Kar Sakte Hai post me iske bare me details se bta chuka hu
So agar aapki site par abhi tak AdSense matched contents enable nahi hai to aap ye post padhe
Isme aapko matched content ki puri jankari mil jayegi
Ab hum bat karte hai AdSense matched content m ads enable karke revenue increase karne ki to sabse pahle aap adsense
com par jaye or apni gmail id se log in kare
Now you can earn money with matched content:
Ab aapko jo ad unit code mile use apne blog ke sidebar ya post content ke niche add kar de ya fir aap jaha matched content ad show karna chahate ho woha ad code paste kar sakte ho
Example ke liye aap mere matched content me recommended ads dekh sakte ho
Ab jab ki koi user in alongside recommended content ads par click karega to haapki earning hogi
Sabse achi bat in ads ko google ads content units me nahi mana jayega or ye google ad unit limit per page me bhi count nahi honge
Finally, Is tarah se aap matched content me ads enable karke apni AdSense revenue increase kar sakte ho
Agar aap AdSense earning badhane ke dusre tariko ke bare me janna chaahte ho to humari AdSense wali baki post padhe
Main already AdSense earnings boost karne ke bare me bahut post likh chuka hu
I hope is post se aapko AdSense revenue better karne ki achhi jankari mili hogi
So please is article ko social media par apne dosto ke sath share jarur kare

Support Me India - Internet Ki Jankari Hindi Me!!!
A Indian Hindi Blog for Beginner Bloggers to Learn Something New and Special Everyday
By: Jume deen khan In: Adsense, Make Money Online Last Updated: 29/04/2017
I know google AdSense se achhi earnings karne ke liye jyada traffic ki jarurat hoti hai but ye bat bhi sach hai ki hum low traffic par bhi AdSense ads se good earnings kar sakte hai
 Aaj is post me main aapko isi ke bare me bta raha hu ki kaise aap apni site ke kam traffic par bhi AdSense se achhi kamai kar sakte ho
I mean aaj ka topic hai ki low traffic par google AdSense se jyada paise kaise kamaye
Today, main ek bar fir hazir hu aapke liye google AdSense revenue increase karne ki awesome tips le kar
I sure is post ki help se aap apni AdSense earnings jarur badha sakoge or iske liye aapko jyada traffic ki jarurat bhi nahi padegi
Low traffic se hi achhi earning kar sakte ho
Main already Google Adsense Se $100 Per Day Kaise Kamaye or Google Adsense Se 1 Click Par $10 To $50 Kaise Kamaye &#8211; Secret Tips jaisi kei posts me AdSense income ko increase karne ke tarike bta chukha hu
But google ki terms change hoti rahti hai or new ideas bante rahte hai
Actually, pichle kafi time se google mobiel users ko jyada support kar raha hai
Google search engines ne mobile users ke liye specially hindi searching feature enable kar diya hai
So kyu na aapko mobile users ke liye high quality content likhne chahiye
i mean mostly mobile suers ke liye writing karna shuru kijiye or AdSense se low traffic par adhik kamayi karna shuru kar dijiye
Make your Site More Mobile Responsive:
I know aapke pas already mobile friendly blog design hai but agar ise or jyada mobile responsive banaya jaye to kitna acha hoga
I mean aap ye achhe se pata kar le ki aapki site par mobile version me achhe se ads show ho rahe hai yani
Kyuki jab aapke blog par proper ads show hi nahi honge ot good earnings ka to sawal hi nahi uthta
Aapp first blog ko fully mobile responsive bana liye
Uske bad check kijiye ki aapki site par AdSense ads har screen devices par work karta hai
Change Ads Size for Mobile Users:
Jaisa ki maine upar btaya hua hai ki google abhi mobile users ko jyada support kar raha hai
So aapko desktop users ke liye nahi mobile users ke liye ads istemal karne chahiye
Aap ye changes jarur kare
Is sabki jankari ke liye aap humari Google Adsense Ads Ko Optimize Karne Ki Top 15 Effective Tips post padhe
Now, sabse pahle aapko large rectangle 336×280 or medium rectangle ads unit 300×250 ko mobile users ke liye mobile banner ads 320×100 istemal kare or responsive sizes ke ads use kare
Third, Page level ads sue kare jo ki only mobile users ke liye hi banaya gaya hai
Iske bare me adhik jankari ke liye Mobile Site Par Adsense Page Level Ads (Beta) Kaise Use Kare post check kare
Page level ads se e ktarah se aapko new way mil jata ha earnings karne ka kyuki ye aapko pop up ads, innovative ads offer karta  hai
Google automatically page level ads show karta hai
Aap apne users ke mobiel experience se is tarike se achhi earning kar sakte ho
Is sabke alawa aapko ye 3 step or follow karne hai
Blog par post likhne se pahle high CPC keywords ke liye researching kare or keyword confirm hone par iske bare me post likhe
 Go mobile or don’t go at all
Agar aapki site par jyadatar traffic mobile devices se hai to sabkuch bhool jaye or sirf mobile users ke liye kaam kare
 Convert page views into revenue:
Finally, yahi kahunga ki agar aap hindi blogger hai to jitna ho sake mobiel users ko focus kare
Mostly website par 70% traffic mobile users se hi hota hai
So ise avoid karna aapki site par kam traffic or low earnings ki nishani hai
Agar aap chahate ho ki google se aapko easily AdSense ke liye successfully monetization approval mil jaye to google aapko better service provide karega
I mean agar aap google guidelines ko follow karoge to aapko kabhi bhi aesi probem nahi hogi
So ab practice kijiye or low traffic par bhi apni AdSense earnings increase kijiye or apne online business ko boost kijiye
Agar aapko ye post achhi lage t oise social media par share bhi jarur kare
Our 35,300+ readers have already subscribed to this blog's newsletter
If you want to learn more with us then you can join us, Hurry up

If you like his articles then you can share this blog on social media with your friends

Support Me India - Internet Ki Jankari Hindi Me!!!
A Indian Hindi Blog for Beginner Bloggers to Learn Something New and Special Everyday
By: Jume deen khan In: Adsense Last Updated: 02/05/2017
Google Adsense users ko sabse badi problem tab hoti hai jab google unke adsesne account ko invalid click activity ya other reason se disable kar deta hai
Aese me agar aapki earning ka main source google AdSense hai to aap par iska bahut jyada bad effect padega or kuch log to AdSense ke banned karne ke bad blogging tak chord dete hai
Actually, google invalid clicks ki responsivbility bilkul nahi leta hai or kisi bhi third party ke aapke AdSense ads par invalid clicks karne par aapke AdSense account ko disable ya permanently suspend kar sakta hai
But fir bhi 1% changes hote hai ki google aapko AdSense ke liye fir se allow kar de or aapke banned, disable and suspended AdSense account ko fir se authority mil jaye
Iske liye aap google ko invalid click activity ki report send kar sakte hai
Google ne iske liye specially ek form banaya hai
Jis par aap invalid click activity ke bare me google team ko bta sakte ho
Shayad aap lucky rahe to aapka AdSense account fir se enable ho sakta hai
Invalid Clicks Contact Form:
Sabse pahle aap Invalid Clicks Contact Form par jaye or ye step follow karke google team ko invalid clicks ki report send kare
Aapke report send karne ke kuch time bad 2-3 ke something aapko google ko reply mil jayega
Yaad rahe haruri nahi hai ki aapko fir se AdSense use karne ki permission mil jayegi
Halanki google ye helping service provide karta hain but isme bhi aapko positive result milne ke bahut kam changes hai
Google ne contact form me sabse upar clear likha hua hai ki aap sirf hume report send kar sakte ho baki invalid click activity ki responsibility aapki hi hogi
Agar google team ko aapke AdSense account me koi bhi issue milta hai to wo aapko mail reply nahi karenge
By the way, ye post achhi lage to ise social media par share jarur kare

Support Me India - Internet Ki Jankari Hindi Me!!!
A Indian Hindi Blog for Beginner Bloggers to Learn Something New and Special Everyday
By: Jume deen khan In: Adsense Last Updated: 02/05/2017
Google AdSense me invalid click activity ek serious issue hai or iski wajah se bahut se users ka AdSense account block ya permanently disable ho jata hai
Today, main aapko invalid click activity ke bare me kuch jaruri bate btane ja raha hu
Jinse aap pata kar sakte ho ki aapke AdSense ads par invalid clicks ho rahe hai ya nahi or hai ya nahi or agar ho rahe hai to kya kare
Adsense ads par hone wali invalid click activities ke bare me pata lagana or isse apne AdSense account ka secure karna har ek AdSense publisher ke liye important hai
In this post, main aapko invalid click ke bare me pata karne or isse bachne dono ke bare me bta raha hu
But usse pahle hume ye janna jarui hai ki aakhir ye invalid click activity hoti kya hai or kis tarah ke clicks ko AdSense invalid manta hain
Adsense invalid click activity me wo clicks or impressions shamil hote hai jinse advertiser ki costs and publisher ki earnings artificially increase ho jati hai
Isme intentionally fraudulent traffic or accidental clicks ko bhi shamil kiya jata hai
I mean fraud traffic se janbujh kar kiye gaye clicks ki activities ko invalid click activity kahte hai
Isse publisher ke earnings badh jati hai but without benefits ke advertiser ki costs bhi badh jati hai
Isiliye google ise invalid click activity man leta hain or aapke AdSense account ko permanently disable kar deta hai ya fir aapko 30 day ya isse jyada time tak liye banned kar deta hai
Publisher ke apne khud ke ads par clicks karne or apne friends se ads par click karnwane like automatically tools, robots ka istemal karke artificially clicks karwana bhi invalid click activity me shamil hai
I mean invalid clicks me bahut kuch shamil ho sakta hai but iski koi limit nahi hai
Main yaha par aapko iske bare me kuch terms bta raha hu jo aapki invalid clicks ko define karne me help karegi
Google chahata hai ki user apne interest se ads par click kare and artificially kisi bhi way se clicks or impressions ko badhana prohibited hai or google ise bilkul bhi allow nahi karta
Aesa karna google ki program policies ka violation hoga
Agar AdSense ko aapke account me high level ka invalid clicks ka issue milta hai to google apne advertisers or users ki protect yani security ke liye aapke AdSense account ko suspend, disabled, permanently disable, block and ban kar sakta hain
How to define invalid click activity ? ye ek bahut bada issue hai or har ek publisher ke liye ye bahut mushkil hai ki wo invalid clicks ke bare me kaise pata kare
Actually, iske bare me koi clear information nahi hai but google ki btayi kuch tips se hum iske bare me kafi had tak jan sakte hai
Jab aapke blog par low traffic or bahut jyada ads clicks hone lage or AdSense impressions ke mukable clicks bahut jyada ho to samajh lijiye aapke ads par invalid clicks ho rahe hai
Google janta hai ki some thirt party aapki knowledge or permission ke bina AdSense ads par invalid clicks generate kar sakti hai
However, ultimately yani kuch bhi ho is sabke bavjud bhi invalid click activity ke jimmedar sirf aap honge
I mean iski responsibility aapki hogi or kuch bhi koi bhi ads par invalid click karega to nuksan google ko nahi aapko uthana hoga
But google ne isse bachne ke liye kuch tips btaye hai jinhe follow karke aap apne AdSense account ko invalid click ki problem se secure kar sakte ho
Main AdSense invalid click activity se bachne ke liye Adsense Ads Par Invalid Click Rokne Ke Liye Kya Kare 10 Tips post me already details se bta chuka hu
So agar aap iske bare me full information chahate hai to ye post read kare
Finally, aapko AdSense invalid click activity ke bare me sabkuch samajh aa gaya hoga
By the way, agar kisi bhi wajah se aapka AdSense account suspend bhi ho jata hai to aap google ke Invalid click Contact Form me iski report send kar sakte hai
Ho sakta hai google aapko fir se AdSense use karne ki permission de de
I hope aapko is post se invalid clicks ki problem se bachne ki achhi jankari mili hogi
Please apna 2 second ke time de kar is post ko social media par share jarur kare

Support Me India - Internet Ki Jankari Hindi Me!!!
A Indian Hindi Blog for Beginner Bloggers to Learn Something New and Special Everyday
By: Jume deen khan In: Adsense, Make Money Online Last Updated: 02/05/2017
Google AdSense ki policy proccesses bahut strong hai or aapki jara si galti aapke AdSense account ko banned, block ya disable karwa sakti hai
Main AdSense ko secure or safe rakhne ke bare me pahle bhi post likh chuka hu
Today, main aapko some most important AdSense policy violation ke bare me bta raha hu jinki wajah se jyadatar logo ke AdSense block ho rahe hai
Is post me btayi tips se aap google AdSense account ki good standing banaye rakh sakte hai
In post me btayi AdSense policy violation sabhi AdSense users ke liye most important hai
Agar aap inme se koi bhi mistake kar rahe hai to jaldi hi aapka AdSense account block ya banned ho sakta hai
In tips ko follow karke aap apne AdSense account ki safety banaye rakh sakte hai or long time tak AdSense se connect rahe kar good earnings kar sakte hai
In my experience, google AdSense ki policy violation se bachne ke liye sabse important tips hai aapko AdSense ke sath family friendly rahna chahiye
I mean aapko AdSense ke bare me full information honi jaruri hai or aapko unki latest updates ko check karte rahna chahiye
Aapko AdSense use karne ki achhi practice hogi to aapka account kabhi bhi banned nahi hoga or na hi aapko AdSense ke kisi terms violation issue ka samna karna padega
Don’t click on your own ads:
Kabhi bhi khud ki site or blog par lage ads par click na kare or na hi apne dosto ko aesa karne ke liye kahe
Ye sabse main AdSense policy violation hai 50% AdSense users ka account isi ki wajah se block ho jata hain
Actually unhe AdSense terms ke bare me kuch bhi pata nahi hota hai or wo jyada kamai karne ke liye apne dosto ko ads par click karne ke liye kahte hain
Ye log sochte hai ki mai dusro se ads par click karwaunga to google ko iske bare me pata nahi chalega
Agar aap bhi aesa sochte hain to aap bilkul galat hain
Google bahut smart hain or use humari sabhi activities ka pata chal jata hain
What Users are Looking
I know hum AdSense ads ki style customize kar sakte hai or ads ko apni site ke color ke anusar design kar sakte hai
But itna bhi nahi ki ads ads na lage or user ko wo aapki site ka hi part nazar aaye
Ads ka ka make upkaro but itna ki user ko use smajhane me pareshani na ho
Google chahata hain ki user ads par ads samajh kar hi click kare
Wese bhi agar user galti se aapke ads par click karega to aapki earning nahi ohgi or aapko Invalid Click Activity ki problem bhi ho sakti hai
Keep Family Friendly with Adsense:
Google AdSense ki prohibited content guidelines and other terms ko read kare or jitna ho sake AdSense ke bare me jankari pata karne ki koshish kare
Agar aap aesa nahi kar sakte ho to aapko apni website par AdSense ads lagane ki koi jarurat nahi hai
Google ne AdSense ko safe rakhne ke kuch rules and terms banayi huyi hai
Aapko unhe pardhna hi hoga or ye aapke liye bahut hi jarui bhi hai
Maximize Content, Not ads Per Pages:
Relevant, useful and helpful, unique or interesting content hi write kare or site par regularly articles share kare
Sath hi post content me AdSense ads lagate time ye dhyan rakhe ki ads ke bich yani ads between ka balance bahut kam na ho or ads ke bich kafi space ho
Less content wale pages par jyada ads istemal karne se bache or behtar hoga ki aap bekar ke or extra pages par AdSense ads na lagaye
Humesha long content me AdSense se better performance milti hai
Use Recommended Sizes Ads:
Kya aap apni site par Adsense Ads Placement sahi se kar pa rahe hai or agar ha to kounse size ke ads use karte hai or kis size ke ads se aapko better results milte hai
Kya aapko pata hain ki aapki site par all devices me AdSense ads proper work karte hai or ads sabhi ad unit sahi se dikhayi dete hai
Custom size ke ads use karne se acha hai aap AdSense ke recommended size wale advertisng hi use kare or ye achhe se check kar le ki aapki site par mobile, tablet, computer desktop, laptop sabhi sizes ki screen wali devices me ads sahi se show ho rahe hai
Create Unique Content and Earn More:
Aap jo kuch likhte ho wo users ke liye valuable hona bahut jaruri hai
Google chahata hai ki hum apne readers ko original or important information de or or unhe 100% satisfied kare
Unique content par AdSense ads se better result milta hai or ye aapki site ki bhi jarurat hai
Agar aap useless content likh rahe ho to aapko bta du ki is wajah se bhi aapka AdSense account band ho sakta hai
So please leave it and badhiya or fresh content likhna shuru kare
Do not Abuse Anyone:
Bahut se log kisi ke bare me galat content write karte hai
I mean kisi ki burai karna
Ye kisi person ya kisi or cheez ke bare me bhi ho sakti hai
Adsense ke sath google search engine aese content ko bilkul pasand nahi karta hai
Evil content share karna bhi AdSense policy violation hai
Ye aapke AdSense account ka na sirf block karwa sakta hai balki iski wajah se google aapko humesha ke liye search engine or AdSense ke liye bann kar sakta hai
Track More Organic Traffic:
Sirf content likhne se kuch nahi hoga
Aapke blog par google and other search engines se badhiya Organic Traffic hona chahiye
Adsense google search engine se aaye traffic ko jyada like karta hai
Sabse achchi bat search engine se aaye visitors ko advertisement ke bare me bahut kam information hoti hai
Organic users ads me jyada interested hote hai or aapko jada clicks milte hai
Google bhi yahi chahata hai ki user apn ipasand se ads par click kare
Avoid Deceptive Layouts:
Only right place, heavy content par hi ads lagaye
Post images ke pas kabhi bhi AdSense ad add na kare
Iske alawa floating, fixed widgets me bhi AdSense ads use nahi kare
Main iske bare me already Adsense Ke Ads Kaha Kaha Nahi Laga Sakte post me details se bta chuka hu
Agar aap apni site par pop up and floating ads lagana chahate hai to behtar hoga ki aap Adsense Page Level Ads ka istemal kare
Agar aapki site par mobile user jyada hai to ye aapke liye jaruri hai
Follow Code Implementation Guide:
Google hume ads code ko modify karna bilkul bhi allow nahi karta hai
 Always, code implementation guide follow kare or kabhi bhi AdSense code ko edit na kare
Iski wajah se bhi aapka account block ho sakta hai
Agar aapko AdSense ads ko use karne me koi problem hoti hai to aap AdSense contact publisher support form me iske bare me question puch sakte hai
Google AdSense ki is policy violation processes wali post ko padhne ke liye apaka dhanywad, I hop inse aap AdSense ko safe rakh sakte ho
Main aane wale time main bhi iske bare me post publish karunga
So humse jude rahe or humare blog par continue post padhte rahe
Thanks again!!!!!! post pasand aaye to ise social media par share jarur kare

Support Me India - Internet Ki Jankari Hindi Me!!!
A Indian Hindi Blog for Beginner Bloggers to Learn Something New and Special Everyday
By: Jume deen khan In: Adsense, Make Money Online Last Updated: 15/04/2017
Google AdSense blog se earning karne ka sabse best or easy way hai
Aap AdSense se lakho me income kar sakte ho
Google AdSense hume itna pay karta hai ki hum soch bhi nahi sakte
Adsense Insuranse keyword par AdSense ki high CPC $54
91 hai yani is par google maximum 3,500 indian rupee deta hai
Isi wajah se old and new sabhi websites or blog ki google AdSense first choice hai or mostly websites owner AdSense hi use karte hai
Bahut si websites par bahut jyada traffic hota hai but unki AdSense earning bahut kam hoti hai
India me already AdSense ki CPC low hoti hai or user ko per click $0
10 cents hi milte hai
Iska bilkul ulta kuch sites par traffic kam hota hai but unki earning maximum hoti hai
Dono me bas fark itna hai ki ek ko AdSense ki knowledge hoti hai or dusre ko nahi
I mean AdSense se jyada kamai karne ke liye aapko AdSense ki jankari hona jaruri hai
Without information ke is post me btaye high paying keywords aapke koi kam nahi hai
Main already Top 20 High Paying Keywords Infographics me iske bare me bta chuka hu
Today, main aapko AdSense ke top number wale 100 high CPC keywords ke bare me bta raha hai
In me se kuch keywords par google 3000 rupees se bhi jyada pay karta hain
Agar aapko ek bhi keywords par quality content likh lete ho to aapki earning 100%
Sirf in keywords se aap adsesne revenue ko 97% increase kar sakte hai
Agar aap AdSense ki low CPC se pareshan hai or apni CPC increase karna chaahte hain to aap high paying keywords par article likha kare
Iske liye aap SemRush keywords search tools ka istemal kar sakte hai
Aapko iske liye hard work ki jagah smart work karna hoga tabhi aap AdSense se good earning kar sakoge
So chaliye ab aap low traffic par smarter work karke AdSense se big earning karna shuru kar dijiye
Ye Google Adsense High CPC Keywords List 2016 – 2017 isme aapki help karegi
Is highest CPC keywords list ko aap blog or YouTube par istemal kar sakte ho
Mostly dating and movies websites par AdSense CPC lo or Tech blog par AdSense ki CPC high hoti hai
Google Adwords Advertising Top 20 Keywords Categaries List:
Upar btaye high cpc keywords most important hai
Ab main yaha aapko kuch or bhi high paying keywords ke bare me bta raha hu
Isse aapko or jyada help milegi or keywords researching me aasani hogi
Agar inke alawa bhi koi high CPC kryword mujhse miss ho gaya ho to aap comment section me use share karke humari or humare readers ki help kar sakte ho
Ummid karta hu aapko is post me google AdSense high paying keywords ke bare me details se pata chala hoga so abhi se high CPC keywords par post likhna shuru kar dijiye
I hope aapko ye post pasand aayegi agar haa to ise social media par apne friends ke sath share karur kare

Support Me India - Internet Ki Jankari Hindi Me!!!
A Indian Hindi Blog for Beginner Bloggers to Learn Something New and Special Everyday
By: Jume deen khan In: Adsense, WordPress Last Updated: 15/04/2017
Today, main aapko btauga ki kaise aap apne WordPress blog me post title ke bad AdSense ads show kar sakte ho, I mean how to add google AdSense ad below post title without using any plugin
Aap is post me btayi trick se bina plugin ke WordPress blog me post title ke niche ads laga sakte ho
Google AdSense first ads network hai, bahut sare blogger AdSense par apne blog monetize karte hai kyuki ye ye baki ads network company ki tulna me better pay karta hai
Adsense advertisement se good earning karne ke liye site par ads ka sahi se placement karna jaruri hota hai
Mostly, blog post title ke niche AdSense ads lagane se CPC, CTR increase hoti hai or ad par clicks bhi jyada milte hai
Mian AdSense ko optimize karne ke bare me already Google Adsense Ads Ko Optimize Karne Ki Top 15 Effective Tips articles me details se bta chuka hu
Is post me aapko AdSense placement ke bare me better tips milegi jinse aap apni AdSense revenue increase kar sakte ho
Now, hum bat karenge ki WordPress blog me post title ke bad AdSense ke ads kaise display kare
Wese aap ad injection jaise plugin use karke direct post title ke bad ads show kar sakte ho but yaha hum without plugin ads lagane ke bare me bat kar rahe hai
Add Adsense Ads Below Post Title Without Using Any Plugin: Iske liye aapko jyada kuch nahi karna hai bas ye 2 step follow karne hai
Is tarah se aap WordPress blog me post title ke bad easily adsens ads ya other kisi bhi advertising ko add kar sakte hai
Agar aap soc hrahe hai ki ads ko post title ke bad hi kyu add kare or ye kyu jaruri hai to main aapk obta du ki post topic ke bad yani post content se pahle AdSense ads lagane se click through rate yani AdSense CTR increae hoti hai
Sath hhi ye ads lagane ka better place hai or yaha par aapko jyada clicks or jyada CPC milti hai
Because better CTR hone par google high CPC ads show karta hai
I hope this tutorial helped you in placing AdSense ads after post title on your wodpress blog
Agar ha to humari AdSense wali dusri post bhi jarur padhe or is post ko social media par share jarur kare

Support Me India - Internet Ki Jankari Hindi Me!!!
A Indian Hindi Blog for Beginner Bloggers to Learn Something New and Special Everyday
By: Jume deen khan In: Adsense, Make Money Online Last Updated: 15/04/2017
Kya aapki site par AdSense ads mobile, desktop version and all devices me proper show hote hai or kya aapke readers aapki advertisment se satisfied hai ? Or kya wo aapki site ya blog ko pasand karte hai
Shayad is sawal ka jawba bahut kam logo ke pas hoga
Kyuki hum sirf site par ads laga kar chord dete hai or readers engagement, user interest ki performance report check nahi karte hai
Internet par bahut sare website owner or blogger hai
Jinme se millions people mostly blogger Google Adsense ka istemal karte hai or unka main income source bhi AdSense hi hota hai
But bahut sare log jo apne blog par AdSense se earning karte hai wo AdSense performance report check nahi karte hai or na hi user engagement, reader interest par dhyan nahi dete hai
Isi wajah se log AdSense se good earnings nahi kar pate hai
Sirf yahi nahi kei bar to bad ad placement se AdSense account block tak ho jata hai
So is problem ko solve karne ke liye google ne kuch tips ki guide taiyar ki hai
Jinhe follow karke aap apni site par audience engaement ko boost kar sakte ho
For bloggers, audience enagaging na sirf blog ke liye important hota hai balki ye challenging bhi hai
Aap easily engagement win nahi kar sakte
Google ke ek research ke anusar 30% smartphone users agar aapki site ke advertisement and look se satisfied nahi hote hai or unhe apni jarurat ki information nahi milti hai to wo immediately another website par move kar jate hai
Audience engagement banaye rakhne ke liye google ne ek eBook create ki hai
Aap iski copy yaha se download kar sakte hai Adsense Guide to Audience Engagement
Is Ebook Me Aapko Kya Kya Milega ?
Ebook download karne se pahle aap ye jarur sochoge ki aapko isme kya kya jankari milegi or ise download karne se aapko kya fayda hoga to ye point aapke kaam aa sakte hai
Inke alawa bhi aapko is eBook me bahut kuch sikhne ko milega jinse aap apni site ke advertisement me user interest ko increase kar sakte hai
Agar aap AdSense user ho or really me AdSense se achhi kamai karna chahate ho to aapko ise jarur test karna chahiye
Agar aap chahate hai ki aane wale time me aapko aesi hi useful updates milti rahe to humare blog ko subscribe jarur kare

Support Me India - Internet Ki Jankari Hindi Me!!!
A Indian Hindi Blog for Beginner Bloggers to Learn Something New and Special Everyday
By: Jume deen khan In: Adsense Last Updated: 15/04/2017
Aaj main aapko google AdSense ke block, banned, disable, deactivate hone ki policy violation warnings ke bare me bta raha hu jo aapke AdSense account ka common pitfalls yani nuksan hone se bachayegi
Agar aapke pas pahle se AdSense nahi hai to aap humari Adsense se related posts padh kar pahle google AdSense account bana le
Agar aapka AdSense account kafi time se approved nahi ho raha hai ya aapka account kisi wajah se disable ho gaya hai or ya google ne aako AdSense use karne ke liye bann kar diya hai to aap iski wajah jarur janna chahate honge
Aaj main aapko google AdSense ki policy violation ke bare me bta raha hu jo google team ne October 20, 2016 ko update ki hai
Is policy triggers me google AdSense team ne kuchpoints ko highlight kiya hai ki kis tarah ke content par AdSense ads allow nahi karega
Google only unique content like karta hai or google ne iske iye bahut sari algorithms bana rakhi hai
Google AdSense policy ke bare me main pahle bhi post likh chuka hu
Now 20 october 2016 ko google AdSense ke new policy violation update huyi hai
Agar aap AdSense user ho to aapko inke bare me jarur jan lena chahiye or aapko future me AdSense disable jaisi problem na ho
Copyrighted Material
Google un pages par ads show karna allow nahi karta hai jinme copyrighted material hota hai
Kabhi bhi copyrighted or kisi or ke content ko monetize karne ki koshish na kare
Agar aap copyright content par ads laga bhi lete ho to AdSense india me $100 hone par pay karta hai so aapke account me $100 se pahle hi AdSense team ko aapke bare me pata chal jayega or wo aapke AdSense account me $100 hone se pahle hi use disable kar dega
Sirf post title or headlines use karne par bhi AdSense ads allow nahi karta hai
Kuch log sirf kuch words use karke post ko khali ho chod kar usme ads laga dete hai or uske liye description use nahi karte to aesi site par bhi AdSense account deactivate ho sakta hai
Iske alawa google profanity or erotic stories, jokes or discussions me me bhi ads alawa nahi karta kyuki ye AdSense policy ke virudh hai
Resources ki tarah under misleading headings me AdSense ads add karna bhi policy violation hai
User ko mislead karna or ads par click karne ke liye uksana bhi AdSense policy violation hai
Acceptable header or sponsored links me advertisement placing karna bhi AdSense ki policy koa ullaghan hai
Simple words me AdSense ads ko site content me milane se google ki policy ka ullaghan hota hai
So clear or irght place par AdSense ads placement kare
Actually, users aapki site par content read karne ke liye aate hai bajye advertisement dekhne ke so users ko site content or AdSense ads ko samajhane me aasani honi chahiye or wo easily pata kar sake ki ad kona hai or content konsa hai
Content me milte huye ads par invalid clicks activity hoti hai jiski wajah se AdSense aapka account suspend kar deta hai
Agar aapki site par is type ki activity hoti hai to google advertisers ki purti karne ke liye aapke ads click number kam kar denge
Aapne kei bar dekha bhi hoga ki AdSense report me automatically clicks kam ho jate hai
Content jo sexually explicit hai or suggestive without being explicit hai
Is tarah ke content par google AdSense use karna allow nahi karta hai
Agar aap is tarh ka content share karna band nahi karte hai to future me google aapko humesha ke liye aapko AdSense advertisement dikhana band kar dega
Adsense ads par logo ka dhyan lane ke iye alert message add karna or unnatural tarike se AdSense se jyada earning karne ki koshish karna bhi aapki site par se AdSense ko banned karwasakta hai
Featured blooshed, fight scenes, call about jaise violent content par bhi google AdSense ads show karna allow nahi arta hai
I mean is tarah ke violent content par AdSense ads allow nahi karta or agar aap aesa kar rahe ho to or aako fkr karne ki jarurat nahi hai
Webmaster Guidelines
Jo blog webmaster guidelines ko follow karke content nahi likhta hai to uska bhi AdSense account disable kar sakta hai
Webmaster guidelines ke anusar user ko original frsh content share karna chahiye
Original quality unique content na sirf readers ke liye better hota hai balki google search engine bhi frsh content ko like karta hai or isse aapki site ki search rank increase hoti hai
Google ne is warning ko highlight kiya hai or is par jyada focus kiya hai agar use kisi AdSense user ki site ya blog par copyrighting content milta hai to wo jaldi hi uske AdSense account ko banned kar sakta hai
So humesha badhiya or original content write kare or only useful content hi apni site par share kare
Agli post me main aapko btaunga ki AdSense policy violation ke bad kya kare
Our 35,300+ readers have already subscribed to this blog's newsletter
If you want to learn more with us then you can join us, Hurry up
He is a Indian blogger and share useful content on this blog regularly
If you like his articles then you can share this blog on social media with your friends
Want learn more then click here

- wp super cache plugin lagane ke bad kisi option me ON par click karne par problem hoti hai kyoki ON karne ke baad front page par koi post open nahi hoti

कारण साफ़ हैं लोग गूगल से कमाना चाहते हैं और बिना ट्रैफिक के वह कुछ earn नहीं कर पाते और खुद ही क्लीक करने लगते हैं या फिर किसी दोस्त से क्लिक करवाने लगते हैं
जिससे गूगल बड़ी ही आसानी से ट्रैक कर लेता हैं… एक वेबसाइट मैंने ऐसी देखि जिस पर सेक्सुअल कंटेंट थे, मैं यह सोचकर हैरान था की आखिर गूगल ने इसका अकाउंट कैसे अप्रूव कर लिया और AdSense के विज्ञापन दिखाई दे रहे हैं?

यानी की साफ़ हैं की कोई भी सेक्सुअल और गंदे कंटेंट लिखने पर आपको बैन कर सकता हैं… धन्यवाद… भाई आप बहुत ही अच्छी पोस्ट लिखते हो

Support Me India - Internet Ki Jankari Hindi Me!!!
A Indian Hindi Blog for Beginner Bloggers to Learn Something New and Special Everyday
By: Jume deen khan In: Adsense, Make Money Online Last Updated: 15/04/2017
How to earn more money from Google Adsense ? Jin blogger ka income source Google Adsense hota hai unke mind me ek sawal humesha rahta hai ki Adsense se jyada paise kaise kamaye jaye or wo iske liye internet par tips or tricks keyword search karte rahte hai
Agar aap bhi AdSense publisher hai or advertisement program se adhik earning karna chahate hai to i sure is post me btayi tips follow karke aap apni AdSense earning 100% increase kar sakte ho
Google AdSense publisher mostly yahi janna chahate hai ki wo apne blog par AdSense se adhik paisa kaise kama sakte hai
Iske alawa user ke man me ek or sawal hota hai ki blog par traffic kaise badhaye
Ye 2 sawal blogging me most important hai or lagbhag har koi inka solution ke sath jawab chahata hai
Sabse pahle main aapko bta du ki without hard work ke aap na to jyada kamayi kar sakte ho or na hi jyada traffic kama sakte ho
Aaj main yaha par aapko jo tips bta raha hu wo SEO yani search engine optimization or google AdSense dono ke liye better hai or dono se aapko behtar results milega
internet par aapko 1, 2 nahi 1000+ guide mil jayegi blog par traffic increase karne ki or advertisement ya affiliate marketing se more money earn karne ki but main aapko yaha par sirf kuch hi tips bta raha hu
Agar aap inhe follow kar lete ho to main aapko guarantee deta hu ki next month aap 20,000 to 50,000 monthly kamane lag jaoge or aapki site par lakho me traffic hoga
Adsense se jyada piase kamane ke liye aapko original fresh quality content ki jarurat padegi or aapko AdSense terms ke bare me bahut kuch sikhna hoga
Mostly, aapko useful content or adhik Organic Traffic ki jarurat hoti hai
Google AdSense se already bahut se blogger lakho kama rahe hai like amit agarwal jo apne labnol
org technology blog se har mahine lakho paise earn karte hai
Aapko unki copy karne ki jarurat nahi hai kyuki har ek website me difference hota hai or sabhi sites par ek hi formula work karega kaha nahi ja sakta
So aapko apni site ke liye alag se apne experience se tips banani hogi
 Here are a few tips to help you balance ads and content
Aapki site par daily, monthly or yearly kitne visitors visit karte hai ye aapke content par depend karta hai
Ek blogger kei salo se article write kar raha hai fir bhi use daily 5k to 10k hi traffic mil raha hai or ek ne abhi kuch month pahle blogging start ki or uski site par daily 100k se bhi jyada visitor visit karte hai
Ye kamal sirf aapka content or aapki writing skill hi kar sakti hai
Ye ek aesa sach hai jise sabhi writer samajh nahi pate hai or ise ignore kar dusre way ko follow karne me waqt barbad karte hai
Jabki wo achhe se jante hai ki quality content ke bina site par lot of traffic possible nahi hai
Aapki site par visitor tabhi visit karega jab use useful or helpful information milegi or wo jis information ke liye aapki site par aaya or use puri janakri mili
I mean agar aap readers ko satisfied kar sakte ho to hi aapki site par better traffic ho sakta hai
Actually, AdSense revenue increase karne ke liye aapko jyada traffic ki jarurat hoti hai
So aapko aesa karna hoga agar aapki site par traffic nahi hai or aap AdSense se good earning karne ki soch rahe hai to ye nahi ho sakega
Adsense se jyada paise kamane ke liye na sirf aapko jyada traffic ki jarurat padegi balki traffic ka original hona bhi jaruri hai
Aapko high paying keywords par content likhna hoga kyuki AdSense kuch keywords par per click $10 se bhi jyada pay karta hai
Maine Top 20 High Paying Keywords in Google Adsense post me high CPC wale keywords ke bare me already btaya hai
Mostly, AdSense earning increase karne ke liye organic traffic jyada better hota hai
Suppose aapki site par 5,000 traffic google search engine and othe search engines se hai or 10,000 traffic direct ya other method se aata hai to aapki 5,000 organic traffic se jyada earning hogi
I mean aapke pas daily 10,000 visit google search engine se hai to aap monthly 1,00,000 rupee easily earn kar sakte hai
But iske liye aapko High Paying Keywords ke bare me bhi janna jaruri hai taki aap high paying keywords par content likh sako
Iska main reason ye hai ki jo log pahle se aapki site ke bare me jante hai or aapki site par adhiktar visit karte hai wo sab google AdSense ke bare me jante hai or bahut kam bar aapki site par ads par click karte hai
Jabki google search engine se aaye visitors ko AdSense advertising ke bare me pata nahi hota hai or wo apne interest se jyada ads par click karte hai
Search engine se jyada traffic pane ke liye aapko SEO friendly content likhna hoga
Agar aap SEO ke bare me bilkul new hai to aap SEO Kya Hai ? Search Engine Optimization Ki Jankari Hindi Me post read kare or agar aap qualitiy content likhna chahate ho to aap humari SEO se related baki post read kare
Only badhiya content likhne se kuch nahi hoga
Better content ke sath sath aapki site or blog ka design bhi attractive hona chahiye
Standard web page ko user jyada pasand karte hai or good looking site par thoda bura article bhi kamal ka lagta hai
Google AdSense simple or fast loading design pasand karta hai so agar aapko AdSense se achchi earning karni hai to apni site ko google ke anusar design kare
Agar aap blogger hai to aapke liye site par layout, sidebar, header and footer features kafi hai
Google ne is bare me apne AdSense blog par pages share kiye hai agar aap site design me google se help chahate hai to aap AdSense Guide to Audience Engagement se free Adsense guide download kar sakte hai
Isme aapko designing ki best practices ke bare me btaya gaya hai jinse aapko site designing me kafi help milegi
Site ka better design na sirf AdSense like karta hai balki google search engine ke liye bhi site ka simple design behtar hai
Google ka kahna hai ki jaha tak ho sake apni site design ko simple rakhe taki reader ko sabkuch clear samajh aa sake
Blog ke homepage par 5-7 post or sidebar me jaruri widget hi add kare baki extra metrial se bache or apni site ko jyada se jyada clear bananye
Isse aapki site ki speed bhi increase hogi or aapko jyada traffic bhi milega
Adsense se good earning karne me ads placement ki jankari hona bahut jaruri hai
Google ne site par ads lagane ke kuch rules banaye huye hai
Agar aap unhe follow nahi kar pate hai to aap AdSense se adhik paisa nahi kama sakoge
Adsense terms ko follow kar ke site par ads lagane se AdSense CPC, CTR, RPM better hogi or aapko AdSense jyada pay karega
Inke bare me main already article likh chuka hu jyada jankari ke liye wo check kare
Adsense Ke Ads Kaha Kaha Nahi Laga Sakte post me maine btaya hai ki hume kaha kaha par ads lagane chahiye
Kabhi bhi error 404, contact forum, welcome page etc
par ads show na kare
Ad placement sahi se kare or ads ko clear show kare content me ad fully match nahi hona chahiye
Ye pata kar le ki aapki site par desktop, laptop, mobile, tablet kis version se traffic aata hai
Usi ke anusar ads ko optimize kare
 Google Adsense Ads Ko Optimize Karne Ki Top 15 Effective Tips post me aapko AdSense ads ko optimize karne ke bare me tips mil jayegi
Adsense CPC increase karne or more money earn karne ka ye common factor hai
Agar aap sahi size or sahi location par ads show karoge to aapko jyada benefit milega
Sath hi aap ads ka design apni site ke design se matched use kare but ads ko bilkul site content me milaye nahi
Aap mostly contentt ke first and last me ads add kare isse aapko jyada better result milega
Content ke above and below me ads clear show hota hai or user us par interested ho kar hi click karta hai
Iske alawa aap blog sidebar or header me bhi ads use kare
In my experience, Maine 1 year se AdSense use kar raha hu or hindi blog hone ke bawjood AdSense se achchi earning kar raha hu
Mujhe jis size ke ads se achha responsive mila hai unke bare me aapko bta raha hu
Try below size ads and increase your AdSense revenue:
Inke alwa aap sidebar widget me 300 * 600 size ka large size banner ads bhi use kar sakte hai but mostly upar btaye gaye point size ke ads hi jyada better hote hai
Main aapko suggest karunga ki aap post ke bich me bhi ads add karke results check kare
Isse bhi aapko behtar result milega
Adsense performance search engine se traffic milne par to better hoti hi hai but kya aapko pata hai ki google AdSense U
K me per click $2 to $10 pay karta hai jabki india me AdSense per click only $0
I mean india ki tulna me USA or UK country me AdSense CPC very high hai agar aap AdSense se jyada paise kamana chahate ho to aapko in country se traffic milna chhaiye
Iske liye aapko USA and UK  ko target kar content likhna hoga
Suppose, aapko india me daily 200 click milte hai or aapki CPC $0
10 hai to  aapko $2o hi milenge but USA se $20 earn kkarne ke liye aapko 5 to 15 click ki jarurat padegi
Socho 200 clicks se jyada earning 15 – 20 click se ho rahi hai to aap AdSense se kitna jyada paisa kama sakte ho so aapko other country ke liye content likhna shuru kar dena chahiye
I sure mujhe bhi USA and UK jaise contry se best CPC mili hai
Jyadatar blogger ek bar apne blog par AdSense ads add karke uski report check nahi karte hai or AdSense revenue increase karne ki faltu ki tips pata karne me lage rahte hai
Unhe sabkuch chord kar apni iste par ads ki performance check kante rahna chahiye
Jaisa ki maine upar btaya tha ki har ek site different hoti hai or sabhi site par ek hi tarike se ads placement se good earning nahi ki ja sakti
Site par alag alag name ad unit bannaye or time to time pata karte rahe ki aapko kis itype ke ads se kitna benefit mil raha hai
Jis palce par ads lagane se aapko better results nahi mil raha ho to use change kare or apne experience ke anusar sahi jagah par ads lagaye jis se aapko badhiya responsive mil sake
content marketer ki btayi tips ke alawa aap khud apne hisab se bhi ads location choose kare or test kare ki aapko kis location par ads lagane se jyada CPC or jyada click mil rahe hai
Post ke first and end ke sath sath post between bich me bhi ads show kare
Kuch logo ne myths bana rakhe hai ki images ads better work karta hai or links ad ki tulna me display ads ki CPC jyada hoti hai jabki ye sirf ek bakwas hai sach ye hai ki image ad ke alawa links ad ki CPC bhi high hoti hai
In my case, Mujhe iamges ad ki tarah hi links ad se bhi better CPC mili hai
Adsense ads advertiser ke dwara diye commission ke ansdar hume commission deta hai
Isme bahut bar image ad ke sath links ads par bhi high CPC hoti hai
Only images ads use karne se AdSense CPM decrease hoti hai
Aese me agar humne text ads ko block kar only iamges type ad enable kar rakha hai to hum links ad ko miss kar denge
So main aapse yahi kahunga ki aap dono type ke ad text and display ads hi use kare taki aapse koi ad miss na ho
Main humesha text and images type ke ads use karta hu
Uske bad AdSense automatically better ads show karta hai or mujhe ye dar bhi nahi rahta ki kahi main kisi ek type ke ads ko miss na kar du
Apni site ke liye android, iPad, iPhone and other mobile version ke liye application develop karwaye or use google AdSense se connect kare
Isse aapki earning 30% to 40% ho jayegi
Apne sabhi readers ko app install karne ke liye kahe
Isse aapki site ka traffic bhi badhega or aapki earning bhi jyada hogi
Wo user jinko mobile me slow internet connection ki wajah se aapki site use karne me problem hoti hai mobile app se unki help hogi or aapko AdSense revenue or site traffic dono me fayda hoga
Iske alawa aap site ke end ya sidebar me Adsense Matched Content add kare jisse aapki site par traffic badhe or aapko jyada se jyada ad click mi lsake
Google ki ye service bahut hi badhiya hai or isse humari site ka free promotion ho jata hai
Matched content ke alawa google ne jyada earning karne ka ek or feature diya hua hai agar aapki site par mobile traffic jyada hai to aap Page Level Ads use karke bhi AdSense earning increase kar sakte ho
iske bare me janne ke liye aap Mobile Site Par Adsense Page Level Ads (Beta) Kaise Use Kare post check kare
Agar aap pichle kafi time se AdSense use kar rahe ho or aapko income source only google AdSense hi hai to aapko AdSense use karne ka tohda bahut experience jarur hoga or aapko kuch tips jarur pata hogi ki aap kis tarah AdSense se jyada paise kama sakte ho or aapke liye kya best hai
So please sabko chodiye apne deemag se sochiye ki aapke liye kya better ho sakta hai or apne aapke liye tips banayiye or apni AdSense revenue ko increase kijiye
Agar aap aesa karne me success ho jate hai to aap hi dusro ko AdSense earning inceasing tips btane lagoge
In my experience, maine google AdSense earning increase karne ke bare me iske alawa bhi bahut post likhi hai
Agar aapko meri btayi tips better lage to aap humari AdSense se related dusri post bhi jarur padhe
Agar aapne abhi tak AdSense account nahi banaya hai to aap Adsense Account Kaise Banaye Step By Step Puri Jankari post me btaye step follow karke easily AdSense account bana sakte ho
In sabke alawa aap Category Blocking, Blacklist URL’s, Placement Targeting, Section Targeting and other tips follow kar ke or Extra revenue source like YouTube and custom search engine ads try kar ke bhi AdSense se jyada paise kama sakte ho
Remember, content is king so humesha apni site par fresh or quality content hi publish kare
Bekar ki or faltu post share karne se bache, inse na to aapki earning increase hogi balki aapki site ki search rank down ho jayegi or site ka traffic bhi kam ho jayega
Sabse jaruri bat AdSense se adhik paisa kamana hai to aap sabse pahle adsene ke bare me achhe se jaan le ki ye kya hai, kaise work karta hai or kaise humari earning hoti hai
uske bad aap khud apni own tips create kar AdSense se jyada paise kama sakoge

Support Me India - Internet Ki Jankari Hindi Me!!!
A Indian Hindi Blog for Beginner Bloggers to Learn Something New and Special Everyday
By: Jume deen khan In: Adsense Last Updated: 15/04/2017
Google ek se jyada AdSense account create karna allow nahi karta but hum ek AdSense account ko multiple gmail ID par par use kar sakte hai
Iska fayda ye hai ki agar humare pas difference gmail account se YouTube channel or blog hai to hum un sab par apne primary AdSense account se advertising show kar sakte hai
I mean hum ek hi AdSense account se apni all sites or YouTube channels par ads laga sakte hai
Google hume one AdSense account se multiple website, blogs and YouTube channel par advertisement lagana allow karta hai
Bahut se log alag alag gmail ID se alag alag AdSense account bana kar use karte hai but google policy ke anusar ye galat or wrong way hai
Jab wo hume ek hi AdSense account se apni sari sites par ad lagana offer karta hai to hume uski terms ka violation nahi karna chahiye
In this post, main aapko aesa tarika bta raha hu jisse aap 1 AdSense account se apni sabhi blog and YouTube channel par ads show kar ke earning kar sakte ho
Iske liye bas aapko apna another gmail address ko google AdSense me add karna hoga
Aapko isse fayda ye hoga ki aapko bahut sare AdSense account ke liye alag alag information yaad rakhne ki jarurat nahi padegi or aapko bahut sare username or password yaad nahi rakhne honge
Suppose agar aap 5 different gmail account se alag alag AdSense account bana lete ho or un sab me aapki earning $50 to $70 hai to aapki total earning $60 ke hisab se 5 account me $300 ho jati hai
But aap apna payment nahi le sakte because google AdSense minimum $100 pay karta hai jo ki aapke kisi bhi account me nahi hai
Agar aap ek hi khata use karte to aap $300 se pahle bhi payment receive kar sakte the
Is setting ko User Management kahte hai, I hope you understand
Step banane se pahle main man leta hu ki aapke pas 2 gmail account hai or dono par YouTube channel ya blog active hai or aapke pas ek gmail ID se approved AdSense account hai
Ab aap use dusri gmail ID se connect kar apne dusre YouTube channel se bhi earning karna chahate hai
Sabse pahle aap apne approved AdSense account par ja kar log in kare
Aapne jis gmail ID user ko invite kiya hai us gmail account me ek message aayega
Usme ek invitation link hoga us par click karke aapko invitation accept karna hai
Gmail par aaya link kuch is tarah se hoga
Is link par click kare or invitation accept kare
Invitation link par click karne ke bad invitation access AdSense ka page open hoga
