Ab ek “Thank you to joining AdSense” ka page open hoga
Yaha aapko niche google AdSense ke link par click karna hai
Aap jaise hi google AdSense ke link par click karoge aap AdSense ke home page par pahuch jaoge
Dekhiye ye wohi google AdSense account hai jo aap apni dusri gmail ID par use kar rahe ho
Is tarah se aap apne ek AdSense account me apni other gmail ID ko add karke apne sabhi YouTube channel or blog par ads laga sakte ho
Is process se aap apne friend ko bhi AdSense me partner bana kar earning kar sakte ho
Yaad rahe user management setting me kabhi bhi kisi or ko Administrator na banaye
Kyuki uske bad usko aapke AdSense account ka full access mil jata hai or wo aapki hi tarah uska malik ban jata hai
Ho sakta hai is tarah se koi aapke sath dhoka kar ke aapko hi account se remove kar de
So carefully AdSense me multiple user add kare
I hope aapko ye post pasand aayegi
Agar ha to ise social media par share jarur kare

Support Me India - Internet Ki Jankari Hindi Me!!!
A Indian Hindi Blog for Beginner Bloggers to Learn Something New and Special Everyday
By: Jume deen khan In: Adsense, Make Money Online, YouTube Last Updated: 15/04/2017
Youtube se online kamayi karna bahut acha tarika hai bhaut se log YouTube se lakho rupees kama bhi rahe hai
Kuch log to crordo se bhi jyada paise kamate hai
Youtube se earning karna koi mushkil kam nahi hai aap bhi YouTube par video upload kar ke paisa kama sakte hai
Iske liye bas aapko apni gmail ID se YouTube par sign in karna hai or videos create karke YouTube par upload karni hai
Apni videos ko monetize kar Google Adsense se connect karna hai
Uske bad jab bhi koi aapki video par show hone wale ads par click karega aapki earning hogi
Maine iski jankari YouTube Se Paise Kaise Kamaye – Full Guide in Hindi post me already di huyi hai aap chahe to ye post pad sakte hai isme aapko YouTube se paise kamane ki puri jankari details me milegi
 In this post, yaha main aapko YouTube videos ko monetize karne or YouTube channel ko AdSense se connect karne ke bare me step by step bta raha hu
Agar aapko pas gmail account hai to aap usi ID se YouTube par log in kar sakte hai
 Iske liye aap humari Youtube Partner Kaise Bane post follow kare
 Now, main man leta hu ki aapne YouTube par account bana liya hai or us par 2-5 videos bhi upload kar di hai
Ab bas aapko vdieso ko monetize or AdSense se joidna baki hai
Chalo ab aapne video upload kar liye hai to mai aapko bta du ke is video se kamayi kaise hoti hai or iske liye aapko 2 kaam karne hai
Set up your channel to earn money:
Mai aapko dono ke bare me vistar se btaunga aap chahe to aap abhi mere sath sath apne videos ko monetize or AdSense se connect kar sakte ho
Actually, YouTube ke features me kafi changes ho gaye hai
So main yaha aapko old and new dono step bta raha hu
Aap duable tarike se YouTube channel ko monetize kar sakte ho
com par jaye or top sidebar me apne photo icon par click kare
Old method me aapko kuch jyada step follow karne honge
com par jaye or apne gmail account se log in kare
Video Manager par click karte hi ek new windows khulegi jisme aapke videos ki list hogi par isme video monetize ka nishan nahi hoga
Ye screenshot dekh sakte hai
Yaha par ek green color me dollar ka icon show hota hai jo video monetize karne ke bad showhoga
Ab ek new pop up window khulegi usme YouTube policy ke bare me btayajayega
Policy padh kar sabhi terms par tick karke I accept par click kare
Ab ek dusri windows khilegi usme Monetize par click kare fir Go it par click kare
Aap jaise hi Go it par click karenge to aap direct apne account ke video manager me pahuch jayenge
Yaha par aap dekhenge ke aapki video ke samne dollar ka green nishan hai
Iska matlab aapka video monetize ho gaya hai
Ab aap jab chaho video manager par ja kar apne video ko select kar ke action par click kar monetize kar sakte ho
Abhi aapke video par ads to show honge par aapki income nahi hogi uske liye aapko apna YouTube account google AdSense account se jodna hoga
I mean YouTube channel ko AdSense se connect karna hoga
So chaliye ab iske bare me bat karte hai ki how to connect your YouTube channel with an AdSense account?
Youtube channel ko AdSense account se connect karne ke liye aapke pas pahle se AdSense account hona jaruri nahi hai
Aap jab YouTube ko AdSense se connect karoge to aapka hosted AdSense account ban jayega
Jis se aap sirf apne YouTube videos par hi ads laga sakte ho
Note: YouTube Channel ko monetize karne ke liye aapke channel par lifetime 10,000 views hone jaruri hai
10k views ke bad hi aap youtube ko adsense se connect kar sakte ho
How to connect your YouTube channel with an AdSense account:
Agar aapke pas already approved AdSense account hai to bahut achhi bat hai or agar aap AdSense account banana chahate ho to iske liye aapke pas apni koi website ya blog hona chahiye usse aap direct AdSense account bana sakte ho or apne YouTube channel ke sath sabhi sites par bhi ad laga sakte ho
Iske liye aap humari Adsense Account Kaise Banaye Step By Step Puri Jankari post padhe
Ab jo window khule usme Sign in par click kare
Ab aapke samne AdSense account ke ek information window khulegi jisme aapke address ke bare me pucha jayega
Isme aapko sari jankari sahi sahi bharni hai kyuki aapke btaye address par ek post aati hai usme aapke address verify ke code honge jo aapko google AdSense account me dal kar apna pata verify karna hai
Address verify hone ke bad hi aapko payment milegi
Agar aap AdSense PIN ke bare me or janna chahate hai to Adsense Par Address (PIN) Verify Kaise Karte Hai post pade
Ab jo page khulega wo AdSense sign up forum hoga isme aapko sari jankari sahi sahi bharni hai
Ab aap jaise hi Submit My Application par click karenge to kuch second me aap wapis apne YouTube account par pahuch jaoge or aapke samne same aysi window khulegi
Yaha par ek message show hoga jisme likha hoga “Your AdSenseapplication has been sumitted and is being reviewed
You will recive an email egarding the status of your application within about a week
” mean aapka AdSense aaccount application submit ho gaya hai ab google aapke account ka review karega or review complete ho jane par aapka AdSense account approved hoga ya nahi, iske bare me aapke email address par AdSense ka ek mail aa jayega
Isme ek week ka time tak lag sakta hai
Ab aapka YouTube account AdSense account se jud chuka hai
Ab jab bhi koi aapke video ko dekhega to us video par AdSense le ads show honge or jab koi un ads par click karega to aapki income hogi
Agar aapne mere sath apna YouTube account AdSense se connect nahi kiya hai to der mat kijiye or jaldi se apne account ko AdSense se jod lijiye or paise kamane shuru kar dijiye
Agar aapko is process ko follow karne me kahi par koi problem aaye to aap humse comment me is bare me apne sawal puch sakte hai
I hope aapko ye post pasand aayegi or aapko YouTube se paise money earn karne ke bare me achhi jankari milegi
So plz ise socila media par apne dosto ke sath share jarur kare

Disable interest-based ads
If you select this option, personalized ads will not be shown on videos on your channel, such as ads based on a viewer’s interests or remarketing ads
This may significantly reduce your channel’s revenue
In addition, earned action reports and remarketing lists will stop working for your channel

Your AdSense account is under review
While your account is under review, we put only blank ads on your site
Once your account complete review we put live ads on your site

Support Me India - Internet Ki Jankari Hindi Me!!!
A Indian Hindi Blog for Beginner Bloggers to Learn Something New and Special Everyday
By: Jume deen khan In: Adsense Last Updated: 15/04/2017
Hooray, Google ne just abhi AdSense per page ad unit limit policy change ki hai jisse all AdSense publisher bahut khush hai
I mean ab aap apni site ke ek page par jitne chaho ad laga sakte ho
Adsense ne per page 3 text and display ads, 3 links ad or 2 search box add unit ki limit ko remove kar diya hai
Abhi kuch time pahle google ne apni AdSense service ki per page ad unit limit me badlav kiya hai or one page par se ad unit limits ko hata diya hai
Ye un sabhi blogger or website owners ke liye khushi ki bat hai jo google AdSense advertisement se earning karte hai or jinki income ka main source google AdSense hai, I’m also happy
I hope ad per page limit remove hone se aap apni site par 3 se jyada ads use kar sakte hai or isse aapki earning jarur increase hogi
Google ne apne announcement me kaha hai ki ab AdSense user apne experiment ke anusar apni site pages par ads unit use kar sakta hai
Iska main reason hai google me user ka bahut jyada advertisement related product search karna
Google ka kahna hai ki ad unit limit delete karne se is par break lagega or user ko bar bar google search engine me product search karne ki jarurat nahi hogi
Jyada ad unit use karne se visitors ko unki pasand ka product aasani se mil jayega
Actually, ye bahut serious metter hai or har ek AdSense publisher ke liye most important news hai
Mai nahi chahata ki aapko iske bare me koi confusing ho
So mai aapko iske bare me proof ke sath bta raha hu
 An Important Policy Updates in Google Adsense in hindi:
Yaha mai aapko AdSense ki old per page limit policy or new ad per page limit policy dono ke bare me screenshot ke sath bta raha hu
 Adsense Per Page Ad Unit Limit Old Policy:
Maine old AdSense per page policy ke bare me Blog ke 1 Page Me Adsense Ke Kitne Ads Laga Sakte Hai post me pahle se btaya hua hai ki hum ek page par sirf 3 text / display ads, 3 links ad unit and 2 search box use kar sakte the
Sath hi yaha aap iska screenshot bhi dekh sakte hai
 Adsense Per Page Ad Unit Limit New Policy:
Yaha aap AdSense ki change ki gayi per page limit policy dekh sakte hai
By the way more proof ke liye aap AdSense ke Ensuring proper ad placement page par visit kar sakte hai
Ye thi AdSense ki old and new policy ki proof ke sath report, jo aap check kar sakte hai
I sure AdSense ne per page ad limit ko remove kar diya hai but fir bhi hume AdSense use karne me savadhaninya bartani chahiye
Kahi aap iska galat upyog karke apni site ka traffic kam na kar lo
Old Policy: Ad limit per page
Pahle hum is tarah se website pages me ad unit use kar sakte the
Sath hi AdSense publisher 300×600 ka large ad sirf ek hi use kar sakta tha
I mean aapko big size ka ek page me ek hi ad use karna allow tha
New Policy: Valuable inventory
Ab aap apni site ke content ke hisab se advertising and other promotinal matrial add kar sakte ho
But aapki post me advertisement ke liye jaruri content hona chahiye
I mean agar aapki post me 5000 words hai to aap usme jyada ad unit use kare or 1000 words hai to kam ad use kare
Finally ab aap 3 ad unit se jyada ad use kar sakte ho or apni site par ek se jyada large ad bhi laga sakte ho
I mean aap kitne bhi ad unit use kar sakte ho
Isse AdSense ki policies ka ullaghan nahi hoga
Google AdSense policy ki taraf se aapko relaxation mil gaya hai or mai janta hu aap abhi apne AdSense placement me changes karoge but mai aapko suggest karunga ki aapko ad limit se chutkara mil gaya hai to aap bahut jyada ad unit use na kare
Mere hisab se aap 3 ki jagah 5 ad unit use kar sakte hai isse jyada ad use karne se aapki site or aapke reader par bad effect pad sakta hai
Sabse important bat halanki AdSense ne per page ad limit policy remove kar di hai but fir bhi usne valuable content jaisi terms btayi hai
Use achhe se padh le taki aap koi galati na kar sake
Agar aapko is post me btayi jankari pasand aayi ho to ise social media par apne friends or other blogger ke sath share jarur kare
Our 35,300+ readers have already subscribed to this blog's newsletter

Google ka bhi dhanyawad karta hoon ye decision lene ke liye
Bhai mere blogger ka Adsense account disapprove ho gaya hai ye error aa raha hai
Thank you for your continued interest in adsense
Unfortunately, we were unable to approve your initial application
To resubmit your application, complete the fields below
For your application to be successful, make sure that you’ve resolved the issues described in the disapproval email we sent you:
If your application was disapproved because it matches a currently approved AdSense account, then you must close your other account before you reapply
If your application was disapproved because your site doesn’t follow the AdSense program policies, then you must fix the issues with your site before you reapply
For more information, visit the Bhai mai kya karu

Support Me India - Internet Ki Jankari Hindi Me!!!
A Indian Hindi Blog for Beginner Bloggers to Learn Something New and Special Everyday
By: Jume deen khan In: Adsense Last Updated: 23/04/2017
Internet marketing ki duniya me CTR  advertisers and publishers dono ke liye bahut mayne rakhta hai
Advertiser only wohi advertisement create karte hai jinki CTR jyada hoti hai or publisher ki site par sirf wohi ads show hote hai jinki CTR adhik hoti hai
Advertisement program se jyada money earn karne ke liye CTR ka behtar hona jaruri hai ya nahi
Iske bare me aapko is post me sabkuch pata chal jayega
Last some time, Mere ek friend Ankit Jha ne mujhse pucha tha ki “Mere blog par Adsense CTR bahut kam rahta hai or earning bhi kam hoti hai
Aapke hisab se CTR kitni honi chahiye or ise increase karne ke liye kya kare
” So aaj mai Ankit ke sath aap sabhi ko AdSense Click through Rate (CTR) ke bare me sabkuch details se bta raha hu
Actually, Advertisers bhi wohi ads jyada create karte hai jinki CTR jyada hoti hai or unhe jin ads se jyada benefit milta hai
Humari site par wohi ads jyada dikhaye jate hai jinki CTR jyada ho
Agar aapke blog par kisi ad ki CTR kam hai to wo ad aapke blog par nahi dikhaya jayega or aap bahut se high CPC advertisement se vanchit rah jate ho
CTR ka matlab hota hai Click Through Rate
Ye advertisement par click hone wale number me total advertisement views ka vibhajan hota hai
I mean kitne ads views hone par kitne click hote hai ke percentage ko CTR kahte hai
CTR = Clicks / Impressions
In simple words, Sidhe shabdo me agar aapki site par 100 people ke dwara ads dekhe jate hai or aapko 10 clicks milte hai to aapki AdSense ctr 10% hogi
Common Question, Sabse bada sawal hai jo har ek AdSense user janna chahata hai ki “What is good CTR” means AdSense CTR kitna percent hona chahiye or kitna better hota hai
Bahut se logo ko ye shikayat rahti hai ki unki site par good number me ads click hone ke bavjood achhi income nahi ho pati hai
Actually, bahut jyada ads clicks hone par jyada earning ki koi guarantee nahi hai or ye bhi jaruri nahi hai ki bahut jyada CTR hone se earning badiya hogi or kam hone se earning kam hogi
Some good clicks par aapki earning 100 clicks se jyada ho sakti hai
Ye ads placement par depend karta hai
Aapki site par ads jitne clear location par show honge aapki CPC utni hi better hogi
Hum sab jante hai ki blogging se earning karne ka google AdSense Prime Advertisement Program hai
Bahut se AdSense user kuch hi traffic par AdSense se smart tarike se achhi earning kar lete hai or kuch blogger jinke blog par bahut jyada traffic hone par bhi wo achhi earning nahi kar pate hai
Iska sabse bada reason hai, Adsense terms ko achhe se samajhna
Jo person isme kamyab ho jata hai wo AdSense se easily badiya kamayi kar leta hai
Agar hum AdSense CTR increase karne ki bat kare to aap ye tips follow kar sakte ho
Mai aapko suggest karunga ki agar aap google AdSense se jyada earning karna chahate hai to AdSense ke bare me puri jankari prapt kare wo sab aap kahi or se nahi google help forum se sikhe
Agar aapko english kam aati hai to aap google translate service ki help le sakte ho
But jo clear information aapko google pages me milegi wo kisi bhi blog ya website par nahi milegi
Agar aapko is post me badiya jankari mili ho to is post ko social media par apne friends ke sath share jarur kare

If you like his articles then you can share this blog on social media with your friends

Support Me India - Internet Ki Jankari Hindi Me!!!
A Indian Hindi Blog for Beginner Bloggers to Learn Something New and Special Everyday
By: Jume deen khan In: Adsense Last Updated: 15/04/2017
Everyone wants to know, How much money you earn from Google Adsense? How much traffic you need to make good money with google AdSense advertisment? This is most common question in every webmaster and blogger
Bahut sare log janna chahate hai ki wo google AdSense ads unit use karke apni site par kitna paisa kama sakte hai or iske liye unhe kitne traffic ki jarurat padegi
 All google AdSense users and newbie people iske bare me search karte rahte hai
Wo sabhi log jo abhi google AdSense ke bare me basic information rakhte hai or future me AdSense join karne wale hai google me AdSense se related is tarah ke topic search karte hai
To earn much more money from google AdSense:
Most important question hai google AdSense se kitni traffic se kitna paisa kamaya ja sakta hai
Lagbhag har koi is sawal ke bare me janna chahata hai
Especialy, new blogger iske bare me sabse jyada searching karte hai
So today I will explain, How much traffic you need to make good money from google AdSense advertisment program on your site
Mai already Google Adsense Se $100 Per Day Kaise Kamaye or Google Adsense Se 1 Click Par $10 To $50 Kaise Kamaye ; Secret Tips articles me AdSense ki more money making tips bta chuka hu
So is post me extra explain karne ki jarurat nahi hai
Aaj mai aapko AdSense se adhik earning ke bare me nahi balki “Google AdSense par kitne traffic se kitni income ki ja sakti hai” ke bare me bta raha hu
As we all know, Websites and blogs se online paise kamane ka Google Adsense most important source hai or mostly people AdSense use karte hai
Agar aap nahi jante ki website or blog me kya fark hai to aap Website Aur Blog Me Kya Fark Hai Dono Me Kya Difference Hai post read kar sakte hai
However, Big money earn karna easy nahi hai isme kuch time bhi lag sakta hai
Jo log aaj ke time me Adsense se daily thousands dollar kama rahe hai wo lucky nahi hai balki unhone iske liye seriously hard work kiya hai
Jisme time lagta hai
So agar aap soch rahe hai ki aap bina mehanat kiye google AdSense se 1000 dollar earn kar sakte ho to ye tutorial aapke liye nahi hai
My thoughts, I thing aapko AdSense se badiya income karne ke liye 3000 to 5000 daily traffic ki jarurat padegi
It’s true, google AdSense se achhi earning karne ke liye aapko a lot of traffic ki jarurat hoti hai
So jab tak aapki site par 3000+ pageviews daily traffic na ho tab tak AdSense se good earning ke bare me sochna bhi bekar hai
Halanki aap isse pahle $1, $5 ya $10 daily earn kar bhi sakte ho
Google AdSense se earning karne ke bare me janne se pahle aapko AdSense RPM, CPC and CTR ke bare me ache se pata hona chahiye or agar nahi bhi hai to mai yaha aapko details me bta deta hu
Cost-per-click (CPC):
Google AdSense ki sabse badi problem hai ki difference niche websites par Adsense CPC alag alag hoti hai
Adsense CPC ka matlab hai ki aapko kitne clicks se kitni earning huyi hai
Agar aapne 100 ad unit clicks se $10 earn kiye hai to uski CPC hogi $100/10 = $
Total earning / total clicks = Adsense CPC
I told above, Alag alag niche topic websites par AdSense CPC high low hoti hai
Advertiser niche se related pay karte hai so aap high CPC niche topic par writing kar sakte ho
In my experience, Insurance, web hosting, blogging, health and other some high performing niche par AdSense CPC other topic se jyada hoti hai
I sure Insurance keywords ki CPC sabse high hai
Top 20 High Paying Keywords in Google Adsense post me maine iske bare me btaya bhi hai
Iski help se aap apne content ke liye better niche topics select kar sakte hai
Insurance keyword par AdSense only single click par $30 to $50 tak pay karta hai
So mai aapko highly suggest karta hu ki aap jitna ho sake high CPC keywords use karke hi articles write kare
Click throw rate (CTR):
CTR ka matlab hota hai ki aapko kitne pageviews se kitne ad unit clicks mile hai
I mean agar aap 1000 pageviews par 7 ad clicks milte hai to aapki CTR hogi 10 / 100 * 100 = 10%
  CTR = Clicks / Imperssions
Make sure your AdSense ads work proper, mai aapko suggest karunga ki aap AdSense ke popular or effective sizes ad 728×90, 336×280, 300×250 and 160×90 sizes ke ad units use kare
Adsense RPM Kya Hai or Adsense RPM increase kaise Kare post me aap AdSense RPM ke bare me details se janakri read kar sakte hai
Yaha sabse important hai AdSense CPC so upar btaye anusar aapko simply samajh aa gaya hoga ki AdSense CPC kya hai
Adsense se achi earning karne ke liye aapki CPC kam se kam $3 honi chahiye
Now I’m confessing, aap ek website owner ya ek blogger ho is time aapki site par google AdSense enable hai or site par approximately something 5000+ traffic bhi hai
Let’s we know, kitne visitors, page views per day se google AdSense ke sath kitni earning ki ja sakti hai
Suppose, Agar aapki site par 1000 pageviews daily hote hai to aapko 5-15 ad clicks mil jayege or aapki AdSense CPC $0
50 hai to aapki daily earning is parkar hogi
1000 pageviews per day
Now your total earning = $5
Agar aapki site ka design fast loading
effective, beautiful or simple hai to aapko 3000 to 5000 pageviews par lagbhag 50-70 ad clicks mil jayege
3000 pageviews per day
Now your total earning = $25
Now, agar aapki site par daily 10,000 pageviews traffic hai to aapko daily 150 to 200 clicks aasani se mil jayenge
tab aapki earning hogi
10,000 pageviews per day
Now your total earning = $75
agar aapki site par daily 15,000 to 20,000 pageviews original traffic hai to aapko daily 300 to 500 clicks aasani se mil jayenge
tab aapki earning hogi
20,000 pageviews per day
Now your total earning = $150
I know google AdSense ki CPC humesha same nahi hoti hai so agar aapki CPC $0
30 bhi hai to bhi aap AdSense se daily 5000+ traffic se $20 easily earn kar sakte ho
Sabse important factor USA, UK and some other countries me AdSense one click par $10 to $50 to pay karta hai jabki india me per click only $0
So aap agar english blogger ho to to United State United Kingdom country ko target karke content likhe
We do not recommended anybody to enable google AdSense ads on website or blog that getting less then 300 visits per day
Finally, aap samajh gaye honge ki AdSense se 1000 pageviews par daily kitni earning ki ja sakti hai
Usi ke hisab se aap 30,000, 50,0000 and other traffic par earning ka idea laga sakte ho
I sure AdSense se monthly 20,000 to 30,000 rupees earn karne ke liye aapke blog par 10,000 pageviews yani daily 3,000 to 4,000 visitors ki jarurat hogi
Mai aapko recommended karunga ki pahle aap apne blog par traffic badhaye or 2000+ traffic ke bad hi google AdSense ke liye apply kare
Agar aap usse pahle AdSense enable karoge to bhi aapki koi income nahi hogi
So don’t west your time and work some better
Now tell me about your AdSense earning, CPC and other source in comment section

Ek to Computer/Laptop ke CPM jyada acche hote hain
Mobile Visitors par CPM 0
Bharat mein agar aap Health, GK aadi vishyo par post likhte hain, to ek to aapke sabse jyada visitor Mobile se aate hain
UC Browser ki wajah se India mein CPM vaise bhi kam ho jati hain
Matlab ki Yeh UC browser aapke 35% Visitors ke ads show nahi hone deta hain
Isse aapki earning par bada effect padta hain
Adsense se earning karne ka mera experience bas yahi kahta hain ki Ek to aapke Visitors India se hain to Veh Computer/Laptor se aane jaroori hain
Dusra agar aapki site Mobile par zyada dekhi jati hain to Main Country mein American religion, Europe aadi se aane chahiye
Kyonki Europe aur America jaise Big Countries ka traffic Chahe agar Mobile se hi kyon na aaye INDIA ke mukable yaa yoo kanhe ki INDIA ke Computer Visitors se brabar hi earning hoti hain
Bharat mein Mobile Visitors se zyada Earning karne ka Khawaab dekhna, Din mein sapne dekhne waali baat hain

Support Me India - Internet Ki Jankari Hindi Me!!!
A Indian Hindi Blog for Beginner Bloggers to Learn Something New and Special Everyday
By: Jume deen khan In: Adsense Last Updated: 15/04/2017
Everyone know, google AdSense ads unit load hone me jyada time lagta hai jisse faster website ki bhi slow speed ho jati hai
Actually, AdSense user ke site par ad unit use karne se har ads ke sath javascript load hoti hai jisse site slow ho jati hai
Suppose, aapki site par google AdSense ads faster load hote hai to isse aapko 2 benefits hai
First aapki site ki loading speed tej hogi or second aapki AdSense revenue increase hogi
Fast loading AdSense ads means fast loading site or fast loading hone wali websites ko all visitors like karte hai
I sure isse aapki AdSense earning 101% increase hogi or aapki site ka loading time kam hone se visitor site par jyada visit karenge
In this tutorial, yaha mai aapko google AdSense ads ko teji se load karne ke bare me kuch effective tips bta raha hu
I hope isse aapko positive result milega
Internet par bahut si website or blog hai jo advertising displaying se money generate karte hai or inke liye internet par bahut sare optimizations improve overall earning ke bare me articles bhi hai
Aap unki help se apne advertising experiment me behtar bana sakte ho or some traffic se bhi jyada money earn kar sakte ho
All people, faster loading time site ko like karte hai
Becouse koi bhi slow laoding site par apna time west nahi karna chahata
Agar aapki site 3-4 second se jyada time me open hoti hai to aapki site par traffic kam hone ka sabse bada reason yahi hai
Google ke anusar 90% user 4 second se kam time me load hone wali sites ko pasand karte hai
In case, advertising use karne par site ki speed bahut slow ho jati hai
Jisse na sirf hume traffic kam milta hai balki humari earning bhi na ke barabar ho jati hai
Faster load site ka matlab hai or jyada pageviews prapt karna
So aap real me apni site ko fast loading banana chahate ho or AdSense ads se adhik paisa kamana chahate ho to ye post aapke liye bahut jaruri hai
Adsense ads use karne wali site par some time laoding time issue show hota hai
Is post me btayi gayi tips se aapki site par advertisers ki speed performance better hogi or aapki site par laoding error ki problem kam ho jayegi
Maximum adevertising display karna site ki speed slow karne ka sabse important reason hai
Many time, log apni site par jyada income karne ke liye google AdSense ads ke sath other advertising sites ke ads bhi laga lete hai
Jisse site par script loading badh jati hai or site load hone me bahut time leti hai ya fir kabhi kabhi open hi nahi hoti hai
I suggest you agar aap AdSense ads user hai to apni site par only AdSense ads hi use kare
Best thing, kabhi kabhi thoda jyada se behtar ho sakta hai, so only ek advertising service hi use kare
I agree, aap adhik paise kamana chahate ho or iske liye aapne google AdSense ke sath 2-3 other advertising program bhi join kar rakhe hai
Now, other advertising ki wajah se aapki site par AdSense loading time 30% slow ho gaya hai
Results, jitni aapki other program se earning hogi utni AdSense earning less ho jayegi
So better hoga ki aap ek hi advertising program use kare or usse better performance pane ki koshish kare
My experience, mai ye sab try kar chuka hu ye bilkul sahi reason hai
Use Asynchronouns Ads Units:
Jab aap AdSense par new ad unit create karte ho ya ads code generate karte ho to waha aapko Asynchronouns and Sychronouns 2 ype ke ads code dikhayi dete hai
Some poeple jante hai ki inme se kis type ka ads use karna better hai or kounsa use karna chahiye
Asynchronous Vs Synchronous Adsense Ads Me Kya Difference Hai article me maine iske bare me details se explain kiya hai ki dono me se kis type ka ad code use karna chahiye
Sath hi isme aap both ad code type ke bare me bhi puri jankari pata kar sakte ho
Examples, Synchronouns ad one by one yani ek ke bad ek show hote hai jabki Asynchronouns ad sabhi ek sath load hote hai
 I suggest you aap Asynchronouns type ka ad code use kare kyuki ye separtly load hota hai or isme sabhi ads ek sath show hote hai
Kill of Slow Networks:
Multiple ad networks use karne se maiximum earning ho sakti hai par mai aapko bta du ki isse aapki website speed par bad effect pad sakta hai
Google AdSense aapko many ad unit use karne ki advice nahi deta hai or aap sirf 2-3 ad unit hi use kar sakte ho jisse aapki site par ad perfectly show ho
Some ad networks loading me bahut time lete hai
Iska pata karna bahut hi aasan hai
Aap ye step follow kare
Ab aapko pop up lines dikhayi degi unme aap dekh sakte ho ki page ka kounsa element loading hone me jyada time le raha hai
My Experiement Use Fewer Ad units:
Sometimes less is more, Ye tips wakai better ho sakti hai
Google AdSense site ke per page par 3 text and display ands, 3 links ad unit and 2 search box ads allow karta hai
Agar aap 3 ad unit ki jagah 2 ad units use karo to aapko isse 3 ads se jyada benefits mil sakta hai
Bahut si big websites or blog par aapko 2 ad unit mil jayenge
Unka aysa karne ka koi reason jarur hota hai
Simple hai isse aapki site speed badhegi or ads bhi fast loading honge jisse aapki site par traffic par effect nahi padega or earning bhi jyada hogi
Use one Javascript for all ad units:
Google AdSense ke har ek ads ke sath ek javascript load hoti hai jisse site speed par bad effect padta hai
Aap chaho to sabhi ad units ke liye ek hi script use kar sakte ho
Iske liye aapko ye script site ke header
php folder me <head> ke bad add karni hogi
Iske bare me mai Adsense Ads Ka Loading Time Increase Kaise Kare 99% Speed up Tips post me details se bta chuka hu
I sure isse aapki site par ads pahle se 70% speed se show honge
Optimize Your Site Theme / Templates:
Agar aap AdSense user ho to aapko blog par fast loading template / theme use karni chahiye
Iske liye aap first me bina ads code paste kiye uski speed check kare or 2-3 seconds me load hone wali theme hi use kare
Adsense ads ke curectly load na hone and slow laod hone ka ek reason aapka design bhi ho sakta hai
Ek AdSense user ke liye is type ka design sabse better hota hai
Most reason, agar aap ek blogger hai to aapko isi tarah ka design choose karna chahiye
Examples, aap labnol
org blog dekh sakte ho
Don’t Use Many Images:
However, post ke liye images important hoti hai but jarurat se jyada photo use karna bekar hota hai
Isse aapki site speed bahut slow ho jati hai
Agar aap image ko optimize nahi karte hai tab to ye or bhi buri bat hai
Aap first jarurat padne par hi image use kare or use bhi optimize kar ke hi use kare
Images Ko Optimize karke aap uska size kam kar sakte ho jisse aapki site ki speed better hogi or ads unit bhi fast loading honge
Maine bahut se logo ko dekha hai bina wajah bahut sari images use karte huye jo ki bilkul galat hai
I know, 1 image 1000 words se jyada effective ho sakti hai but extra image use karna humesha bura hota hai
Isse user bhi aapki site ko avoid karne lag jate hai
Use Account Default Font Family Style:
My experience, Adsense ad ke liye default font family choose karne se aapki site par ads unit loading boost hogi or aapki site par fast and better format me ad show honge
Isse aapki AdSense earning increase hogi
Aap google AdSense me ja kar ad style me screenshot me btaye anusar AdSense default ads font family select kar sakte hai
So aapko is post me AdSense ads ko fast loading banane ke bare me helpful information mili hogi
It was hard but aap ise ek bar try jarur kare
I know aapko better result milega
Google AdSense ads se maximum revenue earn karne ke liye ye tricks aapki bahut help karegi
Ek bar aap fir se content read kare
Agar aap WordPress user hai to aap W3 Cache plugin, WP Super Cache plugin and other plugin use kar sakte ho
Ye site ki speed boost karne me kafi help karte hai
I hope you enjoye reading this article and get useful information
If yes then share this post on social media with your friends

Support Me India - Internet Ki Jankari Hindi Me!!!
A Indian Hindi Blog for Beginner Bloggers to Learn Something New and Special Everyday
By: Jume deen khan In: Adsense, Make Money Online Last Updated: 15/04/2017
Google AdSense apni site ko monetize karne ke liye sabse best tarika hai
Blog se earning karne ke liye bhi AdSense top advertisment services me se ek hai, All blogger apne blog par text and display ads, link ad unit and AdSense search ads ki help se paise kamate hai
But AdSense search box ads ke bare me bahut se new bloggers ko information nahi hoti hai
In this tutorial, mai aapko AdSense search ads create karne or use blog me add karke money earn karne ke bare me details se bta raha hu
Adsense custom search engine ke alawa Adsense matched content feature bhi offer karta hai
Jisme aapke hi blog ki recommended posts show hoti hai
Isse aapke blog par reader ko apni pasand ki post padhne me aasani hoti hai
Google custom search engine se paise kaise kamaye
Jab aap AdSense search ads ko apne blog me add karoge to search box me reader ke search karne par aapke blog ki post show hoti hai
Isme aap ek se jyada blog bhi add kar sakte ho
Isse readers ko content find karne me help milti hai
I mean isse aapko 2 benfits hai ek aapko free search box mil jata hai dusra aapki earning bhi hoti hai
Now, aapko samajh aa gaya hoga ki AdSense custom search engine use karne se kya fayde hai
Ab second sawal hai “Google Adsense Par Custom Search Engine Kaise Create Kare?”
Thirst step me popular queries ko ayse hi chod de or search box ke liye custom channels, search box style and ad style choose kare
Ye sab baki ads ki tarah hai
Actually, aap already ad create kar chuke ho so isme aapko koi problem nahi hogi
Aap easily ye step follow kar sakte ho
Aapko AdSense search results kaha par show karna hai
Yaha aapke pas 3 option hai
In my experiences, Mere hisab se apni hi site par kisi page me search result show karna better hoga
I mean 3 option choose kare
Ab aapka AdSense search ads bankar ready ho gaya hai
Ab aap apne blog ke dashboard par jaye or ek new page create kare
Uska link wohi rakhna hai jo aap upar “URL where search results will be displayed” ke samne add kiya hai
Aap jaise hi Save and get code par click karoge to ek pop up windows open hogi
Usme search box code or search results 2 code honge
“WordPress or blogspot blogger dono ke liye same process hai aapko apne blog par ek page create karke usme search results code paste karna hai
or first code blog widget me add karna hai”
All is well! You are done, Ab sab setting ho chuki hai or aap search ads se paise kamana shuru kar sakte hai
Agar aap search box ka size change karna chahate ho to aap first code me “Size=” ke samne ads size value set kar sakte ho
Finally, aap css code ki help se apne AdSense search box ko design kar sakte ho
By the way, ek bar apne search box ko try kar le or agar aapko koi problem ho to niche comment me uske bare me puch sakte ho
I hope aapko ye article pasand aayega or aap aasani se google AdSense search box ads yani custom search box create karke usse money earn karna start kar sakoge
So ho sake to is post ko other blogger ke sath jarur share kare taki wo bhi iske bare me jan sake

Support Me India - Internet Ki Jankari Hindi Me!!!
A Indian Hindi Blog for Beginner Bloggers to Learn Something New and Special Everyday
By: Jume deen khan In: Adsense, WordPress Last Updated: 15/04/2017
WordPress blog me AdSense ads, affiliate market ad, clickbank and other kisi bhi advertisement company ke ads lagane ke liye aap plugin ka istemal kar sakte ho
But agar aap apne blog ke homepage par layout posts, first post, second post, third post ya fir kitni bhi post ke bad ads lagana chahate ho to aapko iske liye plugin ki jarurat nahi hai
In this post, mai aapko aysi tips bta raha hu jisse aap apne WordPress blog ke homepage par post ke bich me AdSense ads laga sakte ho without plugin
WordPress blog par bina plugin ke ads lagane ke bare me internet par is type ke question search kiye jate hai
Agar aap bhi inme se kisi sawal ka solution janna chahate ho to aap bilkul sahi post padh rahe ho
Is post me mai aapko ek choti si trick bta raha hu jisse aap aasan ise apne WordPress blog ke frontpage par AdSense ads show kar sakte ho
Now, ab ek bar apne blog ko open karke dekhe
Blog ki first post ke bad homepage par ads show ho raha hoga
Aap chaho to <?php if($count == 1):?> code me 1 ki jagah aap 2, 3, 4, 5 ya jitni aap chaho utni post ke bad AdSense ads show kar sakte ho
Same isi tarah aap blog ke archive
php folder me bhi ye code add kare taki blog ke page navigation archives par bhi ads show ho
I hope aapko ye trick pasand aayegi
Agar ha to aap ek bar apna 30 second ka time de kar is post ko social media par share jarur kare
Our 35,300+ readers have already subscribed to this blog's newsletter
If you want to learn more with us then you can join us, Hurry up
He is a Indian blogger and share useful content on this blog regularly
If you like his articles then you can share this blog on social media with your friends
Want learn more then click here

मुझे  एक सवाल पूछना था की, आप के मैन page पर गूगल के तीन से अधिक advertise हैं।
1 title के नीचे  large square
2 पोस्ट के बीछ में  2 responsive square ads
3 side बार में  एक लार्ज ad है  – “Powered by Google vala”
4 तीन txt link ads (लिंक ads तीन + तीन  pitcure ads लगा सकते हैं ये मुझे पता है)
5 आप के साइड बार पर  7 the add है  Powered by Google vala”  उसके बारे में मुझे जानना था …
वह कोनसा ad unit है और उसे कैसे  लगाते हैं
मैन question यह है  की – तीन लिंक + 3 picture ads के अलावा साइड बार में एक्सट्रा  7th ad लगा सकते हैं ?
2 आप का साइड बार वाला ad यूनिट  Powered by Google vala”  कैसे create करूँ  ?
Jume deen khan says
नहीं परेश मेरे ब्लॉग पर तीन ही ad unit है
एक पोस्ट टाइटल के बाद एक पोस्ट के मिडिल में और एक लास्ट में ये तीन txt and dislay ads
साइडबार ad सिर्फ होम पेज और archives पर ही शो होत्वे है पोस्ट के साथ नहीं।
2
पोस्ट में 3 links ad इसके अलावा ek search box यानि total 3 image ads, 3 links ad or 1 search box jo ki google allow karta hai
आप साइडबार में जिस powered by google ad की बात कर रहे हो वो matched code है जो AdSense ad unit limit में count नहीं होते है इसके बारे में मैंने Adsense Matched Content Kya Hai or Ise Hum Kab Use Kar Sakte Hai पोस्ट में डिटेल्स से बताया है
php me ye code nahi mil raha, koi dusra option please bataiye
Jume deen khan says

Aap kitna bhi hindi me Likh lo hienglish ka use karna hi padega
kyuki internet , technology,  blogging tips me fully hindi nahi kam kar sakti
ha hindi worl karegi us blog pe jo motivation,  sayari, jokes kahani
Upar ke point ke hisab se aap hame bataye Kya hindi me possible hai? iske liye hum blogger ko Google ke anusar nahi chalna chahiye, Agar aisa hum log karenge to automatically Google hienglish ko first pe degi
Agar uske anusar chale to bahut nuksan hoga

Support Me India - Internet Ki Jankari Hindi Me!!!
A Indian Hindi Blog for Beginner Bloggers to Learn Something New and Special Everyday
By: Jume deen khan In: Adsense Last Updated: 15/04/2017
Google AdSense blog se paise kamane ka sabse bada source hai
Isme koi doubt nahi hai ki blogger and other user advertisement sevices me se AdSense ko sabse jyada pasand karte hai
Google AdSense ek page par 3 text and display ads, 3 link ads or 2 search boxes allow karta hai
But in sabhi ads ko use karne se blog ki template / theme slower wor karti hai or blog loading time down ho jata hai
In this post, mai aapko aysi trick bta raha hu jisse aap blog me all ad unit use kar sakoge or blog fast oepn bhi hoga
Actually, AdSense se earning karne ke liye hum jo apne blog par text and image banner ad add karte hai wo javascript me hote hai
Is wajah se blog slow open hota hai
Isse hume kei nukshan hote hai
I mean all ad unit use karne se aapki site par ad unit karne se sabhi ads show hone me time lete hai
Is reason se aapko bahut kam ad click milenge or 2g internet connection se to bahut hi kam
Suppose, agar aapki site par sabhi ads fast load honge to aapko jyada clickc milenge or aapki AdSense earning increase hogi
Sabse pahle mai aapse kahna chahunga ki agar aap google AdSense se income karna chahate ho to apne blog me se extra sidebar widget ko remove kar de or only jaruri widgets hi use kare
Jitna ho sake apne blog ka design simple rakhe or images ka pryog kam se kam kare
Now, jab aap single page par 3 banner ads lagate ho to us page ko open karne par jaise hi wo ads load hote hai to unke sath 3 javascript bhi load hoti hai
That means, agar aap 1 page par all ad unit use karoge to total 8 javascript load hongi
Jitni jyada script hogi site par utni hi jyada requestes hogi or natijan aapka blog multiple ad unit ke sath slowly open hoga
Ads unit ko fast loading banane ke liye google ne Asynchronous script di huyi hai jo ads ko fast loading banane me help karti hai
Isse sabhi ad ek sath show hote hai
Iske bare me maine Asynchronous Vs Synchronous Adsense Ads Me Kya Difference Hai post me btaya hai
In this tutorial, Aaj mai aapko aysi tips bta raha hu jisse aapke AdSense ads 80% faster speed se laod honge or pahle se aapki site par ads 90% teji se show honge
Generally, AdSense ads par ads unit create karne par hume is tarah ka code milta hai
Examples:- yaha aap 300px by 250px ad unit code ka sample dekh sakte ho
Ye asynchronouns JS file type ka ad hota hai
Jo sabhi ads ko ek sath oepn karta hai
Upar aap code me blue color me jo javascript ko dekh rahe ho wo aapko har ad unit me milegi
Jo ki sabhi ads me same work karti hai
Interesting fact, Suppose aap apne blog par all ad unit use kar rahe ho or agar aap sabhi ads me add asynchronous JS file script ko sabhi ads ki jaagh ek jagah ad karo to aapki site par only one script laod hogi to aapki site fast open hogi
Ab aapko ek asynchronous JS file aapke blog ke <head> ke niche (after) add karni hai
Iske liye aap step follow kare
First copy this javascript code
Now, Ab aapke blog ko open kar ke dekhiye
I sure adsens ads pahle se fast show honge or aapki site bhi jaldi oen ho rahi hogi
Warning: Google AdSense don’t allow editing with ad unit
So use this trick own risk only
Ye ek acha tarika hai AdSense se jyada earning karne ka or apni site par ads use karte huyi site ko fast loading banane ka, Isiliye miane ye aapke sath share ki i hope aapko isse help milegi
Agar aapko ye trick pasand aaye to ise social media par apne friends ke sath share jarur kare

Support Me India - Internet Ki Jankari Hindi Me!!!
A Indian Hindi Blog for Beginner Bloggers to Learn Something New and Special Everyday
By: Jume deen khan In: Adsense Last Updated: 15/04/2017
Google AdSense se badiya earning karne ka tarika sirf content me quality keywords use karna nahi hota hai balki AdSense ke ads placement optimization se bhi AdSense revenue increase ki ja sakti hai
In this post, Mai aapko “Google Adsense Optimization Tips” ke bare me kuch effective tarike bta raha hu
jisse aapki AdSense earning me 100% improving hogi
Blog banane ke bad hum usme kuch article likhte hai or jab humari site google AdSense friendly ban jati hai to hum AdSense ke liye apply kar AdSense approved kara lete hai
Adsense approve hone ke bad hum apne blog me ads lagate hai
Problem ab shuru hoti hai AdSense se low earning hone ki
Jiski kuch wajah hoti hai jaise AdSense policy ka ullaghan karna, ads sahi jagah par nahi lagana, ad unit limit se jyada ads use karna and other bahut se reason hote hai
 Inme se kuch ke bare me mai pahle se post likh chuka hu
Jo aap Adsense se related article par ja kar padh sakte ho
Now, Is post me mai aapko google AdSense ads ke placement optimizing ki tips bta raha hu
Jinse aapki AdSense income jarur badhegi
Actually, In tips ko follow karne se aapko jyada ads click milenge or AdSense CPC bhi increase hogi
What is Optimization | Google Adsense Optimization Kya Hai?
Optimization apni website par apni site or AdSense ads ki quality, placement and performance ko better karne ki process hai
Jisme aap apni site par AdSense advertisment ko optimize kar AdSense revenue increase kar sakte hai
Ad limit per page: 
Aap 1 page me 3 display / text ads, 3 links ads and 2 search box ads laga sakte ho
Agar aap ads unit limit se jyada ads lagaoge to aapki AdSense CPC low ho jayegi or o sakta hai aapka AdSense account band bhi ho jaye
Maine iske bare me Blog ke 1 Page Me Adsense Ke Kitne Ads Laga Sakte Hai post me sabkuch details me btaya hai
Agar aapko iske bare me janakri nahi hai to aap is post ko padh kar ads limit ke bare me sabkuch sikh sakte ho
Agar aap apne blog se money earn karne ke liye google AdSense ke ads use karte hai to isme koi burayi nahi hai or aapko apni site par ads ko chipane ki jarurat nahi hai
Aap apne content me ads ko sabse alag show kare jisse visitors ko bhi pata rahe ki wo ads par click kar rahe hai
 I mean jaha par aap advertisments add karo us location ko reader clearly dekh sake
Section Targeting google AdSense earning badhane ka ek acha idea hai
Aap apne readers and website ki perofrmance report ke anusar AdSense ads ko target kar sakte hai
Aapko apni site par content based targeting, interest based targeting ya placment based targeting me se kis se jyada benefit hota hai
 I mean aapke visitors kis type ke ads pasand karte hai or aapki kis type ke ads par adhik clicks milte hai or achi income hoti hai
Agar aapki website par dark the like black background theme / template hai to aapko AdSense ads ke liye bhi apne experience ke hisab se theme design kar leni chahiye
Best performing Ad Unit:
Google AdSense ke ads me abse better result 300×250, 336×280, 160×600 abd 300×600 size ke ad unit se milta hai
In par aapko jyada click milte hai or inki CPC bhi high hoti hai
Mostly aap 336×280 size ke ad par text only format jyada better hota hai or 300×250 rich media and images ads ke liye behtar hai
160×600 or 300×600 size ads sidebar ke liye badiya hote hai
Jo visitors aapki site par pahli bar aate hai wo ads ko ek do bar dekh kar leave kar jate hai
Ya fir aapki post padh kar chale jate hai
So ads aysi jagah par lagaye jaha par site ko open karne par sabse jyada or sabse pahle user ki nazar pade
Iske liye blog sidebar or post ke first me ads lagana sabse better hai
Google AdSense ke liye website layout bhi important hota hai
So aapko apni website ke diesign par vichar karna chahiye or decide karna chahiye ki aapki site par kaha par ads lagana behtar ho sakta hai
Mere hisab se blog layout se pahle, blog banner or sidebar me sabse first me ads lagana better ho sakta hai
Ye bat sach hai ki website links color se matched color me AdSense ads show karna badiya hota hai
Magar kabhi kabhi kuch alag color jasie ight yellow or very light grey color ke ads se bhi jyada paise kama sakte hai
Actually, Ye aapke readers par depend karta hai ki wo kis color ko jyada pasand karte hai
So is trick ko aajmane me koi burayi nahi hai
Aap ek bar ise try kar sakte ho
Aksar new reader aapki site par apni pasand ka content padhne ke liye search box ka istemal karna like karte hai
Ayse me aap apni post se pahle ya post ke bad me google search engine box ad kar sakte ho
Isse aapki AdSense earning bhi badhegi or traffic bhi increase hoga
Mai aapko suggest karunga ki aap sidebar me 300×250 ad unit me display and text format ad duse kare or 300×600 me text only ads use kare
Sidebar me Text ads par aapko jyada click mil sakte hai kyuki 300×600 size ke image ads ko load hone me jyada time lagta hai
Agar aap short post likhte ho to aap ost ke first and last me ad lagaye or agar aap long article wirte karte ho to aapko post ke middle and first me ads lagane chahiye
Kabhi kabhi post ke end me bhi AdSense ads acha work karte hai
Aap hindi blogger hai or blogging par post likhte hai to aap apne blog se related topic wale other blog ka placement bhi dek hsakte hai or unse iske bare me bat kar sakte hai
Ho sakta hai aapko unke experience se fayda ho jaye
Search Engine Traffic:
Bahut se success people kahte hai ki google AdSense se adhik paise kamane ke liye search engine se jyada traffic hona chahiye
Really, ye bilkul sach hai search engine se aaye visitors AdSense ads me jyada interested hote hai
So aap apni site par search traffic increase kare
Ye sabse better AdSense optimization tips hai
Agar aap achi image banane me expert hai to aap flicker jo ki yahoo ki service hai par apne photos share karke blog par search engine se readers badha sakte ho
Google analytics par AdSense revenue performance report check kare or pata kare ki kis type ke content par ads se jyada earning ho rahi hai or kis content par user AdSense ads par jyada click kar rahe hai
Uske bad usi se related content share kare
Finally, Google AdSense optimization ki sabse badi tips hai aapka experience, aap apne hisab se apni site par ads show kare or pata kare ki kis place par aapko jyada fyada ho raha hai
In my case, Mujhe post ke first me lage AdSense adss se sabse jyada benefit milta hai
I hope aapko ye tips pasand aayegi
Agar ha to is post ko social media par share jarur kare

Jume deen khan says
Aap jitni clear thumbnail banaoge utni hi clear show hogi
This is the prime real estate
Everyone reads/looks at the first bit
You can put ads lower down the page, especially on sub-headers on pages that aren’t designed to be read top-to-bottom
However, for normal pages, the small area at the top will account for 90% of your Adsense revenue
So, how many ads should you put at the top then?
Bhai ek website me kitne ads laga sakte h please batao aur aap meri website check karo kya maine shahi lagye h
Ye post padho ek website me kitne ads laga sakte hai
Meri site ki CPC bahut kam hai
Day by day CPC low ho raha hai
Rpm bhi bahut low rehta hai

Jume deen khan says

Support Me India - Internet Ki Jankari Hindi Me!!!
A Indian Hindi Blog for Beginner Bloggers to Learn Something New and Special Everyday
By: Jume deen khan In: Adsense Last Updated: 15/04/2017
Google ne chrome browser ke liye 2012 me extension release ki thi jiska name tha “Google AdSense Publisher Toolbar”
com ko open kare and same page par hi AdSense revenue report show karti hai
Aaj is post me mai aapko iske ke bare me details se bta raha hu ki chrome browser me google publisher extension kaise or kyo install kare
Chrome Me Google AdSense Publisher Toolbar Kaise Install Kare
Chrome browser me google AdSense publisher extension install karne ke liye aap Google Adsense Publisher Toolbar par jaye
Yaha aap google chrome web store se ise aasani se install kar sakte hai
Sabse important bat google AdSense publisher toolbar use karne se aapko bar bar adsense
com site ko open nahi karna padega or na hi aapko AdSense android apps ki jarurat padegi
Kyuki AdSense toolbar in dono ki kamiyo ko dur kar deta hai
Iske bare me aap in point se samajh jaoge
Inke alawa bhi google AdSense toolbar me bahut sare feature hai jo aapke liye helpful and useful sabit ho sakte hai
Unke bare me janne ke liye aap ek bar AdSense extension ko chrome browser me install kar active karke dekh sakte hai
I hope is google AdSense publisher toolbar ko use karke aapko AdSense ke bare me new information milegi

 supportmeindia
com से ब्लॉगिंग के बारे में उपयोगी टिप्स मिल रही है । मुझे ब्लॉगिंग की ज्यादा तकनीकी जानकारी नहीं है । MP Education Gyan Deep नाम से एक ब्लॉग मैंने mp के teachers और students की help के लिए नवम्बर 2015 में बनाया । तब मुझे seo , AdSense आदि की कोई जानकारी नहीं थी । मैं बस helpful पोस्ट लिखता गया । बाद में बहुत सी बारीकियों की जानकारी मिली । Adsense भी aprove हुआ ।
और अब supportmeindia से जुड़ने के बाद तो मुझे बहुत कुछ जानकारी हासिल हुई । मैंने ब्लॉग post के बीच में AdSense के ऐड लगाने सम्बन्धी एक पोस्ट पढ़ी ।

Support Me India - Internet Ki Jankari Hindi Me!!!
A Indian Hindi Blog for Beginner Bloggers to Learn Something New and Special Everyday
By: Jume deen khan In: Adsense, Make Money Online Last Updated: 15/04/2017
Hindi blog par google AdSense se adhik paisa kamana mushkil hai? Shayad aap is bat se kuch percent agree ho but mai is bat ko 1% bhi nahi manta
Actually manu bhi to kaise kyuki mera manna hai ki hum kisi bhi language ke blog par AdSense se badiya income kar sakte hai
Bas iske liye hume kuch bato ka khyal rakhna hota hai
Jiske bare me mai yaha aapko bta raha hu
Shayad aapko in tips se kuch fayda mil jaye
Mujhe blogging me 10-11 month ho gaye hai or maine lagbhag har hindi blogger or kuch expert blogger se yahi bat suni hai ki hindi blog par google AdSense bahut kam pay karta hai yani hindi blog par AdSense CPC bahut low hoti hai
Unfortunately, aapne bhi is metter ke bare me bahut bar suna hoga ki india me ya hindi site par AdSense bahut kam pay karta hai
India me google AdSense per click $0
Hum hindi blog par AdSense se $5 to $10 kabhi nahi kama sakte
Inke alawa bhi ayse hi bahut se sawal aapne logo se sune honge or shayad ye information bahut si websites blog par bhi mil jaye
Actually, Ye bate bilkul sahi nahi hai
Sirf itna sach hai ki india me USA, UK jaise other country ki tulna me AdSense CPC kam hoti hai
Iski wajah humare indian product se google ko kam comission milta hai
Aapne dekha hoga ki humare hindi blog par jyadatar indian ads hi show hote hai
Or india me dollar ki value jyada hone se koi bhi product company google ko jyada pay nahi kar pati hai
Sach ye hai ki AdSense language se nahi keywords se related advertisment show karta hai
Use jis ad product par jitna jyada comission milta hai wo hume bhi utna hi jyada commission deta hai
Mai is metter par aage bat karne se pahle aapko apne bare me btana chaunga
Mai ek hindi blogger hu but mai apne blog supportmeindia par hinglish font me articles likhta hu
Yaha mai aapko apne blog par AdSense se ki gayi earning ka ek screenshot dikha raha hu
Is screenshot me aap clear dekh sakte hai ki only 2,505 pageveiws se $12
20 ki earning huyi hai
Ye earning sirf 23 click par huyi hai yani lagbhag $0
53 ki CPC jabki ye income ek hindi blog ki hai or sabhi click india se hi huye hai
Mai janta hu kuch log iske bare me ulti sidhi bate karenge
But ye sach hai or yahi wajah hai ki mai india me AdSense low CPC wali bat ko 1% bhi nahi manta hu
Yahi wajah se mai dusro se kahta hu ki hindi blog par bhi AdSense se lakho kama sakte hai
Isi se related maine ek post likhi thi Google Adsense Se Per Day $10 Kaise Kamaye
Isme maine 3,000 pageveiws se $10 kamane ki bat kahi thi
Magar aapko agar AdSense ki achi information ho to aap isse bhi jyada kama sakte ho
Isiliye maine google AdSense ke bare me kuch or bhi post likhi hai
Magar sirf kuch hi log hote hai jo metter ke asali reason ko catch kar pate hai
Baki sabhi ka ek hi jawab hota hai its impossible
Ab aapko tay karna hai ki aap kis type ke blogger ho
Mai aapko suggest karunga ki AdSense ko ache se samajho
Meri garantee hai aap bhi AdSense se achi earning kar sakte ho
In this case, Kuch hindi blogger hai jinko AdSense se achi CPC nahi mil pati hai to wo english me blog banate hai or jab unhe english me bhi success nahi mil pati hai to wo dusre logo ke piche pad jate hai
Please is work se bacho or mehanat karo
Apne aap par wishwas karo aap kar sakte ho
Yakinn aap bhi google AdSense se paise kama sakte ho
Bas aapko apne aapko kabu me rakhna hoga
Kyuki nirasha inshan ko kha jati hai
For Example, Aap agar hindi blogger ho to hindi me hi blogging karo
Asafal hone ke dar se english ya kisi or bhasha ke piche mat bhago, Agar aap acha work karoge to aapko uska acha result hindi blog par hi mil jayega
Apne aapko ko strong banao or sahi rasta choose karo or ek bar jis raste par chal pado use kabhi mat chodo
Iske bare me ek quotes hai
“Jindagi me kabhi kisi kaam me har mat mano, Kyuki nadiya kabhi nahi puchti ki samundar kitna dur hai
Agar aapme power hogi to aap hindi field me bhi wohi kar sakte ho jo english me karte ho
Un logo se mat judo jo khud fail hone par dusre success logo se jalne lagte hai or unki kamiya nikalte firte hai
Life me iske alawa bhi bahut kaam hai or ho sakta ho
Ek sabse important bat ” Har kamyab inshan ke pas time nahi hota
Wo din rat work karta hai fir bhi uska kaam kabhi pura nahi hota
” Dusri taraf kuch logo ke pas dusro ko nicha dikhane ke siwa apne kaam ke liye hi time nahi hota
Actually, hindi blogging karne me aapko kuch bato ko follow karna padega jo aapke blog ko quality content site banati hai or jinse na sirf aapko AdSense se jyada CPC milegi balki aapke blog par organic traffic bhi jyada aayega
Yani site par search engines se bhi traffic badhega
Common Words: सामान्य शब्द 
Hindi blogging me hum words ko hindi font me hi likhte hai jaise hindi ko “हिंदी” or blog ko “ब्लॉग” jo ki Search engines me achi postion banane me success nahi hai
(Is time google hindi font se jyada hinglish font me likhe content ko jyada achi position me show karta hai
Ho sakta hai future me google hindi font ko hinglish font se jyada better result dene lag jaye
) So mai aapko hinglish me likhne ki advice dene ki galti nahi karunga kyuki mai nahi chahata ki aapko meri wajah se kal ko success na mile
Generally, Some simple and daily work me use hone wale english words ka matlab sabhi jante hai jaise better, like, success and other
Agar aap in daily use hone wale shabdo ko hindi ki jagah english ya hinglish me likhe to aapko AdSense or google search dono se better result mil sakta hai
Before – राम के पिता का नाम राधेश्याम हैं और वो एक छोटे गावं में रहते हैं।
After – राम के father का नाम राधेश्याम है और वो एक छोटे village में रहते हैं।
Isi tarah aap kuch important words ko hinglish ya fir english me use kar sakte ho
I sure isse aapki site ki search rank increase hogi or AdSense CPC bhi badhegi
Use English Keywords: अंग्रेजी कीवर्ड का प्रयोग
Hum jab bhi apne blog par koi post likhte hai to uska koi na koi main keyword hota hai
Yani hum kis topic par post likh rahe or kiske bare me is post me jankari de rahe hai
Ye sabse important metter hai
Yaha focus karne wali bat ye hai ki aap main keywors ko har bar hinglish ya english me mat likho balki dono me likho
Yani kuch jagah par hindi font me or kuch jagah par english font me
(Yaha mera matlab ye nahi hai ki aap puri hi post ko hindi or english se full kar do
Balki kuch jaruri words ko hi english me likhna hai
Isse aapko hindi or english dono type ke keywords searching se fayda milega
Example mai is post me hindi blog par AdSense earning ke bare me post kar raha hu to mai ise agar ek do jagah par english me likh sakta hu
But yaad rahe keywords stuffing nahi honi chahiye
Keywords Placement: कीवर्ड जगह
Aapko puri hi post me english ya hinglish keywords use karne ki jarurat nahi hai
Kisi bhi content me first and last paragraph sabse jyada important hote hai so aap post ke first or end wale paragraph me english keywords use karne me jyada focus karne ki koshish kare
Baki paragraph me aap hindi me hi keywords use kar sakte ho
Post content me keywords placment jitna sahi hoga uski search rank utni hi badiya hogi
Wo post google me first postion par show hogi
Ye bat google apni blog post me clear kar chuka hai
Yani aapko post content ko SEO friendly banane ke liye english and hinglish keywords use karne hai
Ab ye aap par depend karta hai ki aap isme kitne success hote ho
Write Pure Hindi: शुद्ध हिंदी लिखे
Agar aap hindi blogger hai to ye bhool jayiye ki hindi me content likhna bahu easy hai
Actually, Hindi language me likhna bahut mushkil hai or isme ek ek word ka dhyan rakhna padta hai
So shudh hindi ka prayog kare or ek dam perfect hindi bhasha me post likhe
Pure hindi me likhe content aapke visitor, search engines, google AdSense and all other sabhi ko pasand hote hai
Isse google AdSense aapki post me keywords se related ads show kar sakega
Sath hi aapko searh engine se acha traffic bhi milega
Keywords Research: कीवर्ड अनुसंधान
Bahut se new blogger sochte hai ki keywords research sirf english blog ke liye hota hai
Keyword researching hindi blog ke liye bhi bahut important hoti hai
Agar aap bina keyword search kiye koi post likhte ho to uski koi importance nahi hoti hai
Wo bilkul wesa hi hota hai jaise kisi room me rakha disorganized samman
Jisme koi bhi cheez ka pata nahi hota hai or sabhi ki same position hoti hai
 Aap keywords search karne ke liye google adwords keyword planner tool and other tools ko use kar sakte hai
Agar aap AdSense user hai to aapke liye adwords planner tool better hai
Kyuki is par aapko keywords AdSense CPC ki bhi performance pata chalti hai
Isse aap high CPC keywords ko apne content me add kar sakte ho
Finally, google AdSense se jyada paise kamane ke liye aapko keywords english ya hinglish me hi likhne honge or hindi blog par low CPC ki sabse badi wajah bhi yahi hai
Or agar aap hinglish blogger hai to aapke liye or bhi aasan ho jata hai
Hindi bhasha ke blog par bhi ye tips 100% work karenge aysi me ummid karta hu or ye bhi aasha karta hu ki aapki AdSense CPC bhi  jarur increase hogi
Hindi blog par aap in 5 tips ko follow karke aasani se google AdSense se achi earning kar sakte ho
But tabhi jab aap sabhi step ko follow karke post likhoge
Sirf padhne se kuch bhi nahi hota
So agar aapko sach me AdSense earning increase karni hai to high CPC keyword wale content likhne honge
I hope aapko is article me hindi blog par AdSense se jyada paise kamane ki achi jankari milegi
So plz is post ko social media par share jarur kare

1)aapne AdSense wali post me kaha hai ki YouTube par video uplode karke or unpar 500 se jayda view ho jaye to addsense approved ho jata hai, lekin AdSense me sign up kab karte hai
2) aapne kaha ki AdSense me blogspot add nahi kar sakte, lekin bhut se log ne to  blogspot par bhi AdSense ke ad lagaye hai
3) address pin verify 10$ hone par hi kar sakte hai, kya AdSense banne ke baad turant address verify nahi kar sakte
4) AdSense par address verify ho jata hai, tab addsense verify hota hai, ya or pahle
5) AdSense me hum jo bank add karte  karte hai, agar vo bank account  16 ya 17 years me open kiya gaya ho, matlab uss bank ka atm or net banking na ho to usse AdSense me add kar sakte hai…

Bhai mene 2 bar AdSense ko apply kiya tha but disapproval ho gaya ab me 3rd time apply  karunga to kya approvel hoga kya bhai
Jume deen khan says
Aap mujhe second time reject huye AdSense ka mail dikhao
Uske bad hi kuch tips bta sakta hu
Vicky Pawar ghabrao mat main toh kareeb 15-20 baar reject hua hoon
Lekin maine himmat nahi haari
Har 10-12 din mein re-apply karta tha, aur ek din mera Adsense account approve ho hi gya
Sach mein lagbhag  15-20 baar re-apply karna kitna mushkil hota hoga aap soch hi sakte hain aur jab baar -baar disapprove ho jata tha toh 1-2 din mann udaas ho jata, lekin teesre din mann mein ek naya josh aata tha ki ab mujhe aur bhi mehnat karni hain aur phir se apply karna hain
Abhi toh aapne sirf 2 baar hi apply kiya hain
Mere taraf dekho maine aapke liye example set kar di hain
Main sabhi logo se yehi kahoonga, Koshish karte raho
2-3 baar disapprove ho jane ke baad himmat mat haaro, Kyonki kya pata 20 vi baar mein hi sahi  google aapke blog ko approve hi kar lega

Support Me India - Internet Ki Jankari Hindi Me!!!
A Indian Hindi Blog for Beginner Bloggers to Learn Something New and Special Everyday
By: Jume deen khan In: Adsense Last Updated: 15/04/2017
Swift BIC code kya hai or apni bank brach ka Swift BIC code Kaise pata kare? Is sawal ka jawab lagbhag har ek AdSense user janna chahata hai
Swift code ki wajah se bahut logo ko google AdSense ka payment nahi mil pata hai
Isliye mai is article me aapko swift bic code ke bare me kuch important bate bta raha hu
Sath hi kisi bhi bank ka swift code pata karne ka tarika bhi bta raha hu
Google AdSense india me wire transfer ke throw payment karta hai
Jiski full information maine Adsense Me Apna Bank Account Kaise Add Kare post me already btayi huyi hai
Adsense par apna bank account add karne ke liye hume IFSC or SWIFT Code ki jarurat hoti hai
IFSC code to hum aasani se pata kar lete hai but SWIFT BIC code sabhi bank branch khas kar ke local bank branch me available nahi hota hai
Jisse hume swift code pata karne me bahut confusing hoti hai
But is post ko padh kar aapki ye confusing dur ho jayegi
Google AdSense me swift code galat add karne se bhi AdSense us bank ko payment kar deta hai
Isliye swift code ke bare me ache se confirm karke hi AdSense payment form me sahi information bhare
Jisse aane wale time me aapko payment mil sake
Swift code Business Identifier Codes ka standard format hota hai
Isko internation money transfer ke liye use kiya jata hai
Swift code se bank country, bank location, bank branch or bank ka pata chalta hai
Swift code me in charo ke code hote hai
Ise hum is screenshot se samajh sakte hai
Is screenshout se aapko aasani se samajh aa gaya hoga ki swift code kya hai
Or ye kya kaam aata hai
Ab humko apni bank branch ka swift code janna hai
To chaliye iske bare me bhi mai aapko details se bta deta hu
Apni bank branch ka swift code pata karne ke liye mai aapko yaha par jo tricks bta raha hu unhe ache se padhe or samajhe uske bad hi action le
Kyuki jara si galati se aapko AdSense ka payment nahi milega
Bahut si local bank branch me swift code available nahi hota hai
Ayse time me hum apni bank branch ke najdeeki kisi or bank branch ke swift code ko google AdSense me use kar sakte hai
But swift code usi bank ka hona chahiye
Google iski hume permission deta hai
Example, Aapka account state bank of india me hai to aap najdeeki kisi state bank of india ka hi swift code istemal kar sakte ho
Google AdSense me swift code use karne ke 2 tarike hai
Ab mai yaha aapko swift code pata karne ka jo tarika bta raha hu
Mai chahata hu ki aapko swift code ke bare me ek ek step samajh me aaye or aapko koi problem na ho
Sabse pahle aapko pata karna hai ki humari bank branch me swift code available hai ya nahi
Iske liye aap apni bank ke customer care me call kar sakte ho
Agar unka jawab na ho to humare pas second option hai ki hum kisi najdiki bank ka swift code use kare
Iske liye hum online internet ki help lenge
Internet par aysi bahut si site hai jo aapko sabhi banks ke swift bic code ki information deti hai
Mai yaha aapko aysi hi ek site ke bare me bta raha hu
Is tarah se aap online kisi bhi bank ka swift code pata kar sakte ho
But yaha ek sabse badi problem hai ki aap jis nearby bank ka swift code use kar rahe ho
Wo real me aapki bank branch se sabse jyada pass me hai ya nahi
Agar aapko ye confusing hai to chaliye mai aapko iska bhi tarika bta deta hu
Agar aapne galat bank ka swift code AdSense me add kar diya to AdSense to us bank ko payment kar dega
But wo bank aapko payment nahi karegi
Isliye carefully apni bank ke sabse najdeeki bank ka hi swift code use kare
Iske liye aap google ki madad le sakte ho
Aapko yaha par jitne bhi cities ke name mile aap un sabhi ki apni bank branch ke address se duri pata kare
Iske liye aap google search engine me ye topic search kare
 “Your Bank Address Name to Swift Code Bank Address Name Kilometers“
 Jaise:- Alwar to Neemrana Kilometers
Ab jaise hi aap enter key button dabaoge aapke samne ek maps open hoga
isme aapko sari infomrmation mil jayegi
Is tarah aap sabhi bank ki duri pata kare or jo aapki bank ke sabse najdeeki ho usi bank ka swift code use kare
Confirm karne ke liye ek bar apni bank ke customer care me call jarur kare or apni nearby bank ka swift code confirm jarur kare
Finaly, Mai aapse ke bar fir se kahna chahunga ki swift code AdSense me add karne se pahle aap ache se confirm kar le ki aap sahi code use kar rahe ho ya nahi
Is post me btaye tarike se aap sabkuch pata kar sdakte ho
Fir bhi mai aapse kahunga ki  aap ek bar customer care me call karke confirm jarur kare
Agar aapko is post me share ki gayi janakri better lage to is post ko social media par apne friends ke sath share jarur kare

सर मेरे एडसंस payment method मे  निचे एक  मॅसेज Intermediary bank (ask your bank)
If your wire transfer is going through an intermediary bank, it must be based in the United States
Intermediary bank name (optional)
Intermediary SWIFT-BIC (optional)
FFC or FBO (ask your bank)
If your bank requires For Further Credit (FFC) or For Benefit Of (FBO), add the instructions exactly as your bank specifies
For further credit / For benefit of (optional)
यहीं लिखा है। तो यहा मै क्या लिख सकता हू।

Sir IFSC CODE KYA HOTA HAI
Jume deen khan says
Bank ki passbook par likha hota hai
Harpreet Kumar says
IFSC (Indian Financial System code) ek unique alphanumeric code hota hai
jo RBI ke through sabhi bank ko alag-alag diya jata hai
IFSC codes ka use Electronic payment jaise Real Time Gross Settelment, Wire Transfer, Internet Banking, Fast Payment, Centralised Fund Management System ke liye kiya jata hai
Ye 11 alpha numeric character ka hota hai isme pahle ka 4 character Bank ko represent karta hai, 5th character zero, Last 6 character branch ko represent karta hai
Yeh code apko apki passbook me mil jayaga or agar aap Internet banking use karte hai toh waha bhi hota hai
iske ilava aap direct bank se bhi le sakte hai
Sir maine apke sabhi steps follow kiye par AdSense ki cpc nahi badh rahi hai
Mai ise badhana chahta hu ye kaise badhegi
